dang / lhung bzed then cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo// de ltar mi sdug pa de mthong nas/ dge slong dag ma dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'a das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi/
bu de la phan gdags pa dang/ slob ma'i tshogs rnams skyo ba bskyod pa dang/ ser sna'i rnam par smin pa ma sdug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham rang byas te/ dag
slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du ba dar te/ gnas der gshegs so// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ [}]
dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa// 'od 'dom gang gas brgyan nga/ rim stong las lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang
ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes te/ de ngotsho bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur zab pa dang/ sku gu'i
gsung gis dgas de byos te/ bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis bdag nyid phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang lhung bzed 'di bsgrubs te/ des na yi dgas suskyes pa yin gyis/ da yang nga la sems
dag la ban gyis yo byad 'di la'ang sems ma chags par byas dang legs so// 'od las kyang shin s sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye re/ de nas yi dogs des chos gos dang lhung bzedadag
'dun le'ul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ nyes pa bshags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi dgas kyi phyir yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod
nams gang// de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin song// yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de ni myur du thar gyur cig/ de nas yi dgas de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur/ shi nas
yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por gyes so// de nas yi dgos rdzu 'phrul chen po rna cha gdub kor dag cing nagul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dngase mo ngos brgyan pa// nor bu sna tshogs kyis sras nga 'icod
pan lus gur kum dang/ ta ma la'i lo ma dang/ sreg ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+madang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar bo dang/ mnar ba rnams
kyis rgyu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen ngo sa snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi

spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo// de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho rangs ma la bar brtson pa lhur byed
pa la gnas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo// de mthong nas the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus so// bcom ldan 'das rtsa 'gas/
mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya bune nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du rams lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag ma marjed kyi bdag po 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba ban nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ yadegs de shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul
chen por skyes te/ de mdang sum pa'i thad du 'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bstan te/ de dga' ba rgyas nas song ngo// dge slong dag de bas na ci nas tshong dpon las ya dgas su gyur pa de'i ltosaM
#// ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ dag slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
nas/ dge slong de dag dang/ lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' ldange dad/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang ya 'ings te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
ba la ma no bar ba stod de// bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyin
rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am ci
rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla ma byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' ldid dang/
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan bo/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzigs cha dang/ gdan
dang/ snyan gsos dang/ snyan zong rnams b.res kha/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal bo'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/

ba0 de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'a dam du sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogasanas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod sems la song ngo// rgyal po'i re ba zhu ba sod snyoms byas
nas zan bros te/ zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ chos gos dang lhung bzed bzhag ste/ yi dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song pa dang/ des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i nyen kor du yi dgas mo gnyane rje'i
srin mo 'dra la lus khrag gas bshes pa// dur khrod na 'dug pa tshakang nus kyis bskor ba/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lta lda btsa' zhing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong la/ bu la byams pa yod bzhin
du de bkres pas rten nas de dag za zhing 'jug pa zhig mthong ngo// de nas gnas brtan 'a dam bu sbyin gyi bus de la dris pa/ khyod kyis ston las ci zhig byas na/ des 'ad lta bu ' u0f7asdug bsngal
myong zhing 'dug/ ya dgas mos smras pa// nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma ma dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'ad zhus shig dang/ de khyod la bdag ga las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/
de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las slong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'a dam bu sbyin gyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag
'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtswa ma skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos de dang ldan no cig ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams ma g.yo bar bcom ldan
ka 'das las chos ro dang ldan na cog nyan par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung// snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog 'ongs pa
legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dam du spyin gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu spun gyi bu tshur shog/ khyod 'das pa/
legs so/ khyod da gdodag las 'ongs/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi dus gsol pa// btsunag bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yodwags kyi nang du mchi mchib las sur mchis te/ der bdag gis
yi dgas mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra la// lus khrag gis bshos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug pa bzhin du gang nus kyis bskor ba zhige mthong 'gas so// yang gsol ba/ bdag
ni nyin nga zhin bu lnga ba tsa'// mtshan yang de bzhin lta btsab ste// btsas nas de dag zes na yang// 'grangs par ma 'gyur zhes mtshane// de yas ma ya 'jig rtenadu/ rab 'jigs
shu sdig da ridagyis na// des na sdug pa la 'di 'dra ba// 'jigs su rung pa myong bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu yi dgas mo da na sdug pa'i/
las byed byed pa yin no// de'i los kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so// 'dam du sbyin gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yade 'azung zhig dang ngas
bshad de// 'dam du sbyin gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wArANas na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la 'angs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam
thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan ng/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhamed gnas pa des gas mnyam pa los chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de
zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod kyang du'ang med/ bu mo'ang med de/ de lag pa la skyon tshugs bcas nas/ bdag ga khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bu'ong med/ bu mo'ang mad pa sa//
bdag 'das nga 'i 'og tu na bun da nga 'a phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal bo dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ sems khongs su chud cinga'adug go/ de nas de bu med dedu 'dod pa 'a phyirje gu lang dang/
tshulha dang/ ku be ra dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa dang/ lca 'khyad par gzhan dag la'ang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'ad lta ste/ kun da ga la ra ba lha dang/ nags tshal gyi
lha dang/ lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang/ sum mdo'i lha dang/ gtor ma len pa' dang/ lhan cig skyes po dang/ chos 'thun ba pa dang/ rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba lha rnams la'ang
gsol ba 'debs la/ 'jig rten na'ang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus gu dang bumo skya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod modakyi/ de'ang de ltani ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i
rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la 'ang du stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i gis so// yon gnas gsum tshogs pa
las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chagaso 'angs te phrad pa dang/ ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang/ dri 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum
tshogs pa las bu dang bum skyo bar 'gyur te/ des lha mnyes par byas kyang du'ang ma byung/ bu mo'ang ma byung nas/ de'i blo 'di lta bu zhig skyes te/ ma la bdag gis chunam zhag rlangasan/ rgyu
la du yod par 'gyur lta srid dam snyam ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las rgyun ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dgar la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dguraspyod pa
mas phye zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/ de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ khyim thab la na ba/ jo bo bdag la sras chags te/ bdag ga rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa
las na/ khye'u 'gyur bar nges kyis/ dbyas ba bskyed du gsol zhes byas so// de'ang dga' chos te/ ro stod na bteg lag pa g.yas ba nang rkyang nas/ bdag gis yun ring po nas
smon smon pa la bu'ang mthong bar 'ong ngo// bdag gi bu rung bar shog cig/ mi rung bar mgyur go/ bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog cig/ gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shegacig//
07/ nor gyi skal la spyod par shog cig/ bdag ga rigs brgyud rang du gnas par shog cig/ bdag cag 'dus te shi ba'i 'ogatu'ang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung/ nyung yang rung ste/
sbyin pa dag byil/ bsod nams dag byas nas de gnyis gang dang gdadu skyes shing 'grol dar 'dasong zhig ces yon bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do// de nas des bu
chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang po zangs kyi stong du nyamarangs su bzhag ste/ gangaba' tshe grangang yo byad rnams dang/ tsha pa' tshatsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang/ sman pas bstan
pa'i zas rnams dang/ ha cang khab na yin pa rnams dang/ tacang skyur pa ma yin pa rnams dang/ cong lan tshwa rtsel ma yin pa rnams dang/ hacang dngar ba ma yin ba rnams dang/ tacang ro
tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang/ ha cang ba ska ba ma yin pa rnams dang/ kha pa dang/ skyur ba dang/ lan tshu dang/ dngarab dang/ tsha ba dang/ bsku ba med pa 'a bris rnams kyis bstan cing/ dro/
shal dang sa mo des lus rnam bar klubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par sgrub bzhedu khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang/ khri'u'i stong nas khri'u' steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi
la ma 'bab pa dang/ des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad cor pa ma thos par byas so// donas chung ma snga ma dos de bkur zhing gcos par byed pa mthong nas phrag dog skyes te bsams pa//
gal te bad u0f7alas chu btsas par gyur na ni/ bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas de'athibs shig bya dgos so snyam mo// 'dod pa sa yos nubastan pa la
ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ca'ang med de/ mi sna/ pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yang sar la bltas pa/ des yid rton du bcug nas gang 'thungs pa tsam gyis nyon mongs ma de'i bu 'phyal bar 'gyur
ba de lta bu'i mngal rlug pa'i tsa byin no// de nas chung ma phyi ma des nye du thams cad bsdus nas chung ma snga ma de zhal lce la bkug ste/ khyod kyis bdag yid rton du bcug pas mngal drug pa'i rtse
byin te/ des bdag gi bu 'brel te zhes byas so// de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams nang du mna' bor ta/ gal te bdag gis khyod la mngal rlug pa'i rtso byon bar gyur nabadag ya degs
mor gyur te bu byung ngo cig za bar shog cig ces byas so// 'dam bu sbyin gyi su ja snyan dusams/ tshong dpon gyi chung ma gyur ba gang yin pa de na lo dogs mo de yin te/ des sngon phrag dog

cha byas pa des na ya dgas mor skyes so// des brdzun byas te mna' bor bal las kyi rnam par smin pa des na nyin mo dang nub mo bu lnga lta btsa' zhing phra bar gyur to// 'dam du spyin gyi bu de bas na khyod
kyis ngag gnyis pa snang ba la brtson par bya ste/ can s la dgas mo de'i nyes ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// bo com ldan 'das kyis
0/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dam du sbyin gyi bu dang/ lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag
kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba/sungs pa la mngon par bstod do// phyi sa khung zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a ngas la/ rgyal ngo rnams dang/ blon po chen po
rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dbon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang//
lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang [7 ]lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/
klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' ldade dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ ltag rgya chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams min po/
dang ldan pa/ nabaza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ spun gsos dang/ snyan brod rnams b.ros pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas ba yangs pa can na//
snga' sde de gi 'gramagyi khang pa brtse gas pa'i gnas na na cing ba zhus/sa so// de'i tsha yangs pa can na grong khyer gyi 'obs shig gi nang na/ sangags zas su skyags ba zab
bor ba bla ba/ ngar snabs dad gcin gyis 'tshob/ rnag dang/ khrag dang/ byis rtsa ba/ ma zad nga/ rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba ltabargya gnas so// yang smras pa
skyugs pa bra zhang bor ba za/ dar lcabs gcin gyis 'tsho ba dang// rnag khrag dang ni sa sbra// mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'dug/ yangs pa can de na bram ze zhig kyang 'dug ste/ des regI
mnyamang las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de ste bzhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas de'i 'us dri nga bar gyur to//

de nas bram ze des ma tsha na mkhan rnams bkug ste dris na/ de dag na re 'di ni lce na khye'u 'dug ba de'i macu yin no zhes zer ro// ra zhig na de zla ba brgyad dan dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u mdog/
ngan rung ba lta na mi sdug la byad ngan po lus mi gtsang bas bsgos pa dri da ba zhig btsas so// de na chog tu mi sdug mod kyi/ byams pa'i dbang gas 'brel pas pha ma gnyis kyiso gsos so//
da ma gtsang ba'i gnas rnams 'ba' zhig tu dga' la/ phyag dar gyi phung po dang/ phyi sa khud du sku 'bal zhing khar ma gtsang ba 'dzud nas/ de'i mid phyis khung zhes bya bar gyur to// re zhig na
de phan tshun du 'khyar pa las 'o da spungs rdzogs khyod kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di de lta bu'i gnas rnams su dga' ba las 'di ni gor ma chag par grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yan gyis
0 bdag gis ltad rab tu dbyung ngo snyam mo// des de rab tu phyung nas gcer bur 'dun zhing 'a ga la/ legs pa byed pa la 'du gnas so// de nas de 'khyam zhing song ba las yangs pa can gyi 'obs

kyi nang na mi dgas lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas de sdon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel bas grong khyer gyi 'obs de'i nang du song nas de dag dang lhan cig 'dus shade phrad de/ dga' bar gyur
nas grogs por gyur to// phyis re zhig na bye 'u yus khung ded naseg la ba' te yangs pa can du sod ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyang grong khyer gyi 'obs der byon nas ya dgas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcon ldan
'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa ga tas kyis leb sa ra ra brgyan pa// dpe byad bsdad po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa// 'od 'dom gang gas brgyan pa nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od
ranga' ba/ rin de mo'i ra bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas/ bzang ba mthong ngo// mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyed kyis
'bongs/ la dgas rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cagon son lags so// de nas da rtsom ldan 'das kyis phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'chu'i rgyun lnga phab ste//
des ya dgas lnga brgya po de dag tshes der mdzad do// de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das la san sa dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'abumo/
skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gas skyes snyam mo// de nas sa degs las

sha'i phos pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang po'i skyes ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la soms dga' bar gyur par de dag gis ma thong ngo// de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam
ts+tsadu sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon te/ gzed bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyire 'dong ngo snyam mo//
de nas ston ya degs su gyur ba'alha' bun cha gdub kor dag cing mdul ba thogs/ lus do shal dod sa mo des brgyan pa// nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i rtsed pan can/ lus gur kum dang/ ta ma
la' la ma dang/ sreg ka la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar po dad/ man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste//
khad pa brtsegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gas gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis sngon yi degs su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'a pags pa ba bden pa bzhi rtogs pa ra 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshos/

ma ba stan pa de thos nas/ lha'i bu lnga brgyas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu yongashas rdo rjes brtson nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'a 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa na thong nas tshong dang khe
sdogs phyin pa dang/ zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar byed pa dang/ dang 'a bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang/ nad pa nad thams cad laMs thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gso bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags nga 'i/
'byor pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo// de nas khye'u phyi sa lung grong khyer gyi 'obs su 'ongs pa dang/ yi dwags de dag ma mthong ngo// de nas
tshol ba la zhugs te de dag yongs su tshol bas skyo bar gyur la de dag ma red do// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni me mkhyen pa bam/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/
thug sa su ma chud pa ci'ang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs ba srung ba gcig ba dang ldan pa// gcig tu dpa' ba/ blo
med ba/ gnyis su ma gsung ngo// zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa// rige dang gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs da// 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la na khas pa//
chub bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrulagyi rkang pa ba zhi'i zhabs kyi mtha' shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi 'kha yun rang de nas 'dris par byas pa// ma 'jigs pa bzhas ma 'joges pa// khyu
mchog ga la nga dag ba'i sa nga ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa// yan lag lta rnam par sbyangs pa// 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das ba/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin
badrug yongs su rdzogs pa// rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi mi tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad ba ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug ba dgu la/
ma bas ba/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang chen khyad par du 'a dgas pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyan dusagasum
mtshan gsum du na ngas rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ sun rgud/ su ni dar/ su na 'o bongs shing 'dug/ sun nyam nga bar gyur/ su na gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni 'a bongs pa dang/
nyam nga ba dang/ gnod pa dang ldan/ na ngan song du gzhol/ sun ngan song du 'a bab/ sun de nasod du dab/ sun ngos ngan song las phyung ste/ mtho si dang/ thar pa dang/ 'bras bu la gzhag

zla par bya/ su ni 'dod ba 'i 'damadu byade ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'i bags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'bags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug nga ra bya/ su ni dge ba rtsa
ba rnams ma skyed pa las ba skyed bar bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ sun yongs su smin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/
ma 'di'i smas pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul par bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/
bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu phya sa khud la phan gdags pa'i phyir snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ da slong ga tshigs kyis nyan rang byas te/ dge slong gi
dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang/ rinug na na thar gyis bsod snyoms bskor te srang du gags na/ phyis khung yang phan tshun 'khor 'khor
te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'grang ngo// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen ngopo' mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis 'dogs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyud/
nus mdzes par byas pa// 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rini ro mo'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzad ba na thong ngo// mthong nas kyang de'i mod la des
bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas so// de dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'aT phyag 'tshal te/thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gal tasems can bdag cag
lta bu 'ang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu 'byung ba mchis te/ chud par gyur nad dag kyang rab tu 'byang bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan ng
ma @#// soms can rnams kyi bsam pa dod bag la nyal mkhyen pas/ shin tu skal ba dang ldan par thugs su tshud nas da glang bo che'i sna lta bu gsar gyi kha dog can ba rkyang/
'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la/ skra dang kha snyani brigs nas/ zhag bdun na
pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur ba// 'gan ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to// 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur
pa shog bka' stsal pas// de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon// sa ngas rgyas kyi dgongs pas gos bgos nas// mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'a das kyis
sbyo de la yid la bye da nga 'i lung thog lta/ des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas bol ga lnga pa' 'khor ba'i 'a khor lo 'di dag go zhing ma brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
(cad rul ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod da/ nyon mongs pa tham sa cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra
! bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'a dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsar dang bod bar mnyam pa// nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa// tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur
wa0 dbasal bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbyabs bcom pa// rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rid pa dang/ tshags do dang/ bkur
ste la rgyab kyis phyogs pa// dbang po dang nyidabang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed da dang/ gus par snyakha' gnas su gyur to// de dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin na'ang ngan ba ' dga'
bar gyur nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dag slong dag 'ad lto ste/ nga'i dag slong phyi sa lung da ni nyan thos kyi dag song ngan ngon la mos pa rnams
kyi mchog yin no// de nas dag slong dag ci tsam byas te/ thartsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gnas brtan sa khung gas las ci bgyis na des 'ad/
lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag phyis khung nyid kyis ston rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs red cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba'
rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sa khung nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyan nas su myong bar 'gyur
te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi
'gyur te/ las dag pa dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung bo dang/ khams dang/ sku mchod rnams 'ba' zhig lasman par 'gyur ro// lus
can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
bsal pa bzang bo 'di nyid la skyo dga' tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ da nga zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/
'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces byab 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho

zla bra nga mdzes ldan zhes bya ba dan rten cing ba zhugs so// de'i tsho rgyal po'i pho brang der khyim bdag gdug gis gtsug lag khang zhig btsugs te/ der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas ba'i dag slob
dag 'ongs pa dang/ 'go ba dang gnas par samagaso// gtsug lag khar den so so'i skyo po'i dge slong zhig gnas te de'ang gnas la shin tu sor sna che ba zhig ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ong ba
rnams mthong na/ tshig pa za zhing 'khrug la gnodasams byed de/ zhul zhul bor 'dug cing 'khrug pa skyed par byed do// rtag song gang dag gtsug lag khang de nas gud du 'gro ba de dag mthong nan/
na shas cher dga' zhing mchog tu dga' la skyel zhing smra bar byed do// byis re zhig na ga zhig gi yul nas dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig 'ongs so// gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de'ang phyir mi 'ong ba
yin te/ des spyod lam gyi sgo nas dgra bcom pa yin bar shes so// de nas dga' ba skyes te/ phyid nyin dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas bar chog dang ldan pa'ikhrus dang bshos la spyan drangs so//

dge slong gzhi pa de na de na med pa las re zhig na byed rten cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus kyang phul/ bshes kyang bshams pa dang/ dag slong gzhi pa de'ang 'ongs te/ de' nga cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus sar so
nas/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po khyedarengs su byung// dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i bya de byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo// de nas de phrag dog skyes nas des snang bsams kyis ngag gi las
rtsub po smras te/ dge slong khyed na 'us ma gtsang bas byugs kyang bla'i/ sbyin bdag 'di lta bu 'a bsnyen bkur len pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes byas so// de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs 'di las
tshos mi bzad pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur nam rung ngo snyam nas/ cang mi zer bar dang du blangs so// re zhig tshogs par gyur te dro la bab pa dge slong gzhi des dgra bcom ba la khyod kyis sdang ba'i
bzod pa gsol le zhes byas so// de nas dgra bcom pa des de dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha' la la dgags nas cho'aphrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// de nas lhag par yang
'gyod ba skyes te/ des de'i mdun du las kyi nyes pa de na thol zhing bshags te shad kyis sbyang saso// 'on kyang des mthar thug ba 'a ya shes bskyod na mi nus so// de nas re zhig na 'chi ba'i dus
la bab dra dang/ des smon lam btab ba/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems bskyod pa dang/ ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa de'i las de'i rnam bar smin pa ni bdag gis myong bar
ma gyur cig/ bdag gis bklags pa dang/ kha ton byas pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ sbyin pa chen po dag byin pa dang/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des

ni ma 'ongs da 'i dus na/ sangs rgyas ba rtsom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par shog cig ces lus so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ do'i rtse de'i dus na dge slong gan par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyi
sa khung 'dinyid yin te/ des dgra bcom pa la ngag gi las rtsub po smas nga 'a las kyi rnam bar smane ba des na 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pamyong bar gyur to/ las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas/

! de ltar de ba tha ma la bab pa'i tsho'ang 'di ltar dri da zhing mchog tu dri nga bar gyur la/ mi gtsang ba dang nag snyig la dga' bar gyur to// de nas kha ton byas pa dang/ phung po la mkhas pa dang/ khams
la mkhas pa dang/ skye mched la mkhas pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung na nA/ na ma dang la/ sa ya/ wA ya na ga ra byas pa des na nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas//
nyon mongs pa thabs cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag/de lta bas nad ltar bslar ra bu gi/ ser sna sbyang ba la da rtson par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ phyi/
sa khung soso'i skyo bor gyur pa nyis pa gang yin pa de dag 'byung bar ma 'gyur ba dang/ des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa na tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i re te/ dge slong khyed kyis
de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang/ sgyur/ lha ya na dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lte
'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag khyad yaradas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lta ba
rdzogs so//sdom ni/ sbrul nag dang ni zla ba dang// sA la dang ni dang/2 ldan m// gos dang ni tsi nga// na dang na gso sbyong dang// ngang nga tha mar brjod pa yin/
sbrul nag po nas bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshod dpon rnams/
wa00@#// dang dod dbon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ chu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams
tudang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur ma byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am
cad ng/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cingags pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa// na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims cha dang/ gdon dang/ stun
gsos dang/ sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na bod ma 'a tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab

kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs ston ched/ yongasasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa// rnam thos kyi bye'i skor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/ de'angs

zla snyacan 'jungs pa yo byad rnamaMs kun tu 'dzin pa/ khu lo'ang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ sdug cing 'phongs pa dang/ bkren ba dag mthong nasems snang bar byed do/

de nas des rang gi skyed mos tshal dugasar da dul gyi phung po chen po sbas te bzhag nas/ de del chags lhag par zhen bzhin du ni'o// de ga nasade nyid kyi steng du sbrel gdug de sbrul nag po chen po mgo

ba bag dug ba zha ge tu skyes so// de nas skyed mos tshal der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba dedag bltas pa tsam gyis gsod par byed d// rgyal po 'khab kyi grong khyer thog thag tu'ang che ge mo'i skyed mos tshal du song/
de dag thams cad rlag par 'gyur ro zhes sgra grag par gyur to// skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam dus mas te/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs bar de 'dul nus pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo// de nas rgyal bo gzugs can snying bo skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/
byin nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs la mgo res phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'a dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyi gtam
gyis mad dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod// yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag
par 'dzin du bcug (lang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cad ma gsung bar bzhul dus so/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag
pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das rgyal po ba de la sa 'di na skyod chos tshol ga ga mo zhig na sbrul gdug ba sgrub nag po chen bo dag gdug pa zhig mchis te// skye bo mang po rlag par bgyid lags na/ bcom/
rtsaldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang go/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can sId po bcom
ldan 'o das kyis par ma gsung bar gnang bar ra go nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ stan las langs nas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das/
pa nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gyi kha dog can ny+dzi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag
pa dag pa kye ste/ de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad snang bar byas so// bskal pa stong gi bar du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'o da zer dag kyang bkya ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la/
phog ma thag tu rab tu sem par gyur to// de nas sbrul gdug pa des ban tshun du bltas te/ su'i mthus bdag gi lus sa ma par gyur cig gu snyam pa dang/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes
bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs por brgyan ba/ dang byad ba zad bo brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ lim stong bas lhag ba'i 'od mnga' ba rin po
ba 7 cha'i ra ba 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo// mgrod ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la dad pa tsA sogs bskyed de/ dad pa 'a soms dad ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang
'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis sa 'di bsgrubs pa des na khyod sbrul gdug pa ra ltung bar byas so// de'ang da la dad pa'i sams bskyed la gter 'di la'ang sems ma/
chags par byas dang legs so// 'di nas sha' gos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar spyi lo/ do nas gang gi tsho bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs dran par mdzad pa de'i tshod dus so// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'tsho tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// khyod ni dud 'gror skyes ba la// da na nga yis ci byar med// ma lom par ni skyes zin gyis// don med dus pas ci la phan// 'di/

ni rgyal ba snying rje can// nga la dad pa 'i sems bskyed la// dud 'gro'i skye ba gnas spangs na legs// 'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul de lhung bzed kyi
nang du bcug sta/ 'od ma'i tshal du brtsams so// 'di'i skabs su rgyal po dang/ yul ma ga d+ha'i skyo bo'i tshogs kyis sprul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btul ba thos so// da nas sprul
gdug pa de rang gi lus la smad do kha 'tshos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ gnas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo sanasaM/
ring po ma lon pa na sa nyid kyis sa mas rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'i ngos/ gang du skyes/ lasu gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas sbrul gdug pa lasashi
'phos ba dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul ba khadabor skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong// de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur ba lha'i 'di snyam du sems
te bdag zhag lonanas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la khaba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon sbrul
gdugabar gyur ba 'i lha'i bu rna tshagab kor dag cing mgul pa thogs ba/ lus do shal dang sa mo dos brgyan ba/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa 'i cod panacan/ lus gur kum dang/ tam la'i
lam dang/ theg ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lta' sa tog tA la dang/ bad+ma dang/ ku mud dang/ bdadakar bo dang/ mnar ba rnams kyis zhu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i
tshul bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang ba byas nas/ datsom ldan 'das la ma tog gas gtor te/ chos ma nyan pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das gyis sngon sbrul gdug par gyur ba lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang ba zhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bodin pa bzhi rtogs par/
ba ba'agyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thog nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur ba'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon ngo nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas ka rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu thob ste/ des bden ba mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig tu brjod pa/ btsun ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang/ mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang/ rus pa la bsgral ba dang/
ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phyig dang/ bdag ltadang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni de dag la bas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis//
rgyal bos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang ma dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma brgyas// sngon gyi ma tshuna rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang
ma ba gyis lags so// yang smas pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i nge nasong lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan na khro ris 'a ga ga phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i
lam ya nga bdag gis thog/ bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs ba'i mig shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag ni sdugabasngal rgya mtsho ba rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes ba'i zhi ba'i
go 'phang thog/ che mchog dbang po ma dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'ba' med spangs pa// sud pa stod du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni dengam gleng 'dras bu yod// de nas do shal/
sa @#// 'phyang ba dgar gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgro thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang// lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song// de nas ston
smra la gdug par gyur pa'i lha 'bu de tshong ba khe ldogs phyin pa dang/ zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang/ dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang
gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal bo gzugs can snying po'i thad du song nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas te
rgyal po bslang nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po langs/ nyal te ci bye/ de nas rgyal po gnyid sad de 'od chen bo de dang lha'i bu de ma thod dgo// mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu
pas khyod su zhig ces dris so// de nar bdag ni skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul gdug pa btul te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul ba zud por skyes pa yin te/
bcom ldan 'das la'ang bdag gis bstan bkur byas nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te// da bdag ga khyod la bstan gyis/ khyod song la/ skyed mos tshal de'i phyogs ga ga mo zhig nas
gter chen po byung la bdag gi phyir bcom ldan 'das nyanathos kyi dge 'dun dang bcos pa bshos gsol te/ yon gyi rabs kyang gdon bar gsol cig/ de nas rgyal bo gzugs can snying
tha 0/bos lha 'bu la cang mi zer bar khas blangs so// de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus rgyal pos cang ma zer bas khas blangs nga rage nas de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// de nas
rgyal bo gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo yul ma ga d+ha'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang/ yul mi rnams la bsgo nas skyed mos tshal der song ste gtar byung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des
sbrul gdug par skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ daashas cher chags pa
bskyad de/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ sdug cing 'a shongs ba dang/ bkren pa rnams la snang ba'i sems bskyed pa des na sbrul gdug par skyes so/ nga 'asams dga' bar byas
pa des ni lha'i nang du skyes so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi blangs bdes ni bden ba
mthong bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po de bas na ser sna sngang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ ci nas sbrul gdug par gyur ba'i nyes pa de lta du dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ de nyid lha'i khur
sazi@#/ gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar rgyalapon bo khyod kyis bslab par bya// de nas rgyal bo gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
mngon bar bstod de rjes su ya ra nga nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag
slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// kazla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/
blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod spyin rnams dang/
lha ma yin rnams dang/ nan mo ba'i zhing rnams dang/ mi 'am che rnams dang lta 'ang chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu
dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang
ldan pa// na bka' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims cha dang/ gdan dang/ snyun gsos dang/ sman rdzong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa ni/ rgyal
ba bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med dras sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod par drom rje zhing ba zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las rlung
ma blangs te/ de da dad ldan cig tu lci zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtsa 'ang dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu/
byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa skye bo thams cad kyi mig sim bar byed pa zhig btsas so// de'ang bram khre des dka' bas rnyed pa yin te/ de la bu dang bumo
gzhan yang med nas/ de brgyud bsredes te tshor skyes nas/ de 'jig rten thams cad sam nga la khyed nga 'i phyir dran ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i med zla ba zhes btags so// de
nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong khyor thams cad du brgyud de/ bskor bas bram ze de'ang khye'u de la lhag par byams ra ra gyur te/ 'jug pa dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba dag gi tshe'ang rtag tu leg
par bsrung ba ltar byed cing 'dug go/ bram ze de'i khyim yang khyim bdag mgon ni da zas sbyin dang che ba zhig na 'dug ge/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang/
bstan nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyigasung thos nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan ba la dad pa red de/ de'ang tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
(yul bzang bor skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring bo ma lon bani chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas ga' ngos/ gang du
h+pha skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas me las shi 'phos pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa' lha yul pa zang por skyes ba dad bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur bar des
mthong ngo// de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni de dag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon/
par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'i gam mo// de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa' lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs// lus do shal dang se mo des brgyan pa// nor bu sna
tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'a cod pan can lus gur kum dang/ ta ma la 'o ma dang/ spyag ka la sogs pas byugs kha des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i mi tog ut+pal dang/ bad+ma dang/ kumu dadang
pad+ma dkar bo dang/ mnar ba rnams kyis grub bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen posaMsnang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gas gtor te/ chog mnyan/
pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugasasu chud/
nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs bar 'gyur ba de lta bu 'a chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur ba'i lha'i bus 'jage tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes
doms bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i
rgya mtsho bskams pa dang/ rus pa la bsgral ba dang/ ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang/ mtho ris dang thar ba'i sgo rnams phye ba dang/ bdag lha dang ma rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di
lta bu bdag la las kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon mtshun rnams
kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song las// shin tu ma bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod
nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba// mya ngan 'a das ba'i lam yang ba dgags thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag na sdug
bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po lha dang mes mchod nga// skye dang na dang 'chi ba'i nad sangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar
dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra sgrub la ni bskor ba
byas nas kyang// lha yis rje'i rten la ltas lha yul song// de nas ston bram zer gyur ba'i lha'i bu de tshod pa khe phyogs phyin pa dang/ zhing ba 'bru rgyalabar gyur pa dang/ dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal
ba dang/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyismad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo// dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs
'tsha ma nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du srung ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras la
zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba sad du/
mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi ngo la blta
ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ bram ze'i bu gcig pa de tsho rdung su sha nas/ de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum pa'i
ba thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo// de'i skabs su bram ze des bu gcig nga sdug cing 'bangs la snying du sdug cing yid du
'od pa dang/ bzod pa dang ldan pa dang/ mi mthun ba med pa de dur khrod du khyer nas pad bar bzhag ste/ kyi hud bu/ kyi hud bu thu bo/ kyi hud bu gcig pa zhes zer zhing 'bod de/ da
nye du rnams kyis de ltar gcug kyang bslad ma nus nas/ de lA dang/ chan lag dang/ bya rgod dang/ wa rnams kyis ni bskor/ bud med sku bshig pa dag dang ni 'grogs/ skye bo mang pos
ni ba lta zhing 'dug go/ de nas de'i bu ltar skyes bas/ pa sa sngags 'don ba mthong nas/ snying rjes steng bskyod de/ pa'i mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid drang srong gi cha lugs su sprul nas//
dur khrod kyi 'dab tu dka' thub la byed cing 'a dug go/ de nas bram ze des/ drang srong de la dris ba/ drang srong chen po khyod dka' thub 'dusazhig sgrub/ drang srong gis smas pa/ ngani rgyal srid

sgrub ste/ nga'i gsar gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis sras ba/ nyim dang zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor lo byas la/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis na mdun nas 'dren to/ shing rta de la nga zhon
zhing sa chen po 'di bskor bar 'dod do// bram zes smras pa de gal te lo brgya tham ba'i bar// rgyun du dka' thub spyod byas te// dka' thub mchog gis spyad byas kyang// gnas de khyod kyis re
sa/ @#// ma 'i thob// drang srong gas nas pa// khyod kyang shi ba' 'og pa mchog tu mnam 'di ma gtsang ba'i ri shang 'dra bar gyur ba 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ bram zes smras pa// sdug/
pa'i bu gcig pa sha sta de sgrub pa// drang srong gis sbas pa gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bur// rgyun du duba'i las byas kyang// bu de khyod kyisaram thob// khyod ni dus kyang ci la phan// de nas
bram ze de drang srong gatshig bdon no snyam nas dad pa skyes so// dad pa skyes nas khyod su zhig ces byas so// de nas drang srong gi cha lugs de ma smad bar byas nas/ rang gi cha lugs su 'dugs pa la
lcas pa/ ba dag ni khyod kyi bu gcig pa de yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir
'der 'ongs so// yab khyod tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su bzhud cig dang/ khyod kyang 'khor ba las 'dul bar 'gyur yang sad do// de nas bram ze des shi ba'i rjes bu bor nas/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de
la 'bags ba'i bden pa bzhi rtogs bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bram ze des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po rti shu shesardo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun
ba00du zhugs ba'i 'bras bu thob go des mtho bar gyur pa thob cing yod pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te song ngo// de nas
dag grong dag the tshom skyes te/ tha tsam rams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar ba'i mya ngan bsal nas bdenapa mthong ba la yang
bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag slong dag da ltar 'das bden pa mthong nas/ pha yongs subaskyabs pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'dis ni 'das pa'i dun
na so so'i skyo po'i 'a dug pa'i tsho'i da nga gsad pa las thug pa las lan gsum bskyabs byas te/ de legs par rab tu nyon la ya de la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'das

pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA rA Na sin gzhan gyi chungam la bya ba byed pa zhig yod de/ de'i bu ni dad pa dang ldan la/ dag zhing bsam pa bzang ba ma rnams shin tu 'drang ba zhig go/ de nas re zhig na de'i
phas rkun po byas nas rgyal pos gshed ma rnams gsod cig ces bsgo'o// de nas dus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal bo la gsol nas/ srog 'dzangs pa byin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan gyi chung ma la bya ba byed pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di yin no// bya ba byed pa'i bu de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no// dgaslong rnams
@#// kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las ci zhig bgyis na des pa dang du ga'us ka bden ba mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da// yang dag par rdzog
pa' sangs rgyus 'od srungs kyi ring la gse ka dge bsan du gyur te/ skyabasasu song ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na phyir da ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to// dge slongadag de bas na 'dubyed
(thams cad mi rtag pa dang/ chos thams cad bdag med pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skadas bka' stsal nas/ dgayod de da ga dang/ lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lded dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang ya/
rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod da////sA la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/
phyug bo rnams dang/ bobrong 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong dbon rnams dang/ dadad bon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lho ma yin rnams dang/
nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ ma 'am ci rnams dang/ lta'abu chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/
wa 0 lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa 'a sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa// na bza' dang/
zhal zas dang/ gzims ra dang gdan dang/ stun gsos dang/ sman zong rnams b.ros pa// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sA la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas/
shing sA la 'a ma tog blangs te/ rtswa zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sA la'i ma tog blongs te mnyan du yod pa'i nang du song ba dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyis nam rang byas te/ dag slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyi mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de slar gshegs nas/ bu mo sa
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes bar byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang des brgyan pa/ a
stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyod de/ bcom ldan 'das la sA la'i me tog gsagator to// de
nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor bar byas te/ phyir log nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo snyam pa dang/ re zhigen de sA la'i shing la 'dzegs pa las/
lhung ste ngag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas pas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzung por skyes so// de nas re zhig na lus dang gzhal med khangs la'i me tog gis brgyan te/
lha'i 'dun sa'i nad du song ngo// de'i tshe lha' rab ng po brgya byin yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing/
'dug pa las lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'abu mo lus dang gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba de ma shong ngo// mthong nas kyang de la tshigs su bcad de/
wA mas pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis lus ma dog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad+maut+pal lta bur gyur// 'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od byung 'di dag ci las gyur// ciya phyir khyod kyi
bzhin mdog bad rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta buragyur// las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong gyur 'din lha mo khyod kyis bdag la stsos// lha mos sbas pa/ mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yi//
mi yi nyi ma nyan thos bcas// sA la'i me tog rdul med pa// bzang po dag gis legs par gtor// las dag de 'dra byas pa'i phyir// bdag ni lhag bar mngon du mdzes// bzhin ra dog
'a/ pad+ma zla ba ltar// rnam dag 'od ldan bstan sdug/ brgya byin gyis sbas pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing// nyes pa thams cad rnam pas pa// mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la
khyod kyis sa bon btab// bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma// bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab
yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba// gser mtshog bung bo lta bur mdangs dkar de la su ma mchod// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum gyi
bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas me las shi 'phos pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang bor skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong dogo/ de nas lha'akhyi mo da 'ad snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ban bdag ga ma yin
gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo rna chagadub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo des brgyan pa// nor
bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan nga 'a cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang/ tam la'i lo ma dang/ sgrig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du mas g.yog byas nas de nyid
kyi mtshan mo sA la'am tog gi gzhal med khang de nyid dang bas dus bcom ldan 'das kyicad du song ngo// de nas bcom ldan das la me tog gas gtor te// chos
= mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi smanasar 'dag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'abumodi'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas//
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogasabar 'gyur ba de lta bu 'anyis bstan te/ spos nas lha'i bu mo des 'jage tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ya shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang/
@# rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang/ dan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang/ bdag lha dang ma rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu n bdag la phas kyang na
bgyis/ mas kyang ma bas/ rgyal pos kyang ma bas/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nad ma deng gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyas kyang ma bgyis/
dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa// nyes ba mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan
mgo se 'gro ba bya/ mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de la de nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug ngasngal rgya mtsho
rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// ma mchog dbang po ma dang lcas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chiba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar deka' ba yi// thub
pa khyodan deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cung zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshalanas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang// lha yi 'jig rten la
ltas lha yul song/ Da nas lha bumo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang/ zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang/ dpa' bo g.yul las rgyalapo dang/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor
pa gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa khyed kyis radag gnas su song ngo// dag slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mnyel bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gas bcom
ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byang ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang me tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum ma mjed kyi ba dag
po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhibcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi mjed kyi bdag
kho tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// bu mo gang gis lam khar me tog gis gtor ba de khyod kyi
mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// de nad la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shes/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang bor skyes nas/ de pa'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan
nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo// dge slong dag de bas na 'ad ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti byago/ bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o/
ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dgo slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal nas/ dag slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 4 [ ] bam po bcugasum pa//
(dung la ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi ma rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams
dang/ dodadapon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am cu rnams dang/ lto 'phya chen po rnams
kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar bya/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ rgyudang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dad/ nam kha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po rnams
kyis mchod cingashes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan ba/ na bza' dar zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ snyan zong rnams
brnyes pa// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na ston cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na
rgyal bo gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'aring la 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ kho ligs bdad/ skye bo dang ma mang pos gang ba dang/ rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zha ba dang/
'khrug pa dang/ nang 'khrug dang/ chom rkun dang/ mug dang 2 nadanams med pa dang/ 'bras sa lu dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ba glang dang/ ma hadang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing
tsar mdakrugs la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal bo gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang
bcas te dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thod du 'gro'o/ de nas rgyal bo gzugs can snying po phyi zhag na dpyad kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ shing ljon pa rnams ma tog rgyas la/ ngang pa dang//
khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ ne tso dang/ ri snyogs dang/ khu byug dang/ shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod na skyed mos tshal gyi sa'i btsun mo dam pa dang/
btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dod nas/ der datsun mo'i 'a khor gyis/ rgyal po la gsol pa// lha bdag cag gdugs gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi ba'i rngo mi thogasan/
lhabatsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i nechod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar ci gnang/ 'on tang bdag cag gas de la rgyun du mar me dang/ bdug pa
dang/ me tog dang/ spos dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gas bkur sti bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de nas re zhig na rgyal po
gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag la dbu skra dang sen mo stsal du gsol/ 'on tang bdag gis mches brang 'khor dud bzhin gshegs pa'i/
mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu sku dang sen mo byin nas rgyal bo gzugs can snying po btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pas
btsun mo'i 'khor gyi ched du bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsros nas de la btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mar me dang/ bdug pa/
dod / ma tog dang gros dang/ ma tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis kyang mchod pa byed do// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lca sprin
gyis rbad do/ yab sa dang ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa bsad nas rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'atshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sbyin par bya ba'i chos thams cad bcad de/ su'ang
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bkur sti ma byed gces khrims kyang bcas so// de nas gong gtsAtshes bco lnga la skabs 'byed ba'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i
mchod rten de la su phyag bdar byed pa 'am/ mar ma dang/ bdug pa dang/ ma tog 'bul ba med de// de nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbu sku dang sen mo'i mchod rten de de lta bur gyur pa'i ng
mthong/ rgyal po gzugs can skyid po yang dran nas snying re rje skad du ngu zhing kyi hud chos dang ldan ba'i rgyal bo dang bral bas bdag cag bsod nams las 'grabs so zhes 'dzin to// de'i nang/
nas btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsdos te sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas/ dgu skya dang sen mo'i mchodarten la phyag bdar byas te mar me 'phreng ba dngar
de nas re zhig na rgyal bo ma skyes dgra khang ba ba tshugs pa'i snying du byung ste/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas 'di ci zhog ces dris pa dang/ re zhig na gzhan zhig gso dpal ldan mas da bu sku
dang sen mo'amachod rten la mar me 'a brang ba dngar ba lags so zhus byas so// de nas dpal ldan 'bakug rgyu ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' bcag ces rmas na/
de na re ba dag gis khyod kyi bka' ba/tu lags kyang// bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal bo gzugs can snying po'ibika' ma bcagago zhes zer ro// de nas de khros nas 'khor lo 'di
te bsad do// de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang bor skyes so// de'i tshe lha'i mdun ma zhig kyang 'dus nas/ lha'i bu mo dang la

ldan ma lha' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig pa dang ldan pa de lta'i mdun ma'i nang du song ngo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis snang ba chen po de dang lha'i 'od dbag
tshadagacig ba mthong nas dris pa/ ci'iphyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag nga 'a gsararadra pad+maut+pal lta bur gyur// 'dan lus dang la mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag rtsa las gyur
ci yaphyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad+ma rgyas 'dra gsar mdog lta bur gyur// las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smos// lha mos sa ngo/ 'jig rten gsum
mgon 'gro ba'i sgron gcig bu// mtshan mchog rnams kyis byugapa'i sangs rgyas mthong// mchog nyon mongs mun ba sel ba la// mun pa sel ba'amar ma yon du phul// zla ba'i 'od zer/
ba00 mchog dang 'dra ba 'a 'od// mthong nas thub la snying nas dad pa bskyed// 'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis// ston pa smra ba'i mchog la phyag kyang bgyis// las dag de 'dra byas
pa'i phyir// bdag na lhag par ma donodumadzes// bzhan mdog pad+ma zla ba ltar// rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rgya ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing// nyes ba thams
cad rnam spangs pa/ mtho ris lhag par skye ba'i phyir// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan m// bud med mchog rnams kyis na gang
la bkur sgyu byas pa ni sadas so bad+ma rgyas pa'i 'i dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyanamanga' ga gser mchog phung bo lta bur mdangs dkar de la su ma mchod/ lha'abu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas
nga po ma lon ba ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gas skyes snyam mo// de nas ma las shi 'phos ba dang/ su ma su
rtsa gsum bal yul bzang bor rgyas ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur bar des mthong ngo// de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di sumadu sems te/ bdag zhag
lon nas gzedabcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro 'osnyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo dpal
pha dau@#// ldan m lha'i 'od kyi snang bas gang ba des de nyid kyi mtshan mo ma tog ut+pal dang pad+ma dang/ ku mud dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ mnar ba rnams kyis thu bo bkang ste/
rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ sa mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/
danas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo dpa la ldan ma'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rangabazhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden ba bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta
khub ris bstan te/ de zos nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyishu yushes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'dras bu thob ste/ des bden pa
[ ]mthong nas/ dga' ba 'a ga lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bsnyams pa dang/ rus pa'i lo bsgral ba dang/ ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad
ba ba dang/ mtho sa dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang/ bdag lha dang ma rnams kyi nang du nga zhag pa 'di lta bu nage dag la bas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma dgyis//
lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshog sa rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshuna rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dag sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang mkhagyis lags so//
mang snus ba/ nyes pa zad por ldan pa'i ngan song las/ shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// khasodanams rab ldan mcho rasi 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gi thob//
bdag gi se de ring nyes pa spungs pa'i moge/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ bdagan sdug bsngal rgya mtshos rol rgal/ 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog
dbang po sa dang lha sa ma chod pa// rgyadang na dang 'chi ba'i nad stas pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mgong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba
dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs ka sa la na phyag 'tshal nas// dgra zub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang// lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song// de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma tshong
pa khe sogs ni dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang/ dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor nga gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du

'ongs pa'i 'a byor pa nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song go/ dge slong dag ni grodadang tho rangs ma nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la/ gnas te/ de dag gas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung
ba mthong do/ mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus po// bcom ldan 'das kyi logs/ mdang sum ma mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po/
brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyod pa bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da// dge slong dag ma mared kya
bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba band la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ rgyal po gzugs can sAng po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas
rang gi srog dang bsdos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tanarjes su dran nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dad san mo'i mchod rten la mar ma'i 'phreng ba dngar nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas
bsad de/ de nga la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa la yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum pa'i smad du 'ongs te ngas de las bstan nas bden pa mthong bar
gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur su bgo/ bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// ston ba la bkur lta byas/
blamar byas/ ri mor sa mchod pa byas nasabarten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi
rangs to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// Shagos zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la! rgyal bo rnams dang/ blon po chen bo rnams dang/
mtsha phyug po rnams dang/ bo brad 'a khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dbon rnams dang/ lho rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha'
ldid rnams dang/ mi 'am cu rnams dang/ lta 'a bya chen po rnams kyis bkur su byas/ bla mar byas/ rimor byas/ mdo ba byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod spyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam
mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po rnams kyis mchodacing shes ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan po/ nabaza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims
chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ sman thong rnams pas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ban ba zhugs so// de nas gang gatshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs ba dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul te/ mthar
gyis gsar bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'dasakyi bstan pa la phul ba de'i tsho/ de'i blo skyes ba/ ma la bdag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing/ bsod nams dag byed pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba cayod
kyis/ bdag gas skye bo dbul po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dad pa sdud de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bstan
ma bya// bkuracagro/ de ltar byas pa dang bdag gis skya bo mang bo lab dman btags par 'gyur la/ bsod nams mang bo'ang skyed bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas khyim
bdag mgon med zas ga gyis lo rab sams pa de rgyal ba la gsol nas/ rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas ba'i bosrang 'a khor gyi/
mi khyed rnams nyon cig// de nas zhag bdun na khyim bdag mgon med bras sbyin gyis de bzhin gshegs ba'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir glang bo che la zhon te dad pa sdud par 'a dod kyis/ khyed gang
gis ji tsam yongs su gtang bar bya ba de yongs su gtang bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o// de nas re zhig na zhag bdun lon pa dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin glang po che la zhon te/ de
sbyob zhinam/ shegs pa la nyan thos rnams kyi bu'i dad pa sdud bag la zhugs te/ der gang dag la ji tsam bdog pa de dag de tsam sbyin par byed do// kha cig ni mgul rgyu deshal sbyin par byed/ kha
cig na gdu bu sbyin par byed/ 'a cage ni dung rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gsar gyi'i byung ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni sor gdub kyi rgyun sbyin par byed/ kha cage ni'u togo ga do shal spyan
la bar byed/ kha cig na khosar sbyin par byed/ khacig ni dngul sbyin par byed/ kha cigan than zho'i brgyad cha tsam yod sbyin par byed do// khyim bdag de'ang gzhan la ban gdags pa'i phyir len
'tsha bar byed do// de nas re zhig na bud med shan tu dbul mo zhig gis shu thang ste/ zla ba gsum gyis ras yug cig rnyed nas/ des ras de gyon te/ srang du zhugs pa dang/ des khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin dung 'bud cing ja blum rdung bzhin du rgyung nas 'ongs pa mthong nas/ des dag bsnyen zhig la dris pa// cis khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ste/ gter
sa'i 'og tu sbas pa rnams kyang mthong ni/ 'i phyir 'di ga zhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing skor bar byed ces byas ba dang/ dge bsnyenaden re/ gzhan la phan gdags ba phyi'i/ gang dag
bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ma nus pa de dag la don du bka' dogs bar byed de/ ci nas mang por bsdongs te bcom ldan 'das la dbul du gzhug
go zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo dabloskyas pa/ 'o na bdag ni bsod namasam byas pa yin/ bdag gcig dus bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dunadang bcas pa bshos gsol ba'i mthu
bdag la med kyis/ bdagags 'di la cung zad dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas bdag 'di la ci bdog cis bltas na ras yug gcig ma gtogs kha ga zhanaci'ang ma mthong ste
des bsams pa// gal te bdag 'di na 'dug bazhin du ras 'di phul na na bdag gcer bur 'byung gi/ bdag khang thog tu song la ras dara'i snyam mo// de nas de khang thog tu song nas rang
gi lus las sa bud de/ khyim bdag mgon mud khros sprin gyi steng du bor ba dang/ khyim bdag des kyang 'phrogs te/ 'as khang thog nas bor ba las na 'di la nor da
las medagor ma chag snyam nas/ radagi g.yog rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed ras 'odi sus bor ltos shas ces byas nas/ de dag gas bltas pa dang/ rezhig nabu mojug tshog pur 'dug ba
mthong// de nas de dag gis sa pa// de na re bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan brjod pa bdag gis thos nas dbul ba' 'jiges pas skrag ste/ bdag gis gos rnyed bde de bzhin gshegs pa la sog
'a kha dge slong gi de ga 'i dun la yul la zhes zer ro// de nas de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bu mo de

shul gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogos bskon to// de nas de tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ skyes ma thag tu lha'abudang lha'i bu mo gzhan su la'ang med pa de lta
bu'agos dag de la byung ngo// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas sha 'apos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam
! mo rnade nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la ras phul bar des mthong ngo// de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu
mamo rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs ba/lus de shal dang sa mo des brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'icod pan can/ lus gur kum dang/ ton lab la ma dad/ sgrig

ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dung/ man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar
byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor ti/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon nas 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo'i bsam/
pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa banagon par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bastan te/ de thos nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i
lha'i bu mos 'ge tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjesabcomanas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ ngos bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshale lan gsum du brjod du/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i mtsho bskams pa dang/ rus pa'i la bsgral ba da/ ngan songag sgo rnams bcad pa dang/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba
dang/ bdag lha dang ma rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang m bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal bos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen
mas/ @#/ gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dag sbyong dad bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma khagyis lags so// yang smras pa// nyes pa mang poraldan
pa'i n gnas ong las/ shin tu ma bzad khyod kyimathu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gisade ring nyes pa spangs ba'i/
mig/shin tu rnam dag khyod la brtenanas thob/ khadag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la rol bskul// 'phags pa dgyes ba'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// ma mchog dbang po ma dang lhas mchod pa// skye
dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad sngangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub khyod nadong mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag
blo'atshal nas// dgra zub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang/ lha ya'ajig rten la ltas lha yul song// de nas ston sa 'dul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo de tshong pa kha phyogs ne pa dang/ zhing pa 'bru
rgyal bar gyur pa dang/ dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang ga gnas

su song ngo// dag slong dgan srod dang tho rangs ma nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed ba la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang the tsomaskyes te/
lan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci la bas/ mdang gsum ma na rjod kyi bdag kho tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan
'das la blta ba'i slad du mas lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i de bang bo brgya byone nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba/
bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin te/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de/ khyim bdag mgonamed zas sbyin dad pa sdud par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum ba'i lha yul/
bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga' thod du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang ga gnas su song ngo// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/
sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun rnams la bkur sti bya'o// bkur stamid par mi bya'o// dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal/
nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// ne tso zhes byab na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/
blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dong/ tshod dpon rnams dang/ ded dbon rnams dang/ lha rnams dad/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/
lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' ldade rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa
byas te/ lha dang/ gludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa// nabazo' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzigs cha dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gasos dang/ sman brong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
waM mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul khyim bdag mgon med khrus sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying
zla po rgyal po khyad de/ de'i de la 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ la lags pa dang/ skye bodang ma mang pos gang ba dang/ rtsod ba dang/ 'thab pa zha ba dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ nang
'khrug dang/ chom rkun dang/ mu ge dang/ nad rnams med pa dang/ 'bras sA lu dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ba glang dang/ mahe dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tshe mdakrugs lag
bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// rgyal po de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dag zhinge bsam pa bzang ba dang/ bdag la banapa dang/ gzhan la phanab la zhugs te/ gang
rje cha ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa che ba/ skye dgu la byams ba zhig go/ de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/ lag ba la oM tshugs bcas nas/ sems
khongs su chud ri 'dug go/ de dus blon po rnams kyis sbas ba/ ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ rgyal bos sas pa// das bcom ldan 'das rang zhig ma mthong ngo// ngas bde bar gshag/
ba ring zhig ma mthong ngo// nga ni bcom ldan 'das mthod bar 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/ lha'asnyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'a das pas rgyal
po gzugs can sang bo smin pa gsan to// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisan ma mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su ma chud pa
ci'ang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs ba/ srung ba gag pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med ba/
