gnyis su ma gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa// bslab ba gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas
ba/ chu bo ba ni las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan ba/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa las/
gru ma 'jigs ba/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa// yan lag lnga rnam par sbyangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa khan
lag drug dang ldan pa// pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs ba/ rtag tu gnas bar bya ba drug la gnas ba/ byang chub yan lag bdun gyi ma tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag
brgyad pa ston da/ mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas ba/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas kho/ brgya phrag bcu
ba la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi spunagyis 'jig rtenal gzigs te/ sun rgud/ su ni/
ra/ su ni 'phongs shing 'dug/ sun nyamadabar gyur/ su ni geganodab dang ldan/ sun 'phongs ba dang/ nyam ngab dang/ gnod pa dang ldan/ sunangan song du gzhol/ su ni ngen
sod du 'bab/ su nangan song du bab/ su na ngas nasong nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang/ thor ba dang/ 'bras bu la gzhag bar bya// su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du byingab las lag nas drod
! bar bya/ sun 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su na dgo ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyid pa las bskyod bar bya/ sun
wa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su snyan par bya/ sun yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes ga bregs pa 'jug go/ 'dir sus pa/ rgyu
mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan
'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zan nas/ chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsams
nas ljongs rgyu zhing mthar gyis gshegs pa las/ nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang/ nags khrod de na ne tso ma skad shes pa zhig gnas/ des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig
nas mthong// de nas shin tu 'dres par song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa 'gas so legs so/
bdag la phan gdags su gsol/ nags khrod 'ad kho nar gshegs dgongs gdab par gsol zhes byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ne tso de la phan gdags nga 'i phyire shing
gangal natso gnas pa de'i drud du rtswa'i gdan bting nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// nyan thos chen po rnams ni shing gzhan dgag drung du 'khod do// de nas na tsos bcom ldan
'dus dang nyan thos rnams la mi 'am/ mi ma yin ba 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'a ma/ yi dgas sam/ gcan gzan gnod pa byed du dogs te/ mtshan
thog thag nags khrod da na pan tshun skyor bar byed do// de nas nam nangs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzod pa gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dud
'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa lags pas/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i rgyu ci'ang ma mchis na bzod par mdzad du gsol/ de lta lags kyis kyang bdag sngon du mchis te/ rgyal po
gzugs can snying bo la bcom ldan 'das gshegs so nas sbran par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ltar gyis shago/ de nas re zhig na de ba com ldan 'das kyi don du
mas te/ mthar gyis rgyal bo'i thod du phyin to// de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snyade po na'ong babrangs kyisnyingan bud med 'ba' zhig dang sel snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de//
de nas ne tso ma skad shes pa des/ rgyal po la smras pa/ kye rgyal bo khyod mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'adus nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas ba khyod kyi yul dugshegs lags kyis/
lha khyod kyis bshes sta gon mdzad pa'i rigs so zhes byas so// de nas rgyal po shin tu rings par khang bzang gi steng nas babs nas blon po chen po'i tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ bcom ldan
'dus kyi gdan rnams bshams nas/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rnams dang/ gdug pa dang/ sros dang/ ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsu'o// da nas bcom
ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas nang du spyan drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas so// de nas na tso de 'disnyam du sems te/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gi yon tan yin nosnyam du rig nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bskyes
nas/ rgyal po'i mdun logs su phan tshun du lding bu las khras khyer te bsad do// bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyod de shi bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa 'a lha yul bzang por skyes so//
lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring bo ma lon pan chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gas sa snyam mo// de nas dud
'gro las shi 'phos ba dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur ba des mthong da// de nas ston na tsor gyur ba'i 'du 'di
snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag 'don nas gzod bcom ldan 'das bltaba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cham yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'adas la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/
de nas sngonanatsor gyur ba'i lha'i bu rna cha gdubakor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa// lus do shal dang sa mo des brgyan pa// nor bu rin po che sA tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'acod/
pan can/ lus gur kum dang/ tam la'i lo ma dang/ sbrag ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+madakar po dang/ man/
ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos ma nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'dasakyi
spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sngonan por gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi/
rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ di thos nas sngon na tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon ngo nyi'u ya shis rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras//
bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchima'i rgya mtshob skams pa dang/ rus pa la bsgral
ba dang/ ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang/ mtho ris dang thar ba'i sgo rnams bya ba dang/ bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nad du bzhug pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phasakyang m bgyis/ masakyang
ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang m bgyis/ ston gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang
smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shan tu ma bzad khyod kyi mthu yasebacad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gas
thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtshopa rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob//
ma mchog dbang po ma dang lhas mchod pa// skya dang na dang 'chi ba'i nad sangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal
'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ btud cing zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang// lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song// de nas sngonane tsor gyur pa'i
lha'i bu de tshong pa kho sogs phyin pa dang/ zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang/ dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang/ nadapa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan
'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo// dge slong dag nasrod dang tho rangs ma nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed ba la gnas te/ dedag gis bcon ldan 'das
gyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ca lags/ mdad sum
mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbade bo brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
pa/ dag slong dag ma mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzha nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// na tsagang gis nga nags khrod der
nub mo'i dgongs ma la la spyan drangs pa de khyed kyis de mthong ngam/ dag slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dge slong dag ni tso de ni shinos sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin no// dag slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa sngon na tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyi
na des natsor skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyisan des lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ sngon na tsor gyur ba'i lha'i bus
tshogs rnyedacaderkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sngonane tsor gyur ba'i lha'i bus las byas shing
ba sogs ba de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dag slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa' khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur/ chu'i
khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlud gi khams la rnam par smin bar mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang ma dag ba byas shing bsags pa rnams na zin pa'i phung bo dang/ khams dang/ skya
mchod rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag ga les rnams ni// bskul ba brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin
par 'gyur// dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang bo 'di nyid la skyo dgu'i tsholo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs ba/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wArA ts+tshasan rtan cing bzhugs so// de nas re zhig na dan dgo bsnyen cig 'dug pa des bslab pa lhod par byas
te/ las de'i rnam par smin pa sanani tshor skyes so// ngal sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so// des bslab pa'i gzhi lhag ma rnams bsrungs ba des na bden pa mthong bar gyur skor/
ba da kya da ga slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa 'ang gcig tu nges pa ra gnag bar 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba
[A]] rnams ni rnam par smin pa 'dagacig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas nalas gcig tu nges par
gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkarab rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// kho ta zhes bya bani/ sangs
zlo rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi ma rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang
zla lca rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding+ge rnams dang/ mi 'am cu rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen bo rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri
mor dus/ mchod pa byas te/ lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen bo rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
wa[4, ]sangs rgyas ba com ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan dang/ nag khra' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims ra dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ sman drong rnan ga brnyes pa//
nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas ba rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas par dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// de nas khyim Mbadag mgon ni da zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po
gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal bo la rgyal bar gyur cig/ sku tshe ring bar shog cig/ ces bstod nas gsol ba btab pa// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag
gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhige tu ma mthong/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mi thong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so// bad gan bcom ldan 'das na bong bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so//
denas rgyal pos/ khyim bdag mgon med khras sbyin la sa ra// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang du dbyar gnas par bzhed pa khyod kyis ci gros/ mgon med ngas sbyin gyis
smras ba/ b+ha bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par dam bzhus so zhes thos lags so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang/ khyim bdag mgon
mod zas sbyin la sogs pa kho brang 'khor gyi mi dang/ yul mi dang/ blon po rnams kyis mi zhig pho nyas bkug ste/ kye mi khyod tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la
der bun nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol/ bdag cag gi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam da ba nyung ngan//
bskyod pa yang dag/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mama' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/ 'di skad du btsun pa ko sa
la'i rgyal po dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring po zhig tu ma mthong
sgo bas/ bdag cagan ba ma ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so// bdag cagan bcom ldan 'das mthong r 'al na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mnyan
yod par gshegs su gsol zhes ma'o zhes gsolatsag ces bsgo'o// de nas medis ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal dang/ blon po dang/ pho brang 'khor rgya ma dang/ yul ma thams
kyis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/ rgyal bo'akhab du song nas/ mthar gyis so ngasong ba las/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du phyin to// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad du bltas
zla ]nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der songs phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun mkhyen nga ra
mtshan mdzad du gso la/ kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang/ mnyan du yod ba na gnas pa 'pho brang 'khor gyi ma rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
'dis gnod ba chudang ma/ nyam nga bachung ngas/ bsod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam
zhes mchi'o// 'di skad du bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ring mo zhig tum thongs/ bdag cagan bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan
'das mthong bar 'tshalan/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan ' das mnyan du yod par gshegs gsol zhes kyang mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nga/ kye gal te/
nga rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'gror ster na 'gro bar bya'o// de nas pho nya des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das gshegs par rgyal bo gzugs can snying pos dad pa stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs sugasol zhes bstsal to// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mgasung bas gnang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'adas dbyar zla gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas/ chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzong
bsnams nas/ nam rang 'a khor mang po dag dang mnyan du yod ba logs su chas te gshegs so// po nya' dngashang rta la zhon te chas so// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das zhabs kyis gshegs pa mthong nas/ shing rta las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'a di/daces gsol to//
tshugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi shing rta ba com ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdza'aphrul rkang pa shing rta dang// yang dag rtsol lang gnas/
pa nas/ nyon mongs tsher mas masnyad par// sastong kun tu rgyu bar byed// pho nyas smras pa// bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang bdag la phan gdags
kha dang/ thugs rtse ba'i slad du bshes su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das po nya la phan gdags pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta'istong du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yod/
rta la bcings bzhin du mnyan du yod par khyon nas/ phonyas kyang rgyal po la sbran to// de nas rgyal bo dang/ blonapo dang/ bo brad 'khor rgya mo deng/ yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das

bsu nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan mo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du 'khod do// pho nya de na tshe chung ste/ chos thos pa'i 'og tude nyid kyi mtshan mo shoste/ de shi nas sum cu rtsagasum/
wa pa'i lha yul bzang bor skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas rade bo ma len pan chos nyid kyis sems rnam ba gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas sha' pos/ gang du skyes/ lasagang/
gas skyes snyam mo// de nas mkhas shi 'phos pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo// de nas sngon
pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nasagazod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la
blta ba'i phyir 'a gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon bo skur gyur ba'i lha 'bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul la thogs pa/ 'us do shal dang se mo des brgyan pa// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis
btsan ba'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang/ tam la' lam dang/ sbrag ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang/ kumu da dang/ bad+ma dad/ pad+madakar
go dang/ man+da ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyaladang/ khams dang/ rangabazhin thugs su chud nas 'phags ba'i
ma @#// bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshos bstan te/ de shes nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo
rdzas bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'o bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i skye
mtsho bskams pa dang/ rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang/ ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad ba dang/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams bya ba dang/ bdag lha dang ma rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di
lta bu n bdag la las kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma brgyas/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi
mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang sus nga// nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shan tu ma bzad khyod kyi me
yi sa bcad/ bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba bye// mya ngan 'das pa 'a 'am yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de dang nyes pa spangs pa'i mig shin tu rnam dag khyod la brtenanas
@# thob/ bdag na sdug bsngal rgya mtshong ngol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes ba'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// ma mchog dbang po ma deng lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'amed spangs nga// srang ]
mkhas pa stod du mthong bar dka' ba gi/ thub ba khyod na ded mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ dgra thub la ni bskor
ba byas nas kyang// lha ya 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song// de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa kha sogs phyin pa dang/ zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang/ dba' bo g.yul las
rgyal ba dang/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhan du 'byor ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po
gsal rgyal khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas namanangs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi
bdag botshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyongab ban bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa/ rgyal po
chen po ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyongab bzha nga la bltaba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ khyod kyi po tade nga la sems dga' ba gyur nas/ gshi
phyu sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga 'a thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la ches bstan nas bden ba mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo// de nas/
rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ kye ma sangs rgyas kyi ma chos/ kyi ma dge 'dun 'di dag la nichud du zhigabyas kyang rnam par sman pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras so//
de nas ko sa la'any+tsal bo gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
stan las langs te song bo/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dag slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dag slong dag 'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs
rgyas mchog tu gdags ba dang/ chos mchog tu gdags pa dang/ dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o// sangs rgyas mchog ga dug dgas po gang zhe na/ sems can rkangamed rnams sam/
( rkang gnyis rnams sam/ rkang bzhi rnams sam/ rkangan sa rnams sam/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs can m yin pa rnams sam/ 'dushes can rnams sa// 'du
( shis can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes yod pa'i ng ma yin/ 'du shos re da pa'i ng ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag gnang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
I rdzogs pa la sangs rgyas mchog yin par bstan to// sangs rgyas la mngon bar dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba
0/de ngag no rnam par smin pa 'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur ba rnams sam/ mi rnams kyin ng du mar gyur ba rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'du ni
sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// mos mgo tu gdags ba gang zhen/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nangan na 'dod
chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par bastan to// chos la mngon par dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par draga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon nga ra dga' ba de dag
gi ni rnam par smin nga 'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mi'i gyur pa rnams kyi chog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni chos mchog tu
gdags pa zhes bya'o/ doga'adun tshog dugadags pa gang zhe na/ tshogs sam/ 'dus pa 'am/ mang bo 'am/ 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nangan ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
dgra bcom pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la mchog yin par bstan te/ dge 'dun la mngon bar dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dgan mchog la mngon par dga'ob yin te/ mchog la mngon par
dga' ba de dag gni rnam par smin pa'i ng lha rnams kyi nad du lhor gyur ba rnams sam/ ma rnams kyi nang du mar gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu gyur par shes bar bya ste/ 'ad
pha @#// na de ga 'a dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
pal mngon bar bstod do///bam po bcu bzhi ba// ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po//
rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mo rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnamA
'ji dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ ma 'am rnams dang/ lce 'phya chen po rnams kyis bkur ma byas blamar byas/ tshor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sman dang/
lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po rnams kyis mchod cingashes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang/
zhal zas dang/ gzems cha dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ snyan bong rnams barnyes pa// nathos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa kos la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ nag
khrod cig tu byon pa dang/ nags khrod den ma he khyu chen po dang/ ma pa'i rdzo lta brgya 'khod do// de nas re zhig na de'i nadan ma hi stobs dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/
mi gzhan dag gi dritshoran ci bzhi rgyag bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so// de nas ma 'a rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dunadad bcas pa//
thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo// de nas de dag gces skad chen por bos te/ bam ldan 'das 'di neg he ma rungs nga mchis kyis hu'u 'dir mi ba/ shegs su gsol zhes byas so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kyis 'dir dus la bab par shes kyis byed snying ma chung zhug/ de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thag ring bo zhig nas mthong ba dang/ dra ma
ldang du gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der brgyugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyi mdun 'dogs su seng ge ral pa/ g.yengs pa lnga sprul de glo g.yas g.yon dun chen po lha
stsal to// stong du ni lcags kyi pha bong chen po zhig sprul te// de nas ma he des phyogs kun tu 'jigs ba chen po mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs byed du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
nangos la rtses bldags nas/ zhum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bltas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de la des brda dra da nga 'a skad du bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thamasacad
mi rtag pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum bstan nas/ tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de de thosanas ngus so// de nas bcom/
sa @#// ldan 'adas kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes ba la// da ni nga yis ci byar yod// gakhom par ni skyo su zin gyis// donatshad dus
pas ci la phan// 'dare na rgyal ba snying rje can// nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la// dud 'gro'i skyo gnas spangs na legs// 'on kyang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas ma he ma rungs pa des/
rang gi lus la smad de/ kha 'tshos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags rnams ni ma'i drod che bas de skyon par shi/ sum cu rtsa gsum bar lha yul bzang por skyes so//
'a lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring bo ma len pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum bar 'gyur te/ gang nasasha' pos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gas skyes snyam mo//
de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang bor skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo// de nas sngon ma
har gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag nag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag zhag ma len par bcom ldan
'das la bal ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon ma hor gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnachagadung kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa// lus dongashal dngas mo des brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che/
sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang/ tam la' na dang/ ga ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/
ku mud dang/ pad+ma dkar bo dang/ man+tar ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ nags khrodade dgazims cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'a ma togagis gtor
te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom 'an 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis ston n hor gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/
rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu chos bstanate/ de thos nas sngonamahar gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo
mthon po nyi'u ye shes rdo rjes bcos nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden ba mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum dubarjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskamos ra dang/ rus pa'il bsgral ba dang/ ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang/ mtho ris dang shar nga 'i sgo rnams phye ba dang/ bdug
lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis (masakyad ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen
gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bas/ sngon gyi tshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang m gyis lags so// yang smras pa//
nyos pa mang bor ldan ng 'a ngan song las// shin tu ma bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldanema'os 'gro ba pa// mya ngan 'das ba'i lam yang bdag gis thob//
bdag gis de 'di nyis pa sbyangs ba'i mig shan tu rnam dag khyod la brtan nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhib 'gi 'dang
thob// mi mchog dbang po ma deng lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs nga// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas/
dongashal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ btud cinganabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang/ lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song// de nas sngon ma
har gyur ba'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe sogs phyin pa dang/ zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang/ dngo' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor ba gang
gas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor ba de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo// de nas ma he rdza de dag gis snang ba chen po de mthong ngo/ de mthong nas de tshom skyes te/ sangs
bab/ rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus du// bcom ldan 'das ma dang sum bcom ldan 'dasakyi khrod du mas te/ lha'i 'od kyis snang bar bgyid pa de su zhige lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal nga/ khyed kyi ma he de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsagasum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ nga mdang sum nga'i thod du'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bstan te/
bden pa mthong ba gyur nas rang gi gnas su song yo/ de nas ma he de dag gis mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te ngo mtshar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa 'di'id dge ba'i bshes gnyen
bcom ldan 'dasadang phradanas lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden ba mthong bar gyur na/ bdagacagagis cis khyad par thob par mi 'gyur snyam mo// de nas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
nyan thosakyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal bras bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ de dag gis brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas nyon mongs
pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa de mngonosum du byas so// de nas dgaslong dgathe tsom skyes te the tsomi thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa
sngon ma bur gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des ma hor skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du rgyas te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ ma he rje 'di rnams kyis
na las cabagyisan des ma de rjer gyur lags/ las gang bgyis na rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba//
dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs redacing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgyal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon ma 'bar 'od bge las de dag byas shing bsags pas
de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byos shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyis khams la rnam par smin
dar ma 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin bar ma 'gyur te/ las dag ba dang ma dgab byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin nga'i phung po dang
khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams na// bskal pa brgyar yang chud maza// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu
nyid du smin par 'gyur// dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa bzung bo 'di de la skye dgu'i le nyi khri sleb pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs nga 'is ngas rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs/
rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de gro khyer wA rA NA sen drang srong smra ba'i dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong dag gtan la 'bebs pa'i
byed pan/ dge slong sde snodagasum pa zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang gtan la 'bebs pa'inang na 'dug go/ de'i nang na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dag slong dag kyang yod de/ de sde snod gsum pa la 'dri

bar byed la/ des n lan ma thebs pa dang/ de khros nas dgag las rtsub po byung ste/ nags kyim he dang 'dra ba 'di dag shes zhes byas so// de'i slob ma rnams kyisakyang m he dzi dang 'dra ba 'di deg ci/
shes zhes pas so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yane ba de nyidi ma ha 'di yin no// slob ma de dgan ma te 'di dag
yin te/ las des n rabs lnga brgyaram hor rgyas so// slob ma rnams kyang ma te rje lta brgyur gyur to// nga la soms dga' bar gyur pa des n lhar skyes so// dge slong gi dngos po thob ste 2 tshul khrims

bsrungs pas na bden pa mthong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid mdon sum du byas so// dag slong dag de bas na ngag gi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/ can s ma he dang ma dza rnams kyi 'os pa de lta
bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ lha'i bu de'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par 'gyurapar dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag
slong de dag ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// khasan gnas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la//
rgyal po rnams dang/ na ba chen po rnams dang/ phyag po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dbon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/
gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding+ga rnams dang/ mi'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phya chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rimor byas/ mchod pa byas/
te lce dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci deng/ lto 'phya chen po rnams kyis mchod cing bas nga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
@# chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsosadang/ snyan zlong rnams b.res nga/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na//
rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na lha'i bu bstan gnas zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ de chos nyan
pa'i phyirartag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o// de nas phyis re zhig na lha'i bu bstan gnas g.yog lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyi ne nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to/ chos nyan pa'i phyi'i phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bstan gnas kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang
rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden ba bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'achos bstan// de shes nas lha'abu bsnyen gnas kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mo mthon po rting+ge'u
yang shes rdo rjes ba rtsomanas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bdonab mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lanagasum dubarjodod/ btsun ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mama'
mtsho bskam pa dang/ sa ba'i lo bsgral ba dad n gnas ong gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ba dang/ bdag lha dadama rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu na bdag la
pas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis 1 nang mi dang gnyenagyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang na bgyis/ ston gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma
bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang m bgyis lags so// yang smras ba/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i n gnas od las// shin tum bu zad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams
rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phyo// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de rade nyes pa spangs pa 'a ga/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug
wa/ bsngal rgya mtsho la rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'ago 'bad thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lcas ma red pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad slas pa//
srid pa stod du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'dung ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la na bug 'atsal nas// dgu thub la/
bskor ba byas nas kyang/ lha yi 'dzag na kha ltas lha yul song// de nas lha'abu bstan gnas tshod la khe sogs phyin pa dang/ zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang/ dpa' bo g.yul las
rgyal ba dang/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo// de'i tshe dge slong dag srid
dang tho rangs ma nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thod du snang ba chen po byang pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das tsalags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad
du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba ban de la blta ba'i
phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ lha'i bu bsnyan gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcasapa nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ sa de la chos bstan nas bdenang mthong bar gyur to/ rang gi gnas su song/
ngo// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus nga/ btsun pa lha'i bu bsnyen gnas ga las byung lags/ mang na colasab tags
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsunang nyan par 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal pa// ngagaslong dag 'o na legs/
par rab tu nyon la yid la zud zhape dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dgasngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di de la skye dgu'i rtsi 'khro thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyurab/ bla na med pa// lha dang ma rnams kyi ston

kha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rANA sa nadrang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rtenacid bzhugs so/ phyis re zhigan rgyal po kri kri bcom ldan

'das la blta ba dang/ bsnyen ba kur bya ba'i phyir song ngo// de nas ri zhig na brag ze gnyis drang srong smra ba'i don zhig la song ba dang/ de gnyis kyis rgyal po de/ rgyal bo'i 'byor ba chen po dang/
rgyal po'i mthu stobs chen po dang ldan pa mthong ngo// de nas de gnyis rgyal srid la 'dod ba skyes/ degs kyis dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ kyi sangs rgyas kyi dge bsanalas/
zhig byas na/ de las ci bsags pa dang ci'adod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so// dge bsnyan gyis smras pa// gang gso bstana gnas yan lag brgyad ba yongs su dag par bsrung
pa de ni ci bsams pa dang/ ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so// de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyim bdag chu stod las bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa blangs te bsrungs
so// danagacig gis ni yongs su dag par bsrungs te/ do nas shin s rgyal po khri kri'i bur skyes te/ de'i ming legs skyes zhes ba tagasanas bsha ba'i 'og du do rgyal bor bcug go cig shos kyis ni/
bsnyen gnas nyams par byas te/ ri mig nas klu'i nang du skyes te/ de'i stong du nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bye tshanabab ste/ dris rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byed do// de nas de 'di snyam du
zosams te/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu yin/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa yin na/ des bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug snyam mo// de nas des bstan gnas
yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag gas blangs pa las/ bslab pa lhod pa ra byas pa des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis nyams sumyong la/ gang gis blangs te bsrungs pa des ni rgyal srid/
thob par gyur to snyam mo// yang de 'di snyam sems te/ da na nga bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan par bsrung bar bya'o// 'on tang bdag klu'i skye gnas lasathar par 'gyur
yang srid do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bdag nyid sprul nas/ rgyal po'i thod du 'os te phyin nas rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig/ sku tshe ring b.ro'ogatsageces khastodanas smras ba
rgyal po chen po bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la'otsal gyis/ lha bsnyan gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa btsal du gsol/ gal te ma btsal na gdon ma 'tshal bar lho'i
dbu tshal ba bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/ de nyid du mi stsadabar gyur to// de nas rgyal po 'jigs re skrag ste ma dga' la skye bung zhes byas nas/ gsar 'bum yod pa'i spyod
rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ ba dgags yul thams cad du dril bsgrags nas/ su nga la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa ston pa de la gsar 'bum 'di sbyin no// bkur sti chen
bos kyang bkur bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o// de nas re zhig na shing mkhan gyi bu mo 'damed rgan mo zhig 'dug pa des rgyal po la ka ba zhig bstan te/ sngon bdag gi pha rtag tu ko ba 'di la spos dang/
bdug pa dang/ me tog gis mchod pa bgyid na 'di phyung ste garbags shig ces byas so// de nas rgyal pos zham rang ba rnams la ka ba 'di byung zhig ces bsgo// de nas rgyal de'i zhom 'di rnams [}]
wa kyis ka ba de sbyang ba dang/ de'i gnas bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan ba dang/ dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i gzhi lngadang/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum

cu rtsa bdun gsar gyi glegs bam zhig la bris pa zhig red do// de nas rgyal pos klu da lab snyan gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa zhigebris te byin no// drang srong sgrub gnas pa'i drang srong khri nyis stong
gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byas go/ klu des kyang bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyadadang ldan pa bsrungs nas theng la cungaste/ lus bor nas de la
'tshos te 'dug go/ de nas pan stegayog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// dge slong dag bstan gnas ni de nas byung ste/ mang yang de lasabatags
so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag slong de dag yarangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodad// ngad pa zhes bya ban/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi me mas dang/ tshod dar rnams dang/ dad du bon rnams dang/ lha/
rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ ma 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phya chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar pas/
ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cingashes nga 'a sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan paM/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims cha dang/ gdan dang/ stun gsos dang/ sman blong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yodapan ko sa la'i rgya' po
gas la rgyal rgyal po byed do// de'i 'di la 'byor pa dang/ rgyus pa dang/ bde ba dang/ 'kholags pa dang/ skya bo dang ma mang pos gang ba dang/ rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zha ba dang/ 'khrug nga dang
nang 'khrug dang/ chom rkun dang/ mu ge dang/ nad rnams mad pa dang/ 'bras sA lu dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ba glang dang/ ma de dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs
la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// phyir re zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal du

song ba dang/ pany+tsa la'i rgyal bos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ngang pa lnga brgya skyes su bskur te/ gang gi tsho rgyal bo rgyal byed kyi tsho'adu song ba de'i tshe/ ngang pa lnga brgya po de dag phul lo//
de nas rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyis dad pa de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul de nyid du btang nas/ gangagi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po'i
'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol zhing bzhugs pa delin+ti/ ngadapa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'grol/ bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen ngo de dag gis kyang de rnams la khyos ma
byin te/ de dag gis zos nas tshim zhing dbang po rtas te 'khod do// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'angs nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po de dag la chos ston pa de'i tshe/
ngang ba de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thod du dong ste chos nyan par byedud// de nas de dag tshe thung sa shunas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzung bor skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas
rid po ma lon pa na chos de kyisams rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas dad pa las shi 'phos pa dang/ sum cu rtsa
gsum pa'i lha yul khazad por skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo// de nas ston ngang par gyur pa'i lha bu rnamA'adi snyam du sems te/ bdag
cag zhag len nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag ga cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'adas la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas ston
dad bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnag dub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa// lus do shal dang se mo des brgyan ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyanaba'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang/
tam la'i lam dang/ spregaka lasogs bas byugs pa de dag de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i mitog utA la dang/ bad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ mnar ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/
rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen posaM snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'adas la ma tog gis gtogati/ chos nyan pa'i bye'i bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom
ldan 'dasakyis sngon dad par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chudas/ 'bags pa'i bden pa ban rtogs par 'gyurab de
lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thosanas sngon dad par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
thob ste/ de dag gas bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod d/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang/ rus pa'il
bsgral ba dang/ ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phya bdod/ bdag cag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du zhugs pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang m bgyis/
sam/ @#// mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma brgyas/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bas/ nang ma dang gzhan gyi tshogs kyis spyad ma dgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis
kyang ma bgyis/ dag sbyong dang srol re rnams kyis khyad ma bgyis lags so// yang sus pa// nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyis mthu yis bcad/
bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba bya// mya ngan 'das pa'i m bdag cag rnams kyis thob// bdag cag de rang nyis pa sbyangs ba'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob//
bdag cag sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la rol brgal// 'phags ba dgyes pa' zhi ba'ago 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dad 'ba' nad sangs pa/
srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni de nga mthong 'bras bu mo da/ de nas doshal 'phyang rnams dga' gyur te// bcud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas dgra thub/
lan bskor ba byas nas kyang// lha yi 'jig rten la ltas lha yul song// de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang/ zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang/
dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su dong ngo// de'i tsha
dag slong srod dang tho rang sa ma tel bar brtson pa lhur byed ba la gnas te/ da ngag gsabcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ru lags/ mdang sum ma mjed kyi bdag po tshangs ram/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la
blta ba'i slad du mtshas lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag slong dag ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshongs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga
la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// dge slong dag kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa lnga brgya 'di'i btang ba khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/
de dag nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shanas sum cu rtsa gsum ba'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de dag mdang sum pa'i thad du lhags nas de dag la ngas chos bstan te/ bden pa mthengo bar gyur/
nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ thatsag thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon byung bar gyur ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las
gang dag bgyis na/ des ngang bar skyes nga lags/ las gang dag bgyis na/ des lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di
dag nyid kyis sngon tshor bas gzhan dag tutshog sarnyed cing rkyen grub ba dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i 'os de dag byas shing bsags bas na
rgya sngon nga da bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas shing basag pa de dag gzhan su zhigegs nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyisa'i khams
la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung ga khams la rnam par smin pa'i m 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi deg ba byas shing bsags pa rnams na zon nga 'a
phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par sman por 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa bsgyur yang chudamaze// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//
'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das ba'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di 'odi la skye dgu'i tshele'u khro thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
@#pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha laskyarab/ bla na mdab/ lcad ng mi rnams

kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dgrong khyer wArANA sa na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nagasan rtan cing bzhugs so// de'atsha'adi dag rab tu byung
[& ]ba las bslab pa la lhod nga ra byas pa des na dang pa ra skyes so// ngal sams dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so// bslab pa lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa dasan bden pa mthong bar gyur to//
dag slong dag de ltar n las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin nga 'angagacig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// lasagacig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam bar smin ba'ang
gcig dunges par da kar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tunges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'dren
rnams sangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhage la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
nas/ dag slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/// rtogs ba brjod ba brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa drug pa rdzogs so//
sngom/ gsar 'od dang ni dri zhim dang// khyad pazangs stobs ldan sdug gu dang// bad+ma mig dang rje sgra dang// bu dang nya ma gyad nga dang/ gsar 'od ces bya ba ni//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyim rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang
lha rnams dang/ rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkhra' ldang rnams dang/ mi'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
bkur sti byas/ tha mar byas/ramor byas/ mchod pa byas ti/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen bo rnams
kyis mchod cing shes ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza'i dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzim sa cha dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gasos dang/ snyan zod
pa rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnason shAkya ga cing nor mang
'ol longs spyod chub/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan ng/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran ba zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam ba los chungam/
(blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang khu byung ste//
khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes ba/ mi'i kha dag las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dogazhi ma thob pa 'dzam bu pa'i gsar gyi mdog 'dra ba zhig btsas te/ de'i gser gyi 'od kyis grong
khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas so// de nas pha ma dang/ sems can ga nan dag gas de mthong nas ltad mo la lhags te/ sems can gyi khyad par 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs shig
gu zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems pa la zhugs so// den de btsas ba'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u'ada'i mde ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs bar byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di
btsas pan/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming gser 'od ces gdugs so zhes zer ro// de nas khyi'u gser 'od
pang na 'tsho ba 'a ma ma gnyis dang/ dum bskrun ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ dri ma 'khruba' ma ma gnyis dang/ rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ mam brgyad la gtadanas/ dem ma brgyad kyis 'o mdang/
zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyisnying bu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang de cig gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'inang gi brlabazhin du skye drag nga ragyur to// de'ang mkhas
shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang/ dad pa dang ldan la dag zhingebasam ba bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rjecan bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod ba zhig go/ phyis re
zhig na de byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas myos te/ grong khyer gyi gyis na rtse zhing 'dug go/ shAkya mang bo dag cig kyang shing n+ya grod+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo// de nas khye'ugaser 'od kyis
@#// mthong nas dris ba/ khyed gar 'dong/ de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'gro'o// de nas khye'u
gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba thos te/ sngon ma thos pa'i mang thos nas sde thams cad zing zhes byas te/ mchog tu ngomatshar du gyur nas de 'di snyam du sams te/ ma la bdag kyang
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro gar mchag snyam nas/ de'ang shang n+ya gro d+ha'akun dga' ra bar song ba dang/ khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sa skyes/
bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa// dpe byad bzang bo brgyad cus mdzes bar byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan nga/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/
! rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas lo bar ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu byed gzugs kyis rgyags pa mod par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshalanas/ chos mnyan pa'i
'i bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis la tshos bstananas/ dechos thos ba dang rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to// de nas re zhig na pha ma la gsol
nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bad tud nas/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang/ bsang ra rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang
bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs bar spyod pa spang bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldun 'das kyis phyag gsor gyi kha dog can glang bo che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas/ khye'u gser 'od la 'di/
skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu tshuroshog/ tshangs par spyod cig/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal ba 'i mod la/ sku dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun len pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam
ni bsnyan par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/ lag nan lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to// 'di snas ra/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa tshur shog bka' stsa' ra sa/
don mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon// sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas// mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyispyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcos ldan
'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor la 'di nyid g.yo 'dam brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam
pa thams cad leb dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
byas te/ dgra bcom ba khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bod bar ma nyam pa// nam mkha' dad lag mahrile du 'a dra ba'i sems dang ldan//
= tsan dan spyongs pa lta bur ba'i bar gyur pa/ rig bsago pa'i sbyabs bcom pa// ga nga dang/ mngon bar shes ba dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa// srid pa'i rnyed pa dang/ chags pa
dang / bdur ste lam lte ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lhacib rnams kyis mchod cing ded pa dang/ gus ngar snaba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dag slong dag the tsom skyes te/ dem thamu
cad gacod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa gsar 'od kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di ltar gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang/ rab tu byung nas dgrabcom
zla pa de mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gser 'od nyidikyis sngon tsha rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs red cing rgyan grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgyal
skyabazhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ gser 'od nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dgagazhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/
dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams n phyi la gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin nga ra mi 'gyur te/
na las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnamA
mi bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi zla// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// bskal pa dgu
bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas 'ag pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs M nga/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu
gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po 'i pho brang ba nyenaldan na brtan
cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing brad nga 'a ma bzhin du dud po'i lcag mched/
pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal bo gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i
mchod rten kho ra khor yug tudad ga tshad gcig yod la/ 'o yang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do// de nas re zhago na khyim bdag cig mchod
brtan gyi dus ston byed pa der song ba las/ mchod rten de las gser gyi ma long gi lhung ba des mthong nas des de'i rna ba'i gong rgyan du bcos nas mchod rten de la btags te/
spos dang/ bdug pa dang/ ma tog gis mchod nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab ba/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par
byed bar gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam dusams/ de'i tshe de'i dusan khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin
pa de ni khye'u gser 'od 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des n 'di lta bur byed gzugs khyad par can du gyur to// smon
lam btab ba des n tsho 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gtsagi tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rim par smin pa'i ng gcig tu ngos par gnag
par 'gyur ro// las gcig tunges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'drenam rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'dremar 'gyur ro// dge
slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag ba rnams dang/ las 'drenama rnams pa ngas la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad bar bya ste/ dag song dag/
khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag ya redas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
dri zhim zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho branga 'khor gyi ma rnams dang/ tshong dpon
rnams dang/ ded da bon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' ltade rnams dang/ ma 'am ru rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen
po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rimor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po
rnams kyis mchod cade shis ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chu dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ sman bro/
rnams la skyes ba/ nyan thos kyi des 'dun dang bcas ba yul ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'ikun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe sar skya'i gnas na khyim bdag phyug cing norand/
la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas ba des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs
tha03 @#// nas/de de dang lhan cig tutsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad da ma dgu lon pa dang
bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes ba zhig ma'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog nam thobang zhig btsas te/ da' ba nas matog ut+pal 'a di byung la 1 lus thams
cad nas na tsan dan gyi dri byung ngo// de nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes med 'dogs bar byed de/ de nye du rnams de 'di lo nas ut+pa la'adri bying
la/ lus thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dra byung bas na/ de'i phyi khye'u 'di'i ming dri zhig zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u drazhim pangan 'tsho ba' na ma gnyis dang/ nu ma bstan pa'i
ma ma gnyis dang/ drim 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ rtsa ba'im mganyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ dem ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ ma'agyi nying
khu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang do cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nad ga pad+ma bzhin du su drag por gyur to// de'ang sngon gyi rgyu stobs kyi shugs kyis dad pa dang ldan la/
dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs ba/ snyade rje can bdag nyid che ba tshor 'dod pa zhig ste/ gang gi tsho khye'u dri zhim dngung rgyan dang/ mgul pa'idogal
dang/ gdu bus brgyan te/ sung khag nang du zhugs ba de tsho/ tsan dan gyi dri bsung gis grong phyir thams cad khyad par gyur te/ skye ba mang pos kyang lha'ispos kyi dri tshor nas/ mchog tu ya
mtshan du 'dzin te/ 'di skad du kye ma bsod nams dag gi mthu zhes 'dzer to// phyis re zhig na khye'u dri zhim shang n+ya grodz+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'dasasku skyes bu chen de'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyanang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cusamadzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag
ba'i 'od mang ra ba/ ni bo che'ar bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzung ba mthong nas/ mgrong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed de// dga' babaskyod nas kyang bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyanapa'i phyabcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ danasabcom ldan 'adrasakyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams
dang/rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u dri zhim gyis 'ge tshogs la ltaba' 'irtse mo mthon po tishu ya
shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo// des brtson pa dang/
bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas thol mgo lnga pa' 'khor ba' 'khor 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad myul ba dang/ ltung ba dang//
rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa 'chos cad yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa tham sa cad sangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nying mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum nga 'a 'dod/
chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam da/ nam mkha' dang lag ma hrul du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sngangs pa lta bur ba sa'i bar gyur pa/ ge pas sgo nga'asgrubs
bcom pa// rig pa dang/ mngon par shes ba dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa 'ared pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur ste la ma lta ba/ dbang po dang 'od bang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang/ gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes tre/ the tsom thums cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsunar dri zhim gyis
las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di lta bu'i kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dro 'byung bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag
dri zhim nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi zer na nag ra 'os de dag byas shing bsags pa san/ dri zhim
[o]nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dgagazhanasu zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams na phyi la gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi
'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung la khams la rnams par smin par ma 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa de rnams zin pa'i bung bo dang/ ma
dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam nga ra smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang rnyed ma za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du sman
par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
ga pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dulakhya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan ' dA
rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyanaldan na rten cing bzhugs bo las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/
sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i mibazhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas
[t ]@#// rgya la po gnyan yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung ga mchod pa byas nas/ rin po mi sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yu gzhu da bag
tshad gcig yod la/'bangadu rgyang grags ga ga yod pa zhig btsugs tamachod rtenagyi dus ston yang lugs btod do// khyim bdag gcig gis kyang de la dad pa skyes nas/ gos
dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs phul te/ bdug pa dngam tog gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/ dag ba'i rtsa ba dang/ sems bskyed pa dang/ sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba
'disan/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cige/ ma mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag ji snyam du sams/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur ba gang yin pa de ni khyedu dri zhim 'di yin te/ des yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des n 'di lta bur dri zhim par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dag slong dag
de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'drenacher 'gyur ro// las
gagi tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par dkar bor 'gyur ro// dag slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnan sa dang/ gas 'dren ma rnams/
spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab pa ra bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sul nas/ dag slong/
de dag yi ra/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod dko/bam po bcolta ba// pyad babangs zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das la// rgyal bo rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi ma rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams
dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ ma 'am ci rnams dang/ lta 'du chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ blamar
byas/ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lham yanadang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cade shes pa'i
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa// na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzems chadeng/ gdan dang/ snyan gses dang/ sman zing rnams khamasakha/ nyan thos
na @#// kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na gangargya gro 'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs ga/ de'i ser skya'i gnas na nang phyagang nor mang la langs/
spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya chab/ rnam zos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran ba zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam ba las chung ma blangs nas/ de de
dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyodang las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'don ba dar bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang
zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha' kha dog ni ma thob ba/ lus byad dab med la mdog 'jam pa/ lus kyi mdun mtho ba/ che bar grags pa zhig btsas so// de nas de
waM btsas ba'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u'adi'i ming ji skad gdags zhe sa ming 'dogs par byed de/ 'du rnams n re/ 'di'ilus dpe med pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming byad bzas zhes gdags

so zhas zer ro// de nas khye'u byad bzangs ngang na 'tsho ba'im ma gnyis dang/ nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang/ dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ rtsa ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/

de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar khyi snying bu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis brgyudabasrings te/ mtsho'i nang ga pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par/
07 gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dag zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snyade rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dad than

mi ma yazhi pa rnams kyis kyang mchod cing rjed pa dang/ gus par skya kha'i gnas su gyur to// des sa phyogs gang du gom pa bro ba de dag kyang gtsang mar gyur te/ de ltar ba sod nams dang ldan zhing che bar

grags so/ phyisa'i zhig na deng shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sumacu rtsa gsakyis legs par brgyan nga/ dpe byad bzang
bo brgyad cus mdzes ba ra byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan ba/ ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bgrang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des
bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam ba dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nga ni rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos
nas khye'u dud bzangs kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes khacomanas/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'bras bu mngon sum du byas to/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la
[s ]@#// gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyibastan pa rab tu byung ngo// des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'adi nyed g.yo zhing mi
brtan bar rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam por 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsa dmod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas//
dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsor dang bong bar ma nyam ba/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i semA
dad ldan ng/ tsan dan sbangs ba lta bur bsil bar gyurang/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs brtson pa// rig pa dang/ mngon par shes ba dang/ so so yang dag nga ra rig pa thob ra// srid pa'i rnyed pa dang/

! chags ba dang/ bkur sta la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cid rjed pa dang/ gus bar smakhu'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams the tshom skyes to/ thetsam
thams cad gcod ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus ba/ btsun pa byad bzangs kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di lta bu'i lus 'di lta bur gyural/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur la/ bcom
ldan badas kyis bka' stsalal/ dge slong dag khyad bzangs nyid kyis sngon tshorabs gzhan dag tu tshog sarnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i
00 las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ byad ba drangs nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su tig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnanA/
ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam nga ra smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur te/ las dag ba dang ma dge ba byas shing bsags
pa rnams n zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ stsamachod rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam ngor smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud ma ze/ tshogs shing
dus la bab na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das ba'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnam par gabrigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po 'a po bdaganyen ldan n rton rung bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs nga 'asangs rgyas rnam par gajigs
[n ]@#/ kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas na bo tsho sgyu bzhi las byas pa'i mchod ston kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags/
gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der rgyal bo gnyan yod gnyen gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang/ blon po'i tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring ring byas pas/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byas so// phyis re zhig na nyin
cig gcig ma dbul bo zhige mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nad du song nas der ma tog rnying pa dag dang/ mchod rten rdulargyas yog pa dag mthong ngo// de nas des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas
dad pa skyes te/ phyags ma blangs nas mchod rten yang phyags/ me tog rnying pa'i ng bsal to// de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing drin med pa mthong nas dga' ba skyes te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal
nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ sams bskyed pa 'dis na/ bdag gas kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes nga ra byed par gyur cig/ mi
mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ de de'i dus nas dbul bor gyur nga gong yin pa de ni byad 'brangs
'di yin te/ des mchod rten la phyag bdar byas pas na/ byad gzugs bzang bor gyur to// smon lam btab pa des 'didi la dgrabcom pa de mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de

par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'drenam rnams ni rnam par smin nga 'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang// las 'dren ma rnams spangs
la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag skyod de dag

las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'an pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa stobs kyi shugs gzhan las 'phags pa ga btsas so// de
nas de btsas ba'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'a'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs pa byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas na/ de phyir khye'u 'di'i mang
rtsa stobs ldan zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// danas khye'u stobs ldan padan 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ num bsnan pa'i m ma gnyis dang/ drim 'khru ba'am ma gnyis dang/ rtsa ba'i ma ma gnyis te/
ma ma brgyad la gtadanas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snying bu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i
