zhig go/ de nas phyis re zhig na de shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dang byad
bzang po brgyadacus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od manga' ba/ rin bon ri bo 'gro ba ltadu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu/
des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa 'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos
nas khye'u stobs ldan gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la
gsal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson ba dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas pol mag lnga pa'i 'khor le'adi nyide g.yo 'ang ma brtan bar rig nas/ 'du byed kyi
rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos na yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs ba thams cad spangs nas//
dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom ba khoms gsun pa 'a 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong ba ra mnyam la/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i/
sams dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbyongs ba lta bur bsal bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga' sbrags btsem pa/ rig pa dang/ man par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig ba thog pa dang
srid pa'i nyid pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur sti la mi lta ba dang/ dbang po dang rta dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cade rjed pa dang/ gus par smra ba gnas su gyur to// de nas
rage slong dag ci tsam skyes te/ bcom thams cad gcod ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa stobs ldan gyis las gang bgyis na/ das 'di'i lus stobs dang ldan bar
gyur la/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da/ dag slong dag stobs ldan nyid kyis sngon tshorabs gzhan dag chu tshogs redacing rkyen grub pa dang
ldan te/ dba'i rgal ba zhan du 'byung la/ gdonami za bar 'ong ba'i 'os de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ stobs ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su
myong par 'gyur te/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam bar sun
par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zan pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ sku na ched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/
lus cad g gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dag slong dag ston byung ba 'das
dpa' dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan ba/ bde bar gshegs ba/ 'jig
rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dargyal po'i
bo brang gnyan ldan n ba rten cing bzhugs pa laso/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sengs rgyas kyi 'phrinalas thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad ba'i ma bzhin du
phung po'i lhug na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa' de byings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal bo gnyan yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas
nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa' mchod rten bor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'o pang du rgyung grogs gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mad rten gyi dus
ston byed pa der skye bo phal po tshos glu blangs ( gar byas pas mtshod rten rdul gyis go bar gyur to// phyis re zhig na khyim bdag gi mchod rten gyi 'khor sa zhing du song ba dang/ des mtshod na/
'khor ga dzul byas yog pa mthong de/de nas khyim po dag des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ gos kyi lde gu til mar dang sbyar ba phul te smon lamabatab pa/ bdag
gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob bar gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu dag mnyes par byed par gyur ga/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal ba/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de nistobs ldan 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'dasanan par gzugs kyi mchod rten la
bkur sti byas ba ngesan stobs dang ldan par gyur te// smon lam btab pa des ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngonosumadu byas so// dag slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnamA
ni rnam par smin pa'i dagag tu nges par gag par 'gyur ro/ las gcig tunges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin ba'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur/ lasu 'dren ma
rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'dren ma 'gyur ro// dag slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams spangs la 2 las gcig tu nges par dkar
ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag slong de dag yarang ste/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// sdug gu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho
brang khor gyi mi rnams/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dbon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang// nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ sa

'am ci dang/ lto 'bu chen po rnams kyis mchod ci dbags pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan ba/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/
snyan gsos dang/ sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyidge 'dun dang bcas pa sar skya'a gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i na dga' ra ba na bzhugs so de'i tshe sar skya'i gnas na
shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod tshe ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa sangasashing rgya chab/ rnam thos kyi bar dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi du 'anor dang 'gran pa zhage gnas la
des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ da de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing draga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad/

dang/ rtsa ba'i ma ma ga nyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/de ma ma brgyad 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhunamar dang/ mar gyi sange khu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bo bang ngo cog gis
bskyod ba srings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drug bar gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba// bdag la ban ba dang/ gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying
rjechog/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la srad ba/ sprin la dog 'ol/ rab tu smin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen go la gnas pa zhig su/ des dge sbyong dang/ bram ze
dang/bkran pa dang/ sdug cing ba phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs gtor bas sdud bor byed do// de nas dus re zhig ne 'u sdug gu shing nagrorta'ikun dga' ra bar song ba dang/ des
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyasadun bo mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dare byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas ba/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ rim
stod bas phyug pa' 'od mnga' ba/ni bo'i ngo bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzung ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sams dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang
bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'bags pa'i bden ba bzhi rtogs bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to/ de zlos nas khye'u sdug gus 'jigatshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi'u ye shes rdo rjes
bcom nas/ rgyunadu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des ba den pa mthong nas pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstanang la rab tu byung ngo// des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub
[Sir]@#// ba dang/ 'bad pas bol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyidi ga nang mi bstan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnale ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par
bshor ba dad/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chag
dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bu bsal bar gyur ba/ ga bas sgo nga'i grubs bcom
nas/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes ba dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob ba/ srid pa'i red pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
pa kyis mchod cing rjed ba dang/ gus bar s ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa sdug gu
las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di grags pa chen bo dang ldan pa dang/ sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la// rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid man sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'dis kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sdug gu nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs red cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan to/ dba' rgal ba zhin du 'khyudal/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas/
shing bsags pas na/ sdug gu nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dag slong dag las byas shange bsags pa rnams na phyi rol gyi sa'i
khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ sa'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang las ma dag pa byas shing bsags pa
rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam por sman par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang rnyed ma// tshogs shing
dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ da ge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ragi ba drad zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs nga/ 'jig rtenamkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyinyon
ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ra ra gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnam par gzigs sas rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i mo bzhin du phung po lhag ma mod pa'i mya ngan las 'das ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/
de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung ga mchod pa byas nas/ rin po sna bzhi las byas ba'i mchod rtan khor khor yug tu dpag tshad
chagacig yodal/ 'bang du rgyang gragasag ge yod pa zhig brtsigs so// de nas phyis re zhig na dpyid kyi dus su shange rnams ma tog rgyas te ma toganam ba sna tshog khyung ba na/ khyim bdag gcig ga sa
rgyas kho la gsol to// bdag ni lha dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags par 'tshal// rgyal bos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shige/ de nas mi
bdag de dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon pa dang/ zhabs 'breng ba rnams kyis dril ba sprugs te/ ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs sta gon byas nas/bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten lam
tog gdags te/ der srogachags 'bum phrag du mas sems dga' ba ba spyod so/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyod do// khacos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal kha/ dag slong dag ji
snyam dusems/ de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sdug gu 'di yin te/ des skye bo bal bo tshodang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams brgyad pa des n/ rgya go phal bo'i
snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rgyud nyid kyis nabastan sdug cing mdzes bar gyural/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges ba 'gag/
[j]b rnams ni rnam par sminaba'ang gcig tu des bar gnag bar 'gyur ro/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par dkar bor 'gyur ro/ las 'dren ma/
rnams rnam par smin pa'i ng 'dren ra la gyur// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams sbyangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnamA
'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong byed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// ka ba'i mig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ kho brang
'khor gyi mi rnams dang/tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dbon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams drang/ ma
tsi rnams dang/ lto 'phya chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla ma byas/ rimor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma/
dang ]lta 'a chen po rnams kyis mchod ci shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gabrims cha dang/ gdan dang/ snyan
gsos dang/ sman khong rnams ba des nga/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas ba ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/

ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod cho pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/
gis mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dgar la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad

'tshe/ dam dgu lon pa dang bu phyung sta/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la na tshos kha/ mig pad+ma sngon po 'dra ba/ mgo bo la lha' nor bu rin po che mthonakathogs pa zhig btsas te/ des grong khyer
sgyuser skya ba gnas thams cad nor bu ma thon ka'i kha dog can du byas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnam son
ra/ khye'u 'a'i mag pad+ma 'dra bsan/ 'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pad+ma'i mig ces gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u pad+ma'i chog pang na 'tsho ba'am ma gnyis dang/ num bsnun pa'i ma
gas dang/ ma 'a bru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ rtsa ba'am ma gnyis te/ de ma ma brgyad la gtod nas/ de na ma brgyad kyis 'tsho dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snyong bu dang//

gzhan mang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang do cog gise ba skyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skyo drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dag ning bsam pa ba brang ba/ bdag la phan pa
dang gzhan la phan ba la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid rtsa ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la

gnas pa zhig ste/ dgang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der lha dang mi rnams kyis mdang rjed do// de nas phyis ri zhig na khye'u pad+ma' mig shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang/ des sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dab byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gses 'argyun pa/ nyi ma stong
bas lhag pa'i 'od mda' bo/ ni po che'i go 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo// mthong ma smag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom
ldan 'das kyi nabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/
rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'bags pa'ibaden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u bad+ma'i mig gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po ti
@#// shu ye shes rdo rjes 'acom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden ba mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang/ rab tu sbyin pa dag phyin te/ dge sbyong
h+pha dang/ bram ze dang/ bkrenab dang/ sdug cing 'bongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma log tshol te/ bcos ldan 'das kyikhastanang la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa/
lca dang/ 'bad pas pho la mag lta ba'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di 'degayo zhing ma brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed rnam pa thams cad mIl ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam
par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur
! nas/ gsar dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa// tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsal bar gyur ba/ rig pas sgo nga' sgrubs bcom pa/rig
ba dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par 'ag pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rid pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur sti la malta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
mchod cir rjed pa dang/ gus par sla ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas re zhig de bsod snyoms la song ba dang/ skye bo phal bo sa de la bltas nas de tshabar gyur to// de nas pad+ma'i mig bcom ldan
'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gso' pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor burin po ches ma[&]ris ba ra mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang/
bu 'di ni las las skyes de yin pas na med pa ra bya ma nus so// de lta mod kyi/ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis mthong la/ go dad pa rnams kyisam mthong bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
'dasakyis de bzhin du mdzad do// de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa pad+ma'i mag gis las gang dag
bgyis na/ des 'di bar grags pa dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ bad+ma'i mig nyid kyis sngon tshe bas gzhan dag tu tshogs red pa'i
na grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgyal ba zhan du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba las de dag byas shing bsags bas na/ pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig/
gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin bar m 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ ma khams dang/ rlung gi khanA
la rnam par snyan bar ma 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dag ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung bo dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam bar smin par 'gyur ro//
lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud ma 'a// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/
sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal ba dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshags ba dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gsheg
ba/ 'jig rtenamkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blo named pa// lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gakhrigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
'a de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na brtan cing bzhugs pa los/ bzhag na yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas//
zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das ba'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la
sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten lor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhin brtsigs te/ dar srog
gas 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyuro// de nas re zhigen ded dpon zhige rgya mtsho chen po'i gru'i don grub staphyir 'ongs nas/ des de'i nang nas
nor bun lo tshamathon ka chen po zhig khyer nas 'ongs te/ debcom ldan 'das kyi mchod nam thong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ nor bu rin po che de bcom ldan 'das
rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi ra khab la btags nas/ de'i mthus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad mthonaka'i kha dog lta bur 'dug par byas so// me tog brgya dag gse kyang
mchod ba byas nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di ltabudag thob par gyur cig/ ston ba 'di lta bu mdzes bar gyur cig/ mims bar byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal la ba/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bapa'i tshig 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzig
kyimachod rten nor bu ni bo ma btags pa'i las de rnam par smin pas 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu ni bo tsho byung ngo/ pad+ma sngon bo dag gis mchod pa byas ba des n mig pa desngon po lta bur gyur
to// smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'dil dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dag slong dag de ltar na laso gcig tu nges par ganag ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i dagacig tu nges par gnag
par gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par na ba'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'dren ma 'gyur go// da che//
slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'don rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/
dka slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'a das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag slong de dag ya'i das te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bgabastodad//
rnga sgra zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi ma rnams dang/ tshong dpono rnams dang/
dad da pon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am rnams dang/ lto 'phya chen po rnams kyis bkur ste/
byas bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mdo ba byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa// na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims cha dang/ gdan dang/ stunagasos dang/ smanazong rnams bar s pa/ nyan thos kyi
dge 'dun dang bcas bsar skya'i genas niashing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ 'de'i mis skya'i gnas nang byug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzan pa

langs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu nor dang 'og na ba zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma klu ngas nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga'/
mgur spyod do// de ru zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lan ba dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs babrang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/mgar
grags ba/ bya ka la bad ka ltar skad snyan ba/ rnga sgra ltar gdangs snyan pa zhig btsas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i midi ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed

do nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di ji sgra lta bu'i gdangs dang ldan bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rnga sgra zhes gdagasaso zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u rnga sgra pangan 'tshob 'am mganyis dang/ nam bsnan
ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ dram 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ rtse pa'i m ma gnyis dang/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang/ zhodang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snying laM
dang/ gzhan yang yo byad bzang po tsag gis bskyed ba sra nges te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+mab zhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dag zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang/
gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyide tshe ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la srid ba/ sbyin ba la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dgab/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig/
go/ de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u sgrung de rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang/ des sangs rgyas brtson ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs/
par brgyan ba/ dbo khyad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas ba/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag ba'i 'od manga' ba/ rinabo tsho'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong
nas/mthong ma thag tudas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyod nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam ba dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po to'u ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden
zla pa mthong nas/sbyin pa dang/ rab tu sbyin pa dag khyen te/ dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ bkran pa dang/ sdug cing 'phos pa rnams ni tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo// de brtson ba dang// bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas phol mag lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan pa ri gnas / 'du byed kyi nam pa thams cad
la ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i 'is can yin bar lung rod de/ 'or rongs dag ba cad rdzangs nas/ dgra bcos nga nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra
bcom pa khams ga sum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsar dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba ge sar sa dang ldan/ tsan dan sbyangs pa lta kyang
bsal bor gyur ba/ go bas sgo nga 'i sbubs bcom pa/ ga ba dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob ba/ srid pa red pa dang/ rtags pa dang/ bkur sta la
ma lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod rung rjed pa dang/ gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag de la skyes te/ thu rtsom thams cad gcod pa
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rnga sgras las ci bgyis na/ des 'digazugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par gyur 'gas

bo dang ldan ba/ na bza'o dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ smanabrong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na

kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhacig tu rtsi zhing dag la dga' mgur spyod de//
de rtsa zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas zla ba brgyad dam dgulono ti/ bu btsas nas shalcago bu chen po zhig byung ste/ pha ma dang/ bum de ' gnas pa'i/

mkhyen ba/ thams cad gzigs pa yin te/ des mkhyen gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyad par bya'o snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste nanang/ bcom ldan 'das/
la zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs ge/ sha stag du dengs pa la legs par sgrol ba'i nang du chug la/ zhag bdun gyi bar du/
rten gcig kyang dus gsum du lag khas brams te/ 'o mas yang dang yang du gtor cig dang/ de'i 'og tu rdol te/ bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de dag thams cad tshanapo che'i stobs dang ldan bar
'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag des de thosanas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur tobasams pa/ bdag gis bu de lta bu dag 'byung b.re'agyur ba ni bdag gis red ba legs pa red do snyam nas/ des de

rgya bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden ba bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ datsos

te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byang ngo// de dag sbams cad kyis brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas phol mag lnga pa 'a 'khor ba'i 'khor 'kho 'ad 'degayo zhing mi brtan par

gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal to/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ci nas bdag
gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bu 'di ni las 'a sa skyes pa yin pas na/ med par byar ma nus so// de lta modakyi/ ca nas dad pa dang

dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/

cad mdzad nas shange zad pa'i ma bzhin du phung po'i lcagam mod nga rimya ngan las 'das pa'i dabyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das
de'i sku gdung la sku gdung ga ma spyod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa 'i mchod rten lor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rkyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs/ der
srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten de'i tshod nga la bab pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams
kyis spos dang/ ma tog 'phrang dang/ drug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ rol ma'i sgra rnams kyis mchod pa byed do// da nas re zhig na mi zhig rgyal po
dang rgyan po rtses nas skyogs su nor bu rin po che ma shel zhig thob bo// de nas de dad pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam nga ra gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab labatags te/ zhabs la
phyag 'tsha' nas smon lam btab pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ sanas nigaskyang ba dang/ sbyin ng ra bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'as na/ bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur/
0 gi ston pa 'a lta bu ma zhes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ nor bu 'a ni go tshad lta bu yang snga bo la thogs bzhin du ma rtse nas 'byang bar gyur cige sa byas so//
bam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sams/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ro la la der sgyu byed pa gang yin pa de ni ma 'batedi yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi/

mchod rten la bkur stod byas pa dang/ nor bu rin po tshog tags pa des n/ de'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po chu byung la/ rgyu de nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgro bam bte
mngon gum du byas so// dag slong dag de ltar n las gcig tu nges par gnag ba rnan sa rinam par smin pa'i ng gcig tungs par gnag bar 'gyur ro// las gcig du nges par dkar ba rnams
ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam pa ra nang 'ang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas nus gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'dren
ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu des bar dka' ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste// dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong
de dag ya re te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dgyad kyis ba dan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnam
dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pha drung 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ rtsod dpon rnams dang/ ded da pon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sprin rnams dang/ lha ma yin
mas dang/ naman kha'i lding rnams dang/ mi 'am ru rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rimor byas/ mchod pa byas te// lho dang/ klu dang/ gnod spyin dang//
lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lta 'phya chen po rnams kyis mchod cade shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa// na bza' dang/ nyal drasadang
gzims cha dang/ gdan dang/ snyunagasos dang/ snyan bong rnams bas nga/ nyanathos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas gshang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/

pa// de'i ser skya'i gnas ni shAkyi phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod nga ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan nga/ rnamathos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gren pa zhig gnas pa
sa/ gis mnyan pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ du zla ba brgyad/
dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'agazugs bzang zhing blta na sdug lamadzes pa/ mi'i kha dag las sa/ lca kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas ste/ gang gi tshe khye'u de btsas pa'i di'i tshe lce
rnams kyis kho ra khor yu gnas lca'i ba dan dag bskyangs so// lha'i rol mo' che byad dag kyang brdungs so// lha'i me tog uta la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis kyang gtor

ste sar skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur to// khyim thams cad du'ang de'i phyi'i ba dan bsgreng ngo// de nas da btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i mang ji skad
gdags zhes mang 'degs pa byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u'i de btsas pa na 'jig rten thams cad na grags pas rgyas pas na/ nga'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan grags zhes gdagasaso nas zer ro//
n gnas khye'u snyan grags pa nga na 'tsho ba'i man gnyis dang/ num bsnun kha'amaganyis dang/ dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ rtsa ba'i mam gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ dA ma ma brgyad
kyis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhunamar dang/ mar gyisnying khu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang pocog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang ga pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//
de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dag zhing bsam pa ba zad ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan nga 'a zhugs nga/ snying rdzacan bdag nyid rlu ba/ sa 'dod pa zhigage/ de nas dus re zhig na khye'u

snyan grags shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' rab Rasongang dang/ sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dab byadab zang po largyad rdzusamadzes
0/ @#// ra byas ba/ 'od 'dom brnga brgyan pa/ ti ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mang ra ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzong ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tudes bcom/
ldan 'das la san sa dga' ba bskyedado// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos manyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bag ldan
'das kyis de 'i bsam bdang Da bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'ibaden pa bzhi rtogs bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshos bstan to// de nas khye'u snyan grags/
kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 'i rtse mo mthon po te lu ya shes rdo rjes btson nas/ rgyun du zhugs ba'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang/ rab tu spyani nga dag sbyin te/
po'i dge slong dang/ bram ze dang/ bkren pa dang/ stag rung 'di ngas ba rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol to/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo// des brtson pa dang/
bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas phol ga lta nga 'a 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par ' gnas / 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/
rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsedachod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra bas mas dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbyangs ba lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pa sa sgo nga'i sbyabs bcom pa
rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thobang/ srid pa'i rid pa dang/ chugs pa dang/ bkur ste lam lta ba/ dbang po dang nyidabang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
kyis mchod cade rjed nga dang/ gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de'ang gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba'i gos spyod do// gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba ma yin pa na tud du spyod do// gsol
ba btab ste/ phul ba'abras dang/ mal cha dang/ stanadang/ nad gsos dang/ sman zong spyod do// gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba ma yin pachenyung du spyod do// de nas dge slong dag tho tsam skyes te/
rtsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa snyan grags kyis las gang dgabagyis na/ des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis bu dan bsgreng nas/ 'jig rten
du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dag slong dag snyan grags nyid kyis sngon mi rabs gzhan dag tu/
tshogs red cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byungal/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ snyan grags de kyis las byas shingebasags pa de
dag gzhan su zhige gso nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dag slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i
khams dwang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dad khams dang/ sku mched rnams
'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag ga las rnams ni/ bskal ba brgyar yang chud ma khri// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur
dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs nga 'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa//
bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na me da ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig
rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan n ldan cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad ma
nas shing zad pa'i m bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'a dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung
[5]3 la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas nga 'i mchod rten khe ra khor yug tu dad gatshad gcig yod la/ 'a rang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ dar
srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sa byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar pa ra 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ de nas zhig na rgyal po gnyenayod sa mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod rten
gyi dus ston byed pa der gyoda'agyud pa rnams kyis ba dan dgu bsnying ngo// de nas ra zhig na rgyal po'i khyod gcig gis dgacig non pa dang/ des gyad kyi ba dan thob sa/ des de rlungs te srog
chags 'bum phrag du mas 'khor dang bcas pa rol mo'isgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'a na cung/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gasmrigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi yon tan dran par byas te/ ba dan de mchod rten gyi stong gi srog shing la btags nas sonalam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu bdag gis
mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gyad du gyur pa gang yin pa de nisnyan grags 'ang yin te/
des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la khasan bkur byas pa des na/ 'khor bar bde bamatha' yas pa myong bar 'gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid
mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar las gcig tu nges pa gnag pa rnams ni rnam par sman pa'i ng gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyu/ las gcig tu nges
par dkar ba las nim par gapa'i ng gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuyo/ las 'dren mnamasanA rnam par smaner 'du 'drenamar 'gyur ro// dag slong dag de bas na las gcig tu ngas
par gnag pa rnams dang/ lasa'adren ma rnams spangs l/ lasagacigatu ris lar dkarab rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis doltar bslab pabya'o/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsalas/ gaslo dadag giresu/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mno par bstod do// gang po la sogs pa rtogs pa brjod pa brgya ba las
(rtogs ba brjod pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ste/ sdom gyi chis su brjod ba bdunapa rdzogs so//sdomani/ 'od bzang ma dang rab sdug ma// dkaramo b+hA ba ut+pal// mas
ldan ma dang mu tig dang// ka tsang ga la bde byed na// mi sdug sde tshan bcad de bstan// 'od bzang ma zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po
rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho branga' 'or gyis rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lham yin rnams dang//
[4j]ma mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'a bu chen bo rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ gor byas/ mchod ba byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ lham
yanadang/ nom na khar lha de dang mi 'am ci dang/ 'bu chen po rnams kyis mchod nyid shes pas nags rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan po/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas
dang/ khrims rgya dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ sman zong rnams b.res pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul khyim bdag mgon med zas
sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshomanyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la'angs stob/ gongan su 'dzanob yangs shing rgya rlab/ rnam shes kyi bu'i
nga dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ gis mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig turtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de re zhing dga'
la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags naas/ dezla ba brgyad dam dgu 'an pa dor bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug lamadzes pa lha'i rgyan gyis klobs pa/ nor bu rin
chen gyi lan thogs pa zhig btsas te/ de nas 'od byung ba des mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas so// de nas de btsas ba'i btsas ston byas nas/ bumo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes mang/
'dogs bar byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di btsas ma thog tu nor du rten bo tsho'i 'od kyis mnyan du yod ba thams cad snang bar byas pas na/ de'i bya ba bu mo 'di'i ming
'od pa zang ma zhes ga dgas so zhes zer// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma pa na 'ba' ma ma gnyis dang/ num ba snyan nga 'i lam gnyis dang/ dram 'khruba'ami ma gnyis dang/ rtsiba'am mganyis
te/ mam brgyad la gtad de/ mam brgyad kyis 'om dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi stod chu dang/ gnan yang yokhud kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/
mtsho'i nangag kherlab ni du spyodrug par gyur to// bu mo de'ang dad pa dang ldan la// dag zhing pa sam ba bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang/ gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ de la slong ba su

klu dbasu 'ongs kyang rung ba de dang de dag la mgul nas rgyan bkrol te sbyin par byed do// byin nas kyang yar rgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gang ga tsho bu mo de mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'atsho/
rgyal po'i bu rnams dang/ blon po'i bu rnams dang/ tshong dpon gyi khyim ng bo dag de slong du 'ong ngo// de nas de dag gis gnod bar gyur nas/ de'i lag pa oM tshugs bcas te bsams pa/
gal te gcig la bya nan/ gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas re zhig na bu mo des pha sems khongs su chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ yang
ci zhig gis sems khongs su chud kyang bzhugs/ des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad de/ da nas phyis bu mo dkare/ yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig dang/ dartse nag bdunan bdag nyid kyis khyim/
zab ga dam bag 'tshal ba zhes zer ro/ de nas tshong dpon des rgyal bo gsal rgyal lagasol nas/ mnyan du yod pa dril bsgrags te da ste zhag bdunan bumo'od bzang ma rang nyid kyi khyim thab
'dam par zad kyis/ khyed kyi bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces byas so// de nas zhag bdun lan ba dang/ bumo 'od bzang ma shing rta la zhon te/ chos gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan baskyang
nas (sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris te bskyod pa 'don cing slad du zhugs so// de nas der rgyal bo'i bu rnams dang/ blon po'i bu rnams dang/ tshong dpon gyi bu
rnams de la yid smon byed cing lta ba de dag la gtam nam pa sna tshogs kyis shad kyis myong bar bshad de/ bdag gis khyod la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku banas na mo 'tshalan/ yod yo bdag/
'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags pa kho na bas so/ bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song sta/ de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bus nas de dag phyir log go/ bu mo 'od bzang
ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal to/ sa mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
de'ibasam ba dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rangabazhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa 'a bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de
thos nas bu mo 'od bzang mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon go ti'u ya shas rje rjes bam nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mgang nas ngon par shes
pa'i ng bsgrubs so/ de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma stan las las te/ bla gos khrag pa gcige rtagabrang nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lce ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
su thal mo sbyor ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kyang 'khegs par gsungs pa'i s 'dul ba larab tu 'byung ba dang/ bstan par rdzogs shing
dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rungan/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'dalagadul bar byas bamang po
zladag des 'dren par 'gyur bar thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ bu mo song 'a na kho rnams kyang ltos shig/ de nas bu mo 'od bzung ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas
byung ste/ mang po 'dus pa'i nang du song ba dang/ der so so nasabasams pa/ 'di mthus dbrog par bya'o snyam ste/de dag gis de bzung bar byas so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma de dag gas/
bskabs pa dang/ dad pa'i rgyal bo 'dab ma ba rkyang ba ba ni du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// so so'i skye bo rnams na rdzu 'phrul gyisa myur
du dad par byed de/ de nas de dag gis lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas/ sdong portsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag
'phyor nas gsol ba btab pa/ srum sngon/ mar sbyin/ khyed kyis chos 'di lta bu dag mngon du byas pa lasan/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas so// de nas bu mo 'do bzang
ma nam mkha' las babasanas/ skyogo phal po che'i gung la 'dug sta/ gang thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ngos bstan to// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de/ des de rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs ba ra byas so// de nas des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas nga la mig lta nga 'i 'khor
ba' 'khor la 'di ni g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad dril ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thorab dang/ rnam par 'jig pas can yin par rtsad chod de/
nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsar dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam
mkha' dang lag mthil du 'drab 'asams dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbyangs ba lta bur bsal bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sgrubs kha pa/ ga pa dang/ mngon par shes
ba dang/ so so ma nga dag par rig pa thob pa/ sridi pa'i nyid pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkug stel ma lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing sred pa dang/
gus par snakha'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus ba/ btsun pa 'od bzang mas las gang dag
bgyisan/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug lamadzes pa dang/ mgul pa nas kyang nor bu rin bon byung la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'od bzung ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs med cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba'argal bzhin du 'byungal/ gdon ma bla
bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shinge bsags pas na 'od bzang ma nyid kyis las khus gang bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las
byas shing bsags pa rnams nalo gyisa'i khams la rnam par sminabam 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la ma par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dag ba/
[e ]dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams na ni pa phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'o ba' zhig la rnam par sman par 'gyur ro// lus can dag ga la sa rnams ni/ bskal pa
brgyar la chudamawe// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la
de bzhin gshegs pa dgrang com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/
banan da pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las (ra zhig
nang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las phrams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i m bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das ba'i dbus su
yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung ga mchod pa byas nas/ go bo'i sna bzhi las byas pa'i mad rtan khor khor yug tu/
dpag tshad ga cig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcige yod pa zhig brtsigs so// de nasor zhig na rgyal po gnyan yod kyi btsun mo pad+ma rgas nas/ rgyana rnam pa sna tshogs sa la sa bkrol te//
ga dan de la phul lo// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba rtsa bdang/ sems bskyed pa dang/ sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba
'dis na bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ga slong dag snyam du sems pa de'i dus na rgyal po gnyan
bod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de na'od bazangam 'di yin te/ sa bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi bod rten la rgyuna rnam pa sna tshogs btags pa des n/ gzugs bzang
zhing pa lta na sdug la mdzes ba dang/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dgade ltar na las
gcig tu nges bar gnag pa rnams nas bar n pa'i ng gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ las 'acig tu nges par dkar ba rnams zhi rnam pa smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par dakar bar
gyur// las 'dren ma rnamani rnam bar snyan pa'i ng 'drenamar 'gyur ro/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu nges par ganag pa rnams dang/ 'as 'drenan nan sa spangs la// lag gcig
chus bal dkar brtags 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ kha ma
0 ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ skor ba sdug ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal ba rnams dang/ bon po tsho bo rnams dang/ sdug bo rnams
dang pho brang 'a khor mi rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ dod da pon rnams dang/ lho rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkhag wArIms dang/
mi ma tsa rnams dang/ lta 'tshan bo rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ blamar byas/ mor byas/ mtshod bo byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang ma
'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ no bsrel dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims dang/ gdan dang/
snyan gasos dang/ snyan zong rnams b.res ba/ tanagos kyadge 'dun dang bcas pa ma nyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/
sa/ de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lan ba dang du byung ste/ bu mo gzugs po drang zhing bstan sdug pa mdzes pa/
yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas ba'i skye bo 'i tshogs rnams kyisnyingedurab tu sdug ma zhig btsas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bumo
'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs pa ru byed de/ nye du rnams nar/ bu cho 'a daskya bo thams cad kyisnying du sngag pa san/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i nga ra ba sdug ma zhes
gdags so zhes zer ro// de'ang tshe rabs dran te/ btsas ma thag tu+i gas su bcad pas smras pa/ sbyin pa bya ba mang nyung rtsis dang// zhing gi khyad nga ra gan las 'phel bar 'gyur// de che
mkhas pas da sgras te 'jig rten du// dad ra sa lha mi'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas sbyin// des de'i pha ma dang/ gzhan yang khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshig brjod pa de thos nas sgug de
smra ngas te/ mi dga' bar gyur la/ kyi bung zhes byed nas sa nga/ kye ma bu mo 'di ni sha ba zhig go/ des sas pa/ yum bdag ni sha za ya ngam 'a gas/ srin mo yang ma la gsakyi/ bangs/
ni bu mo lags te/ sbyin pa dag sbyin bar 'tshal lo// de nas de'i mas khyim bdag mgonand bras spun la bu tshodis 'di skadamachi'o zhes bsnyad do// de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la
rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas ba khyim gyi nang du bshosagasolote/de'i phyi'i sbyin bas gdan du bcug go/ de nas gang gi bu mo di mthar gyis 'badun
lan ba de'i da/ bam la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ de dag slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang/ 'dzangs pa dang// de du sdug pa dang/ yid du 'ong
[4]/bar gyur to/ re zhig na de tshomu ga'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'du ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas/ der srog chags 'dum phrag du ma bza' ba dang btung ba ma da bag go/ de nas der bam
ldan 'das kyis/ tshedang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo khyod dang sdug ma la nganar 'khor ba ni po rnams la khyod kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang/ zas dang
ma lam dang/ stan dang/ nad gsos dang/ nAthong rnams phul cig ces gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bong stagamazid du 'ongs nas sas pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal
nas khyod kyis 'khor ba po rnams la zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos da nga/ ris dang/ mal cha dang/ stan dang/ nad gsos dang/ snun slong rnams phul cig bka' stsal to// de nas rab sgrog mas
thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos mnos nas bka'ang zhane 'tshal zhes smras so// de nas rab sdug ma spyod yul gyi gling blta ba'i phyi'i mnyan du yod pa ra chos s// de nas re
zhiganam bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gdon de thos nas tu ngas nga ra ba sdug ma'i mdun du song ste smras po/ rango sdug ma gar 'gro/ das snyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar
sprul pa/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du zhal ta ba'i las byed par bskos so// mgon med zas sbyin gyis las pa/ khyod kyi de dag tham sa cad bdag gis sbyar gyis/ khyod kyis bya ma de gas so// rab spug
khas sus ba/ gal te sa babaden pa mthong ba lags la/ sa'i 'og thog phyag tu sbas pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs na/sdur ba 'di la mang che ba mig//
'on kyang bdag na skye bo dbul po la phan gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta ra byed do// de nga'idu dge bsnyan lnga brgya dang/ btsun mo 'a phung rgyud ma dang/ rgya' rags kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dang//
btsun mo 'khoragyi bla drang srong sbyin dang/ gna' ma dang/ ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang/ rgyal po gsal rgyal rnams kyis kyang skabs phyi ste/ khyod kyis bya ma dgos so zhes byas so// de nas
nags chung du song nas der mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can dag gis kyang skabs phyi'o// de ltar skabs de nas kyang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa blab gsum kyi
bar du na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gakhrims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gasos dang/ sman khong rnams kyis nga snyan ng kur byas so// des zla ba gsum po de nyid kyi skabs su brtson pa dang/
bsgrub ba dang/ 'bad pas yol chag lta ba'i 'khor ba'a 'khor 'dinyidi bdazhing mi brtan par ragi sa/ 'du byed kyi rnam ba thams cad rAl bdang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam bar 'thor
ba dang/ ma par 'jig pa'i tshes can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad slong nas/ dgabcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chagA
dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bang bar mnyam ba/ nam mkha' dang lag ma thu'i du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbas pa lta bur bsal bar gyur pa// ge pas sgo nga'
sgrub sa bag ra/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa ba pa/ srid pa'i med pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur stel ma lta ba/ dbang po dang 'dabang
dang bcas pa 'i lha rnams kyisamachod cing rjed pa dang/ gus pa ra sma ra'i gnas su gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'a das pa dang/ chos gos mdzad de / chos gos zin nas/
sa gos gsol to/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ nyan thosakyi dge 'dun dang grangs cig tu mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po 'i khab chu chas te gshegs so// danas bab sdu gnas bcom ldan
'das dang lam du brad nas/ 'ongargyal ma 'tshal zhes gsol to// de nas re zhig na nags khung chu dang ltar ba zhig tu phyin nas dro la bab nabargyags kyang med nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan
thas kyi dge 'dun dang bcas ba ba zhugs par gsol to// de nas lhung bzed lag pa g.yon pa la bzhag ste tshig tu smras pa/ gal te nga sod nams dag gi rnam par smanepa yod ce na/ bdagag
lhung bzed ba za 'a ra dang bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshog sakyis gang bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas lhas lha'abadud rtsis bkang ngo// de nas rab sdug gis gral mes bzhin dge
slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed rnams tsal khrus kyis bshad nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag pa'i
na thos kyi deg slong ma bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'ad le ste/ dag slong ma rab sdum yin no// de nas dge slong dgawe tsom skyes te/ thatsan thams cad ba/cod pa sangs rgyas/
bcom ldan 'das la zhus la/ btsun pa rab sdug mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des phyugakho'irigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang/ skye bo thams cad/
kyis bkur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyidi mngon sum du gyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dag slong dag 'ab sdug ma nyud kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu
tshogs de da rung rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgol bzhin du 'byung la/ gdonami za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ ba sdomanyid kyis las byas shingebasag pa de dag
ga zhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams po rilogyi sa'i khams 'a rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams
dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang ma dgab byas shing bsags ba rnams n zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skyemachid rnams 'ba' zhig la/
rnam par smin pa ra 'gyur ro// lus can dag gales rnams ni/ bskal pa so rgyab yang chud zo// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid dusnyan po'agyur/
slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa 'a dusan/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyidi la skye dgu'i ri nyil thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ge pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gsheg
dra/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i khalaskyarab/ bla na med pa/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong
khyer wArAn+tas na/ drang srong sa ba ra digs kyi nags ni rten cing bzhugs so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te sus snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol to/ ltung ba red
bsnyams nas/ dge slong ga tshogs kyis zhal 'di byas te/ mdun du bdar nas wArA NA sa'i bsod snyoms la gags pa dang/ re zhig na tshong dpon zhig g.yog 'khor dang bcas te skyed mos
tshal nas bza' ba dang ngacu'i bamang de dag khyer to/ de nas re zhig na de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig 'byas chan gyi gatheb khyer te rje bo phyi bzhin du 'gro ba las/ bu mo ngag gzhug ma des
bcom ldan 'o das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na khar ma thogs/ de dga' bar gyur te blo skyos nga/ bdag la rje bos lan gnyis su bran mor byas ci yod kyis/ bdag gis bcom ldan
dam/ @#// 'dag shosagasol gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas des gsad pa dang/ bcingag dang/ brtag pa dang/ bsdos nas 'bras chan gyi ga zeb bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan
thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas la zhal zas sna tshogs kyis mi par byas so// de nas tshod ngan gyi bod du song ba dang/ re zhig na tshong da bon gyi bu mo 'bras chan gyi gzeb de ga re zhes dris so//
des skyas pa/ bdag gse bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzog sakha'i sangs rgyas 'od srug la zhal zas phul lo zhes byas ba dang/ tshong dpon gyis de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/
denas de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas smras pa/ bu mo khyed dang phyin chad branaso las byung gas song zhige/ khyod kyis bdag gnyid kyi seg pa na mal tshe byas pa yin no zhes snyas so// de nas
des thal mo sbyar te khyim bdag la gsol la/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar cing zhes byas so// de nas tshurje bdag des lhung brjod dang chos gos kyang banas ni rje shes
byin ba' lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te/ bcom ldan 'adas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung na/ des bcom ldan 'das 'dasungs kyi gsung rab lodazhu stong gcir du zhal ta ra 'i las byas te/ 'bras chan
dang/ skyo mo dang/ thug ba btung ba dang/ rtag res 'khor dang/ mgron du bod pa dang/ mar me'i 'phreng ba dang/ ngos gosas brkyang rnams dang/ sbyin pa dang/ rab tu sbyin pa rnams kyang phul te
smon lam btag nga/ bdag gas dka' bas bsgrubs/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs la smin pa dang rab tu sman pa dag phul ba'i dge ba rtsa ba dang/ sems bskyed pa dang/ sbyin par bya ba'i
chos ni ngas su ga tong ba 'das na bdag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsung dag la rab tu'abyung ba glob bar gyur cigs byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dag slong ngag ji
snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de 'dusan du mo mag gzhug mar gyur pa gang yin pa ni reb sdugan 'od yon te/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs la zhal zas phul ba des na phyag re 'a rigs su
skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzeng/ skya bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to// son lam btab pa des da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de
ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par gnagapar 'gyur ro/ las gcig tu nges par dakarab rnams ni rnam par smin nga rang gcig tu nges par
dkar bar 'gyur ro// lasa' drenam rnams ni rnam par smin nga 'ang 'drenamar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas lasagacig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la//
las gcig tu ngos nga ra dkar pa rnams 'ba' zhig 'gatad par bya ste/ dgaslong khyedakyis daltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalas/ ba slong de dag yi
rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de/// dkar mo zhes bya ba na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams
nga blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ bo brang 'khor gyi ma rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sprin
rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ 'an rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ blamar byas/ mor bas/ sa rtsodapa byas/[Y]lha
dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha pa rje dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta 'phya chen po rnams kyis mngod cing shes ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen
po dang ldan pa/ naba' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chu dang/ gdan dang/ stun gsos dang/ snyan zong rnams b.res ba/ nyan Tas kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa so ra skya'i gnas shing
n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe shAkya rnams nang na/ shAkya sA ra ma zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la 'angs spyod re ba/ yongs su 'dzin dang yangs shing rgya che ba/
rnam thos kyi du'anor dang ldan nga/ rnam thos kyi bu nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las rungon blangs nas/ dedang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do//
de de dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod kyang3 bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med de/ lag pa tshatshugs bcas nas bsams la/ bdag gi gnoradu ma dang ldan du zin kyang/ bdag la bu'ang nad
bumo'ang med pas/ bdag 'das nga 'o 'og tun bu chad pa'i phyir du bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bur 'gyur ro snyam ste/ se mas khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas dag sbyong dang/ bram ze
dang/ ltas mkhan dang/ mdza' ba dang/ gdon dang/ rtsalag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol bzob cig rus de lo bsgo'o// de nas de bu med de/ bu 'dod nga ba gu lang dang/ tshulha dang/ ku be ra ba/
brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa dang/ lha' khyad nga ra gzhan dag la'ang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang/ nags tshal gyi lha dang/ lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang
sum mdo'i lha dang/ gtor ma len pa'i lha dang/ lhan cig skyes nga 'a lha dad/ chos la thunang pa dang/ rtag tu ngu bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na'ang
gas 'a pa btang pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam yod modakyi/ de'ang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab nga 'i rgyas bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor/
lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// ya gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ ma gnyis 'dod chags
langs te phrad pa dang/ ga dus bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan ba dang/ dri 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dar bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// des
du'ang gsol ba 'debs ba sgyur byed ting 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi 'os sha gnas lnga 'phos te/ de rlung ma'i log zhugs nas/ des khyim thab la sbran to// de nas
khyim thab kyis gas pa// bzing mo gal te bu khyi'u zhig btsas na ni legs/ de ma yin te bum dge btsasanani/ de nyid dang bcas te khyod khyim nas bskrad de gtang ngo// de nas 'i ge na de zla ba

brgyud dam dgu len pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo khabrugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa ma yal ba mi'i kha dog la sa ni'od s/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ gos dkasnga po gyon pa mngal gyi dra ra sa ma gos
pa zhig btsas so// de nas re zhig na shAkya snar mas khyod kyi chung ma la du byupa/ bu lon bcos so zhes thos pa dang/ de khros te nang du song ngo// de nas de'i chung mas lha'i gos gyon pa'i
bum phul la// de nas shAkya snar mas bu mo mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas/ de btsas pa 'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes mang 'dogs bar byed da
ted rnams zharo/ 'dagos dekarimo gyon bani dubatsas pas na/ de'i phyi'i bu mo 'di'i ming dkar mor ga gas so nas 'ong// de nas dmodakar mo padan 'tsho ba'im ma gnyis dang/ dum
/bosnyan ba' ma ma gnyis dang/ bris 'khru ba ma gnyis dang/ rtsa ba'i ma ma kanyis te/ ba ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad sa 'os dang/ 'od ng/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/
ma gyi stong bu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par badrang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te// mtsho'inang galats+tshab ni du skye drag par gyur te/ go ra mo jitsam du rgyab de tsam du shos de dag
kyang rgyas/ drin can du'ang ma 'gyur la/ de'i lus la'ang drams gos bar m 'gyurare/ nas gang gi tshabu mo dkar mo mthar gyis nonamoracur ba de'i/ rgyal bo'i bu rnams dang/ blon pa'o/
bu rnams dang/ tshong dbon gyi bu mang bo de dgad slong du 'ong ngo// de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/ de'i pha ga pa la oM tshugs bcas te bsam ba/ gal tegacig la byin nan
gzhan rnams bdag gi dgra 'gyur 'og nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas re zhig na bu mo des pha ba mas bod chud sunge 'dug pa mthong nas smras pa/ kha ba ci zhig gis thams
khongs su chud cing bzhugs/ de nas de'i don rgyas par bsnyadad// de nas bu mon re/ yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ ba dga'i ded pa la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis/ yab kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'gen des pha ma gnyis la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ gos
[ns ]@#/ gang dag gyon btsas pa dedag nyid chos gos lta tshangar gyur to// de nas des brtson pa dang/ sbyor ba dang/ 'bad pas phol mge lnga pa la 'khor 'khor lo 'de nyidi
g.yo zhing brtan par gnas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa rnam pa thams cad ril ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam nga ra'athor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa ra rtsad chod de nyon mongs
pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom ba khams gsum pa 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar nyam nga/ nam mkha' dang lag
mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan ng/ tsan dan spangs pa ltar bsal bar gyurab/ rig pa sasgo pa'i skyabs bcol ra/ rig pa dang/ na de' ngar zhes pa dang/ so lo yang dag bar g pa thob/
rgyu nga / sridir gnyid pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur ste lam lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mtshon cing rjed nga dang// gus pa bskya ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dag
slong dag ci rtsom rgyas te/ btsos thams gcod pa sangs rgyas nga com ldan 'das la zhusang/ btsun pa dkar mos 'as gang dag bgyis nad phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs la zang zhing/
blta nasdug mdzes pa dang/ gos dkar lo gyon pa dang/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis 'gas/ ngacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dkar modi/
du pa/ sa stobs gzhan dag tugs ched nyid rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpal na la nga zhin du 'byung// gdanom ba so las de rag lus shing bsags bsan/ dkar mo nyid kyis sa
byas shing bsags pa de dgagazhan su zhig gis kams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dag slong dalas byas shing bsags pa rnams ni lo rgyus khams la rnam nga ra snyan pa ma 'gyur/ chu'i
khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam nga ra smin par 'gyur te/ las dag pa dang ma dgo ba byas shing bsags pa rnams niwini ba'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ sku mad
rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam pa skyen por 'gyur ro/ lus can dag gi las rnams gi/ bskal pa ra rgyur yang chud mi tshogs zhing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin bar
'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ ngaskal dar dang po 'danyedal/ skye dgu'i ril nikhricung pan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
dang 'angs ldan ng/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtenamkhyen pa/ skyas 'dul bgi ga 'khor ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang ma nen sa kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od
srung zhes bya kha 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA sa na/ drang srong pa ba ri rigs kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re zhigan rong dbon gyi chung ma dad pa dang ldan l/ da/
zhing bsam pa bzung zhing 'dug pa donanagel drang mongs bar song ngo// de nas de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsaganyis kyis
legs par brgyan ba/ dpe byad bzang bo brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa// 'odi'aden gang gis brgyanab/ nyin song bas lcag pa 'a 'damanga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun
nas bzung ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo/
srungs kyis de la chos bstan sa des dad pa red de bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshes gso la nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gas sra brkyang tshul/
denas mthar gyis pha ma la gsol te/ bcom lda'adasakyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo// dag slong dag ji snyam du sems/de dang dusan tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa re
nadage slong ma dkar mo 'di nite/ des dge slong ga dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul ba des na/ gos dkar mo gyon dang du btsas so// tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs ba des
ni 'dal dgrobcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slongadag de ltar na las gcige tshu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam pa sbyin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par gnago par 'gyur ro// las
gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnan sa ni rnam nga ra smin nga 'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na bas
gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams spangs 'dra/ las gcig tu nges par dkarab rnams 'ba' zhage la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bsrung par bya'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs dra lam ngon ra ra bstod de// zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon bzhin po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor mi rnams dang/ rdzong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams
dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod spyine rnams dang/ lha ma ya rnams dang/ rnam mkha' lding rnams dang/ ma ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sta byas/ ba mar dus
ri mor byos/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'on ci deng/ 3'a man gyo rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa 'gadA
rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gasos dang/ snyan ngo rnams brnyes pa// nyan thos kyidag
'dudang bcas pa mnyanadu yod pan/ rgya'akhu rgyu'abyed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/
yod pan/ bram ze gdanoralugs spyod ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya chab/ rnam thos kyi bu'anor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'granapa cha ge gnas so//
de'ang rig byed gsum gyi mthar phyin te/ mang gi rnam grangs dang/ shes gsal dang bcas pa dang/ yi ge'arib dud bya ba dang/ lnga ba ste/ gtam rgyud dang bcas pa rnams tshig raranas brda
stod nus pa zhig go/ de nas de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bras tre'i sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byadad// de nas des bu dgos pa'i phyir rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan/
cig tu rtsi zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dang dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs
bzang zhing mdzes pa blta nasdug pa yon lag dang nyape lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de nas do btsus pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming
'dogs par byed de/ nyang rnamos kar/ bdagacag gi bu tshaphal cher zla ba zhes 'dogs pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba nas gdags so zhes zer go/ nas bu mo zla ba pang na/
00 'tsho ba'i me ma gnyis dang/ nu ma bsnan pa 'i ma ma gnyis dang/ dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ rtsa ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas// de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma
dang/ zhadang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snying bu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo tshug gis bskyod bsunges te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//
de nas bu mo zla ba mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang/ demakhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang/ byab la gsal gdang/ dran pa dang ldan pa dang/ thos pa 'dzin par gyur to/ de nas re
zhigan de'i pa bram ze'i khye'u rnams sngags slob pa nade thos pa tsam gyis lobs so// thos nas kyang bstan chos de dag lta klogadang sbyor zhing 'chad nusaso// de nas de'i grags pas mnyan
du yod pa thams cad rgyas bar gyur te// mu stegs can dag kyang zhi gcig bzhin du de la bltaba'aphyir 'ongs te/ de dang lhan cig tu gtan la 'bebs par byed de// de nas gang gi ri bcom
ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de tsA/ mnyan du yod par gshegs nas mkhas ba rnams dang/ mkhas par gragasab
dedag las phal cher bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dor 'dong bar byed do// de nas de dag ma snang nas nang ma rnams la sa pa/ ci'i phyir da bstan chos shes ba da gam 'od ba 'di la
rgyu ci zhig yod/ de dag gas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya thub pa 'dir gshegs te/ de dag thams cad de la gzhol bar gyur to// de nas
sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgroston ma byung ba skyes nas/ desdu thams cad zing zhes byas so// de nas bu mo zla bas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgrathos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo// de
nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu'on po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan
pa nyi ma stong bas lhag pa 'a 'od mnga' ba/ rin po ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i/
phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyanasar 'gag/ nas bcom ldan 'das kyis du mo zla ba'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i
bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstanate/ dethosanus bumo zla bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden ba mthong nas skye dgu'i bdagayonamo'i thod du ragadu byung ngo// de nas des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas phol mgi lnga pa'i 'i khor
ba'i 'khor 'ded g.yo zhing ma brtan par ri gnas / 'du byed kyi rnam pa Tams cad ral bo dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jige nga gi chos can yin par rtsad
ched da/ nyon mongs da ldan sa cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gus ra dang bong bar mnyam pa
nam mkha' dang lagamathul du 'drab 'i sems dang ldan pa// tsan dan sngangs pa ltadu bsal bar gyur pa/ rig nga sa sgo nga'i sbubs dbog pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so
so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i red pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur sti la ma lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa 'i lha rnams kyis spyod cing rjed pa dang/ gus par snya
ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas gang gi bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dge slong dag khyed cag gisazla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo po shad pa gdon par gyis shig ces bka'
stsal pa dang/ de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas so sor sbar pa'i made 'ang dpog tu
gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sazhi dge slong ma la tshig re re nas chos kyi lung 'bog par mi mdzad de//
gal te khyed las lan cig smras pas 'dzin nus pa 'ga' zhig yodanan ngas lung dbogago/ de nas de'i tshodag slong ma zla ba lor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te
'dug go/ de nas dge slongam sbrab stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// lan cig bka'
stsal bas ba dag gis bzung bar 'tshalan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa 'i mde lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa ra lung dbog pa mdzad nas/ lan cig bka' stsal pa dag slong ma bla bas lobs so// der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mang du thos pa rnams dang/ thos pa 'dzin ba rnams kyis chog ni 'di lta ste/ dag slong ma zla ba 'di yagano// de nas dag slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tshom tham
cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dag slongam blabs las gang dag bgyis shing bsags pa des na kho'i gis su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug
la mdzes pa dang/ thos pa 'dzin par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dgazla ba nyid kyis sngon rabs gzhan dag tu tshog sard nang rkyen grub ba dang ldan to//
dba'i rgal bzhin du 'byad la/ gdon ma bri bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas/ zla ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar/
'gyur te/ dge slong dag las lus shing bsags pa rnams na ri'argya sa'i khams la rnam par smin pa ram 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ sa'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par san/
bar m 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang ma dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams n zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can
dgag la sa rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang rnyed ma bri// tshog sashadus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du snyan par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
bskal pa bzang po 'ad nyid la skye dgu'i tshe le nyi khrozub pan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs nga 'jig rten mkhyen ba/ skyes bu 'dul

ba'i de kha la sbyar ba/ man med pa// lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste da grong khyer wA rA NA sa na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na
nacing bzhugaMs so// de nas re zhig na bram ze'i dum zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo// ngas de la lung mnos te bslabs nas/ kha ton du byas te phung po la mkhas
pa dang/ khams lumakhas pa dang/ skye mched la mkhas pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par
byas so// mthar thug pa'i ye shes ni bskyedam nus so// de mkhan mo gang las rab tu byung ba den/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis thes nga 'dzanepa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan te// da
nas dge slong ma de 'ba' Ni smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar bdag ga mkhan mo thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ bcom ldan 'das
pa 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la// bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i becom ldan 'das de bstan pa la rab tu byung/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub ra sa bdag khros pa 'anopa rnams kyi mchog chu bstan par gyur ge
cas byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'atshe de'i dus bram ze'i bumor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin te/ des smonolag
btab pa des n/ thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi che chog tu bstan to// des der lungamanos ted subs nas kha ton du byas pa des n/ da ltar dgra bcom banyida mngon sum du byas so// ngag slong dag de
ltan las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par gnag bar 'gyurar// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams rnam par sbyin pa'i ng gcig tungs/
par dka' bar 'gyur// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par sman pa'i ng 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag ba rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams spang
