la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig lagatad par bya ste/ dag slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'angs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag slong
de dag ya'ings te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la mngon par bstod de// ut+pal zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon ngo
rman po rnams dang/ phyug bo rnams drang/ bo khrang 'khor gyi mo rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ dad dang na rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ chu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/
lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ ma 'am rnams dang/ lto 'phya chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rim bus/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang
gnod sbyin dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta'aphya chen po rnams kyis ma medang shes pa 'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang lta na nga//
na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzim sa ru dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ sman brong rnams res pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab
na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po 'a khab kyi grong khyer na/ klu'i rgyal ba'i bdang/ tshade 'od gnyis phrad pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston
byung ste/ deng grong khyer chen po drug po thams cad nas skye bo mang po 'du'o// de nas re'agan lho phyogs nas zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon ga 'ongs pa de'i bu sa la zhes bya ba gzugs
bzang zhing blta na sdug 'amadzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ lang dang nad med nga 'i rgyags pas dregs pa zhig yod de/de gang gi tshe ltad mo ba'i nang du 'ong ba de
ltad pa thams cad kyis yid smon byed cing lta bar byed de// gang so sor rtog pa'i shas chung ba de dag ga pa de 'brog pa la byed de// der gang gi tshe dus ston byung ba de' rdzogs byed la sogs/
pa ston pa drug kyang 'ong dang// de nas bumo ut+pa las/ skye bo mang po la smras pa/ kya rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na mir gyur ba'i nang na bdag dang byad gzugs kyis mnyam pa'i m/ khyad par du
'phags pa de lta bu 'ga' lta yod dam/ skye bo mang po so snus la/ dag sbyong go ta ma 'khor dang bcas pa yod de/[']ut+pa las smras pa/ nyid ma yin nam/ 'od te lha gzhi/ skye bo mang bos
smras pa/ ma ni yin mod kyi/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no// de nas tsheg dbyas nas ut+pa la rgyun thams cad kyis klubs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo// song nas kyang/
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gar byed cing glu len la ler mo khyed do// bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang/ bud med kyi rtags rnams dang/ dud med kyi brda rnams dang/ bud med kyi
rtsodamo rnams kyang ston par byed do// der dag slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gang yin pa da dga'adis phyogatol med par gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dogs
kyi gas che ba rnams gdug pa dang/ ut+pa la'i phyed gzugs dang lang tshos rgyags pa bsal ba'i 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis ut+pal rgas shing 'khogs la mgo skyab
dang/ so sngo zhing phyam dgu po ltar rgyur bur gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul ma no par 'du mdzad de// de nas de ltar sprul pa'i mod la na tu las bdag nyid la sdug pa ra mthong nas/ byad gzugu
dang lang sa rgyags pa de med par gyur to// dag slong 'dod chagos kyangegs che ba rnams kyang skyo bar gyur to/ de naso u tra la rgyags pa med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag nas nag can gyi lus 'di las tshugs da dus yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
chos bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ut+pa la dang/ dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de dag gi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/
rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshes bstanate/ de nyos nas b.luge gas na 'jage tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po byi'u yo
sa rdo rjes brtsomanas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis na lanag phyira'osa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas go/ kha cig gisan phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
bum ngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis ni rab tu byung sta/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spungs/ dgra bcom pa 'di mngon sum du byas so// utu la'ang dad pa dad nas/bcom ldan
babs kyi thad du lag tu byung ste/ sa brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas phol mge lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'ad nyid g.yo zhing ma brtan pa ra yig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
darAle ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chodad/ namongs pa thamasacad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas
te/ dgrang com pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bod par mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i soms dang ldan pa nadan sras
/ pa lta bur bsal bar gyur ba/ rig nga sa sgo nga' sgrubs bcom pa/ rag pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag ra ra rig pa thob pa/ red pa dang grags ba dang/ ngakur
sta 'a ma lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas ra 'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang/ gus par snaba'i gnas su gyur to// zlos gara mkhan de dag kyang skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis nyon
mongs pa tham sa cad sngangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// de nas dge slong dag tsom skyes te/ bu tshabams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das kyis blos gar mkhan gyi bu mo u tra la bad gzugs dang lang sa rgyags pa las/ rna bas skyo bar mdzad nas ga zhang gsang galawarathug pa mya ngan las 'das nga 'i bar dag tu
bzhag pa'i ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ dge slong dag da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang da nga bralakha/ gti mug dang bral ba/ bya ba dang/ rga ba dang
nang dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ sngags sngadon da ra/ sdug bsngal nga dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams la sa yongs su grol ba/ thams cad mkhyenang/ thams cad mkhyen
nga 'a yabs dang shes byams cad la dbang tha ge pan ngu mo utul bud gzugs dang lang tsho'i rgyugs pas dreg pa 'as rgas nga sa skyo bar byas nas/ gna' gsangag mthar thug pa
mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bzhag pa 'ad lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod da/ 'das pa'i dusanang 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa// gti mug dang bcas
ba/ skya ba dang/ rgab dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ myang nadang/ sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngalo ba dang/ dag gi deb dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma gro ba
na yang/ sa bu mo su tra la na bas skyo bar byas nas brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ a bshad de// dag slong dag ston kyang
ba 'das pa 'a dusan/ grong khyer wArANasin rgyal po nas pas na zhes bya ba zhige rgyal po khyod de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang [7 ]la legs pa dang/ skyo/
bo dang mi mang bos gang ba/ rtsod ba dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ nang 'khrug dang/ ma rkun dang/ ma ga dang/ nAd rnams yod pa dang/ 'bras sA lu dang/ bu ram ji
dang / ba glang dang/ mahe dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tshor ma dkrugs la/ bugacig ba la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// des re zhigen rgyal po da btsunamo dang
lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse yang dga'ol dga' dgur spyod pa las/ sa btsun mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyud dam dgu len pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u/
gzugs kha cung zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa// mdog bzang bo/ gser gyi kha dog na/ mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa'i ng ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes chu ba/ sna mthe ba/ sna
legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston dus sa/ khye'u 'di'i ming ciskad gdags nas mang/
'dogs par byed do// nyi du rnams na re/ 'di'i yab yul ka sha'i rgyal po yin la/ 'da'ang gzugs 'brang zhinge ba lta na sdug la mdzes pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i mi nga ka ga dzas
ldan zhes gdags so zhas ra ro// de nas khye'u shi mdzes ldan pangan 'tsho ba'am ma gnyis dang/ nus ba smon pa'i m mi gnyis dang/ ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gsi dang/ rtse ba'i ma ma
gnyis dang/ mam brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis rom dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mor gyi stong khu dang/ gan yang yod byad kyi khyad par bakhrang ngo cog gis bskyod
bsrings te/ mtshe'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skyo drag par gyur to// de nas cang ga tsha de cher skyes pa de'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to// de nas de rgyal bo byed panas pa du ma dang ldan zhing
gnod pa du ma'i rtsa ba yin par rig nas/ drang srong rnamos kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo// de 'ang gangs kyi sul zhig na gnas te 'bras bu dang/ rtsa ba dang/ nus 'tsho ni/ rigs kyi ga yang/
@#/// gzhi dang/ shang shun gyon la ma'i sbyin sreg byed do// phyis re zhig na 'bras bu dang rtsa ba'i phyir ri'i sul zhig tu song ba dang/ re zhibe na der ma 'am ci'i bu mo 'ge
klugs drang srong gzhon nu de mthong nas/ chags par gyur te/ gar byed cing klu 'an la rol mo byed de// bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang/ bud med kyi rtags rnams dang/ bud na da kyi
brda rnams dang/ bud med kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang ston pa byed d// danas re zhig na drang srong ka shi na dzes ldan gyi bu mo de la chos bshad de/ chen khyed rgas te/ khyod kyi ngar dang po'i nang
mnyan la/ mjug ni ra por gyur to zhes byas so// de nas chos de lta bu bstan te/ de shes nas ma 'kha pa'i bu 'a byed gzugs kyi rgyags pa de med par gyur to// de nas de dad pa skyes nas
pa smon lam btab pa/ gang gi tshe khyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de 'tsho/ bdag khyod kyi slob na ma gyur cig ces byas so// ngacom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// drug slong dag jisnyam dus mas/ de'i de'i dus nadrang srong gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin pa de nang yin no// mi 'am ci'i bu mo de ni su la 'di nyid yin no// de
nas bcom ldan 'das la/ dag slong rnams kyis zhus pa/ btsun pa ut+pa las las gang dag pa gyisan/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes nga ra gyur 'gas/ las ga dug/
bgyisan/ des dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dag slong dag tshud+ma la nyid kyis ston tshar bas gzhan dag tu tshogs da cing na grub pa dang
ldan te/ dang la rgyal ba gan du 'byung la/ gdonam dra bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas bung bsags pas na/ utu 'a[]da kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su
myong bar 'gyur te// dag blo dadag las byas shing bsags pa rnams na re la gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin pa la ma 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ mo'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam bar
smin par ma 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang ma dag pa byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skya mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can
dag ba u0f7alas mas na/ bskal pa brgyur yang chud maT/ gas shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa la dus na/
bskal pa 'brang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshalo bzhi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bad bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ na med nga/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jigs bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan n rten
@#@#/ cing bzhugs so// de nas re zhig na lho phyogs nas zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs so// der gang gi tshe rgyal po mdzes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa
mthong bar mdzad nga de'i/ zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la bsgo ba/ nga'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar gyi gar thabs gyis shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis rgyal po'i bka' spyi
bos mnos te/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal le zhes byas so// des sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar spur te/ 'gas nga ra sdus nas/ rgyal po'i blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i mdun du zlos gar
gyi gar thabs byas so// de nas der zlos gar mkhan gyi gar gyi slob dpon nyid nisangs rgyas kyi tshe lugs kyis nang du 'ongs so// zlos gar mkhan gzhan rnams n dag slong gi cha lugs kyis
nang du 'ongs so// de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la sogs pa zlos gar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams lanor gyi phung nga tshanapo byanen/ dad
nas de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/ sbyin pa dang/ rab tu sbyin ba dag sbyin nas/ yang dag pa'i smon lam btab pa/ ge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ sems bskyed pa dang/
sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong b 'disan/ bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ dag slong
01 dag ji snyam du sems/ zlos gar mkhan gang yin pa de dag na ut+pal sogs pa 'di dag yin te/ 'dra dag gas der smon lam btab pa des n/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
byas so// dag slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pamasani rnam par sman pa'i ng gcig tu nges par gnag bar 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam
par sbyin pa'i ng gcig tu ngas par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren pa rnams ninam par smin pa'or 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa/
rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gtsagetu nges par dka' ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya sta/ dag slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya// bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/// bam po bcu bdun pa/
mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/
tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ glunams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/
ba/ @#// lta 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rimor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod spyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha'
lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen bo rnams kyis mchod rung shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzigs
chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ snyan zong rnams bar s pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa wArA NA sa na drang srong smranga' ri dag kyi nags na bzhugs so/
de'i grong khyer wA ra NA sa ni rgyal bo tshangs da sa byin rgyal bo byad de/ de'i ring la 'byor ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ 'alegs pa dang/ skye bo dang ma mang po sa gang ba dang/ rtsod pa
dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ nang 'khrug dang/ chom rkun dang/ nu ga dang/ nad rnams med pa dang/ 'bras sA lu dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ba glang dang/ ma he dang ldan
par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cade tsho ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig ba la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// de nas re zhig na rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dag 'dagur
spyod de// dertsi zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ phyisabatsun mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'an pa dang bu byung sta/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug la mdzes
ma/ ba yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de nas sde btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes mang 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams
nar/ bumo 'dika shi'i rgyal po'akhyi mo yarnal/ byad gzugs kyang bzang bas de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming shi mdzes ldan ma zhes gdags so zhes zer// de nas bu mo ka ga mdzes ldan/
ma padan 'tsho ba'am ma gat+tas dang/ nub bstan pa'i m ma gnyis dang/ dris 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/ rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o
ma dang/ zho dad/ mar dang/ zhunamar dang/ mar gyi nying khu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang do cog gis bslad bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma ba'an du skya drag par gyur
to// de nas gang gatshe bu mo kA shi mdzes ldan mchen mor gyur ba de'i ni/ 'og gi rgyal bo drug gis rgyal bo tshangs pas byin la bod btang ste/ khyod kyi bu mo btsas zhes bdag gis thos kyis
gzhan la ma sbyin par bdag gi bu la byin cig ces spreng ngo// de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin mya ngan gyi khung bur zhugs nas/ lag pa la oM tshugs bcas te bsags pa/ gal togatsage la
byin nanagazhan rnams ni bdag ga dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas re zhig na bumo shamadzes ldan ma rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te pha'i thad du song
des pha mya ngan gyis non pa mthong nas dris pa/ yabaca'i slad du mya ngan mdzad/ de nas ngas kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad de// de nas bu moka ga mdzes
ldan mas ba las nga/ yab te 'og gi rgyal po rnams da ste zhag bdun na bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan na rang nyid kyi khyim thab 'das par chud kyis/ khyed kyi bya ba gang yin pa de gyis ngashag nus
nya gtad du gsol zhes byas so// de nas zhag bdunas ni pa dang/ nye'og gi rgyal po drug bo rnams 'dus so// bu mo ka shin dzas ldan na 'ang shing rta' ton te/ chos gos skyon can
gyi ba dan bsgrengs nas/ sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs 'gan phyogs te/ rgyal po 'dus pa'i nang du sa nga nas snas nga/ kya nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams gson cig/
bdag ni khyed kyi ga rdugs dang/ lang tsho dang/ rigs dang/ longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug la mi sems kyi/ bdagan 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba na la gas te/ bdag ni ras
'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs bris pa gang yin pa de'i slob ma 'a gas te/ de'i bstan nga 'a rab tu 'byung ngoms byas nas/ drang srong snya pa ra song sta/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa 'chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsan
[o/]par rdzogs shing dag slong ma'i dngos po thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skya dgu'i bdag mo
chen mo la gtad do// de nas des kyang de rab tu byung ste bstan par rdzogs par byas nas/ des brtson ba dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas khol mag lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di
ga yo nang me brtan par dge nas/ 'du byed kyin+dom pa zams cad ra'i ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'bore ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i tshes can yan par rtsad chod de/ namo ngas/
pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcos nga nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom ba khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsar dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam
mkha'adang lag mthil du 'dra ba' sams dang ldan ng/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsi'i bar gyurang/ rig pas sgo nga'i sdungs btsem pa/ gang dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so
yang dag par rig pa theng nga/ srid nga 'i dad pa dang/ chags ba dang/ bkur ste lam ltar/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjod pa dang/ gus par smra ba'i gnas
su gyur to// de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis de'i gzugs dang/ lang tsho dang/ mdzas pa rjes su dran nas/ 'dod chags kyi rgyags pas myong te/ rab tu byung bzhin du yang gsol ba 'debs so//
denas de dag gis gsol ba btab nas/ dadaba'irgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ tsho'aphrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// so so'i skya bo rnam

rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed do// de nas rgyal po'i khri de dag gis lha dang ma rnams dad par byed pa'i cho'aphrul shin tu rmad du byung ba mthong nas spu bring zhes byed de/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/
bzod pa gsol to/ su khyed kyis sa 'di lta bu dag mngon sum du byas ng mas na/ khyoda'adod pa spyod pa 'din masrid kyis/ badrod nga ra mdzod cigacos byas so// donas bu mo kasha mdzes ldan ma
nam mkha' las babs te/ skyo na nga po'i gung la 'dug nas sa de lta bu dag bstan te/ de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob bo// de nas dag slong dag the tsam bskyas te/
thatsam thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus nga/ btsunang pa mdzes ldan mas las gang dag bgyisan/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang/ rab tu byung/
nas dgra bcom ba nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal ba/ dge slong dag nga dzes ldan ma nyid kyis sngon gyi tshadabus gzhan dag tu tshogs rad cing rkyen grub pa dang
ldan te/ dba' rgal btanedu 'byung la/ gdonom dra bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ kashi mdzes ldan m nyidakyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gisanyams
su myong bar 'gyur te/ dgasong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams na phyi rol gyisa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'abams dang/ sa'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par
smin pa ram 'gyur te/ 'a sa dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams n zin nga 'a phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur do/ lus can dgag las
rnams na// bas 'bad brgyar yang chud ma ze// tshogs shade dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du nangar 'gyur// dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa 'dus na/ bskal pa ngo brangade
'di 'de la skye dgu'atshe'o sum khra thub pa na/ de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan ng bdeng ra gshags pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa

skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na na da nga/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsar byung ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// de nas re zhigan da na rgyal nga 'a bu mo da dad pa
dang ldan la/ dag zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig rtsag tu bcug ste/ khyad thams cad kyis gang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
pa la phul lo// yang dag nga ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring la'ang rab tu byung nas lo lnga'i bar du byams pa bsgoms so// dag slong dag ji snyams du sems/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu mor
[ag]// gyur pa gang mang pa de na ka shi'i mdzes ldan m 'ad yin te/ dus ga tsug lag khar phul ba des ni gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
'od srungs kyi 'di larab tu byung nas/ le khra'o bar du byams pa bsgoms pa des ni/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dag slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges bar gnag pa rnam
wAni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges bar dka' bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnamananam
par smin pa'i ng 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la
gtad pa byasta/ dag slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag ya rengs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
mu tig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po rin po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ bo brang 'khor gyi ma rnams dang/
tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yani rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye
chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mid par byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta'aphya/
chan po rnams kyis mchod cing gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan po/ nabaza' dong/ zhal zasadang/ gzims dang/ gdan dang/ spun gsos dang/
sman srong rnams b.res nga// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe
mnyan du yod ba na/ tshong dbon rgyal ba zhes bya ba phyugasing nor mang la'angs spyod sa/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgyu ba/ mthos kyi thub nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i noradang 'gran
pa zhig gnas ba des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de dedang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dgrwa'adagur spyod do// datsazhing dga' l dga' dgur spyod pa las/ phyis chung ma la bu
chags naas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mgab la mu gag 'phrang ba btags pa zhige bas so// das de btsasaM
pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bumo 'di'i ming ji skadagadogagazhas ming 'dogs par byed de/ 'du rnamos nare/ bumo 'di btsas ma thag tu mgo la nu tige ga'aphrang ba byung bas na/ de'i phyir bu mo/
[4 ]@#// 'di'amang mu tigaces gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo mu tige langana'atshoba'ami ma gnyis dang/ nu ma bsnan pa'i ma ma gnyis dang/ srim 'khru ba'am ma gnyis dang

[A/ ]rtsa ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ dom ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snying khu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gisabaskyod/

bsrings te// mtsho'anang gi pad+ma bzhin du skya drag par gyur to// de nas ri nage na bu mo mu tig ma thar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang/ de'i mu tig gi 'brang ba de phogs na par zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// danas
bum das bkren pa dang 'bongs pa rnams mthong nas/ longs spyod kyi bgabasha' byed do// de nas gang ga tshibagamar gtad ran par gyur pa dang/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang/ blon po'i bu rnams dang/
tshong dpon gyi du mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo// de nas de'i pha mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas lag pa la e tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal gcig la byin n ni/ gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar
rgyu 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems khongs su tshud cing 'dug go/ de nas bu mo des/ pha la gsol pa yab ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ de nas des ji ltar gyur pa mas cad bsad do// de nas bu mo
smras pa/ yang bdagan 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa larab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo// de nas yang re zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu tha chung
[& ]rab tu sdug ces bya ba des/ nga la gsol ba/ ba dag ga mamis brang du bu mo de bslad par gsol zhes byas so// de nas kyi bdag mgon med zas spyin gyis tshong dpon rgyal po nyang tang ste//
bu mo mu tig bdag ga debu la byin cig/ de ltar byas pa dang/ gnyenadu'ang 'gyur la/ de 'tsho'i bar yang mdza' bor 'gyur ro zhes byas so// de nas khyim bdag rgyal gyis bdag gi bu mo la don
debasnyadado// des smras pa/ gal te shed du lta skyes ban/ bdag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar dam bcas nan khyim thab tu brgya'i nas byas so// de nas des
de ltar byas nas re zhig naskabs shig tu gnyis ka khyim nas byung nas/ bam ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung/ de nas de gnyis kyis brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas
phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor la 'di nyid g.yo zhinges brtan par gnas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i
chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa masagasum pa 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur nas/
gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang stor/ tsan dan sbyangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur/ ga pas lo nga'i sgrubs bcam pa/ rig/
nga dang/ mngon pa rang shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ sring ba'i rid pa dang/ rnags pa dang/ bkur stel la lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang nus
ba'i rtswa rnams kyis ma chod cade rjed dang/ gus par sla ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dgaslong dag the tsom skyes te/ thatsam thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
btsun pa mu tig gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des mu tig gi 'phreng ba mgo bo la thogs bzhin du btsus la/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgrabcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag mu tig nyid kyis sngon tshabs gzhan dag tu tshog sarAd cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba'argal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdenam khri par 'ong ba'i
las byas shing bsags pas na/ mu tig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhag gsanyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dag slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams n pya rel
gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyug chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung ga khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mdag ba byas shing bsags pa rnag
na zinapa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag ga 'os rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// rtogs shing dus
kha la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa ba zad po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshul ni gri chub pa/ de bzhinagshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ge pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyurab/ blan med pa// lha dang ma
rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes khyab 'jig rten du byulta/ de grong khyer wA rA NA sa na drang srong sa bar dogs kyi nags na rten cing baizhugs so// de nas re zhig na ded
dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'inang du zhugs pa las ta mo yod par grub ste phyir 'ongasaso// de nas des mu tig ga'aphrang pa mchog tu bzung ba zhig khyer te 'os so// de'i chung ma'ang gzugs bzang/
zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig ste/ des de'i mgo bo la btagos so// de nas wArA NA si na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan
pa la zhugs paM/ snying rje can bdag nyidachab/ chos 'dod pa zhig gnas pa de'ablo skyes pa/ ma la bdag gis dad pa bsdus la/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la lo lnga pa'i dus
ston bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas rgyal po kri kro la gsol to// bdag gis dad pa bsdus la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'elda'adir du dus ston brgya der 'tshal lo zhes byas so// rgyal pos kyang
de ltar gyis shigaces bsgogo/ des khyim bdag de glang po tshal zhon te/ grong khyer wArANA sa'i lam po che dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dag tusong sa/ dad pa
bsdud par byed do// de nas re zhiganaded dpon gyi chung mas mu tig gi 'phreng ba mgo bo las phog nas dad pa sdud pa la phul la/ de nas re zhig na ded dpon 'ongs pa dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng
ba mgo bo las phog par mthong nas/ bzang mo mu tig ga 'byung ba de ga re zhes dris so// de nas des smras pa/ jo bo bcom ldan 'das kyibastan pa la dad pa sdud pa la phul gyis dgyes ba
brgyad du gsol// dad pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so// danas re zhig na ded dpon gyis ni bos phyir blus nas chung ma de nyid 'byin na/ de nas bu mo des de bongs chab tung ste/ bdag
gis 'di yongs su btang ba lags so zhus byas so// khyim thab kyis slas pa/ bzang mo ngas 'di gsar dngul mang pos nyos na ci'i phyi 'dod/ de nas bu mo des de blangs nas ma tog
mang bo bsags te/ sos dang me tog 'phrang la sogs pa'i ng khyer nasadrang srong smra bar song ngo// de nas dri gtsang khang spos kyis phyugs nas/ ma tog gis gtor te/ mu tig gi 'phrang ba ni
bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu la bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyidabu la gnas par gyur to// de nas dad pa skyes te smon lam btab pa/ bdagagis kyang yon tana'adi lta bu dag lo
[n/]par gyur cig/ ston pa 'ad len lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dag slong dag ji snyam dusams/ de'i da ra dus na ded dang nag chung
mar gyur ba gang yin pa de nimu dge 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs la bkur sti byas pa des na gajugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang/ de'i mgo bo 'a 'ang mu tig gi
'phro ba byung bar gyur to// rgyu de nyid kyisand ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges por gnag pa rnams na rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges
bar gnag bar 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dakarab rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges pa rakar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams rnam par smin pa'i ng 'drenaar 'gyur ro//
dge slong dag de bsan las gca de nges pa gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gtsag tu nges bar dkarab rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge
slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ dge slong de dag mi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
(katsang ga la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcomaM ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po
rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong dbon rnams dang/ ded dbon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin/
rnams dang/ lcam yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' ldanganams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ blumar byas/ ri mo
byas mchod pa byas te/ lcad ng/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang// nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis na chod
cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa// na bza'adang/ zhal zas dang/ gadzames tsha dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/
sman zing rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge'adun dang bcas pa yul katsang ga lan/ ka tsang ga la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so// de'i tshe lul ka tsang ga la
de na rgan mo katsang ga la zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des bus pa thogs te/ khren pa'i drung du nu churasong ba dang/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ba khyedasong la rgan mo de la khacom ldan 'das laskyems kyi chu bu 'dog ces gyisangashagi/ de nas kun dga' bas bsgo nas/ de nare/ 'phags pa
bdag nyid kyis 'tshal te mchi'o zhes zer ro// des re zhig na ka tsang ga las khum pa sos chus bkang ste// bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba dang/ ka tsang ga las sangs rgyas bcen
ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po 'amtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyadazhus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gsi brgyan pa/ lta ma stong bas
lhag pa'i 'od mnga' la rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthongs thog tu de bu 'khyams pa'i sams skyes te/ nu ma gnyis las kyang 'oma'i
rgyun bab nas des bu bu zhes sus te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud par byed do// de nas dge slong rnams kyis de bkag pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge
slong dag khyed kyis rganamo 'di ma bkug cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar rgyunadung 'bar gyur to// nga la bu yi khyams la la/'dazhilus l 'khyud par byed//
nga ya lus la 'khyud pa la// grol te 'di la bkag gyur na// 'di ni de' re 'phral nyid du// khas khrag dron skyugs bar 'gyur// bu la khyamasal 'di mthong nas// drin du gzo ba dran
gyur te// snying yang rje zhing snying brtse bas/ lus la yang zhi'i khyad du gzhug/ de nas re zhigand du 'khyams brtse zhal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam ba dang/ bgal rkyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi phyogs par 'gyur ba de lta
bu'i chos bstan po mdzad de/ de thog nas ka tsad galas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcos nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des
bden pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dka' ba byed pa'i mo lan// bu bzangs kyis ni gong bya ba// sems ni grol bar 'gro 'gyurab// de na khyod kyis bdag la byas// bdag
na khyed kyis rab bsgrames te// ngan 'gro dag las phyung nas kyang// mtho ris thar pa dag la bzhag/ khyad par shin tu chen por lcags// de nas re zhage na des rje bo la gsol te/ baa
ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas bol tshigalnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhingem brtan par rig nas/ 'du
byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rul ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dong/ rnam par 'jig pa' chos can yaMn par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid
mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' rdzong lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa//
ba ba/ tsan dan slam pa lta bur bsal bar gyur ba/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbyabs bcom pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i red pa dang//
chags pa dang/ bkur sta lam lta ba dbang po dang []dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cingarjed pa dang/ gus par stsa ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas gang gi tsho bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la mder lung dpog pa mdzad nas/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs pa de'i tsho/ ka tsangag las dge slong ma rnams la brda sbyod par byed do// der bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mdo sde rnam par khyed pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma ka tsang ga la/
yin no// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsunapaka tsang ga las las gang dag bgyis na/ de rgyus nas
gdod rab tu byung lags/ las gang dag bgyis na/ des bran mor gyur lags/ las gang dag bgyis na/ des bcom ldan 'das mngal na gnas pa thamar 'dzin par ma gyur
lags/ de ci'i slad du rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis te/ mdo sde rnam par 'byed par bgyis pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag ka tsang ga la nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs red ci'i rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon
mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ ka tsang ga la nyid kyis las byas shing bsags grwa de dag gzhan su zhig gso nyams su myong bar 'gyurati/ dge slong dag las byas
shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur te/ las dag
ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dar skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin bar 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las
rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/
nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod ba na/ tshe rabs lnga brgyar rgyun chags par 'di nga'i mar gyur te/ gar ga tshi nga rab tu 'byung bar 'dod ba de'i tshe/ 'dis nga' gegs byas te/
las de'i rnam par smin pa sa na rgas nas gdod rab tu byung ngo// ngasbyin par byed pa na 'dase nga'i sbyin ba'i bar chad byas pa des ni dbul mor gyur to// 'dis sgyu 'phrul chen mo lta bu'i tshe bar
grags bar 'gyur ba'i las de lta bu ma byas pa des nang mngal na gnas pa tha ma'i tshe 'dis ma bzung ngo// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi ring la rab tu byung nas/ des slob pa dang mi
slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams 'bran mo zhes bya ba'i tshig smras te/ des bran mor gyur to// des dor bslabs shing bton du byas pa dang/ phung po lamakhas pa dang/ khamos la mkhas pa dang/ skye mched
la mkhas ba dung/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lamakhas pa dang/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni de ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ mdo sde rnam par 'byed par
byed ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par go nag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tunges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba
rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag
pa rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams stangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'dA
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi radas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/
bde byed ma zhes bya ba ni/sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyugapo rnams dang/ khrang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong
dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lham yin nams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye
chen pa rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ramor byas/ mchod pa byas te lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye
chen pa rnams kyis mchod cingashes pa'i sangs rgyas bam ldan 'das bsod nams chon po dang ldan pa/ nabaza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims cha dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/
pa snyan zango rnams b.res pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas bamanyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdagamagon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/
de'i tshe kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang rgyal po tshangs pas byin gnyis phan tshunam mthunapar gyur te// de nas re zhig na kes la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal bo de'i yul 'dab tu song
nas phrum btab ste 'dug go/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang dpung yan lag bzhi pa gling pa'i tshogs dang/ rta'atshogs dang shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon na
chu klung zhig gi 'gram du thum btab ste 'dug// de nas re zhig na kos la'i rgyal pagasal rgyal gyis de nyid du btsunamo dam pa khrid de/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do//
rgyal po tshangs pas byin yang btsunamo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de nas nyim gcig tu kos la'i rgyalags la rgyal gyi bu mo'ang btsas/ rgyal bo tshangs pas khyon gyi khu

pho'ong btsas so// de nas re zhig na rgyal gnyis ka'i dzakhrab 'khor na dga' ba'i rnga rdung bar byed de// slong ba rnams la'ang sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed do// de nas re zhig na kos la'i rgyal po gsal

rgyal gyis ma dag la rjes te/ tshangs pas byin gyi pho brang 'khor 'dir ci zhig khyung na 'di ltar dka' ston byed ces byas nas/ de dag gis kyang rgyal bo tshangs pas byin gyi bu pho btsas so zhes gsol to//
rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang de bzhin du d+his nas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal kyi bu mo btsas so zhes gsol te// de nas rgyal kho tshas pas byin gyis rgyal bo gsal rgyal la nya btang ste/ khyod
kyi bum btsas pa'i phyi mchod sbyin byed do zhes bdag gis thos la/ bdag ka'ang bu pho btsasakyis/ bu mo de bdag gi bu la byin cig dang/ de ltar byas naganyen du'ang 'gyur la/ ji srid
'tsho'i bar du'ang 'khon med par 'gyur rozhes byas so// de nas rgyal bo gsal rgyal kyis kyang de ltar bya'o zhes khas blangs so// de nas deganyis phan tshun du mdza' bo byas nas bde bar gyur te/
rgyal bo tshangs pas byin gyis khye'u btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u'i ming bde byed ces btags so// kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang bu mo btsas pa'i
btsas ston bya nas/ bu mo'i ming bde byed ma zhes btags so// de nas gnyis ka'ang bskyed bsrings nas/ re zhiganam thar rgyas cher skyes so// de nas khye'u des bu mo de la shal dang/
se mo do dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ rna cha dang mgul rgyan rnams bskur ro// de nas gang gatsho bumo de chen mor gyur pa de'i tsho/ des bcom ldan 'dus kyi bstan pa la dad pa red de/ 'dod
pa rnams la'ang nyes par blta bar gyur te// de nas des de dag la dris pa 2 kyi 'di rnams gang las 'ongs zhes byas pa dang/ 'khor rnams kyis kyang gtan tshigs dang bcas te rgyas par
bsnyad do// de nas de thos nas yab la gso' pa/ yab bdag na 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags te 1bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal gyis/ yab
kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol rgyal bos smras pa// bum gang ga phyir khyod btsas pa na/ nga bde bar gyur pas na 'din ngas bcas su med do// de nas ko sa la'i rgyalalo
gsal rgyal gyis rgyal bo tshangs pas byin lu pho nya btang ste/ bumo 'di ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis/ tshu shog la 'dalong zhig ces byas so// de nas re zhigan rgyal po tshangs pas byin
ba gyis dus btab ste/ da ste zhag bdun na khong gis/ khyod kyis bya ba dang bshad par bya ba gang yan pa de dag rgyas shag nyes byas so// de nas bu mo bde byed mas zhag bdunan bag mar len
nozhes zer ba'i gtam de thos so// de nas bde byed ma 'jigs shing skag lam dga' ste/ su khung zhes byas nas/ khang thog tu song ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su phyogs nas//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab go/ yang sus pa/ drang srong chen po thugs brtse thugs rjes gnas pa bsam gtana mdzad// 'dul mdzad zhi ba'i thugs ldan rab zhi
'dul ba'atshog mkhyen/ bdagamagon po khyod la skyabs su mchas kyisamagon khyod kyis// mgon med bdagan tshul bzhin na sang dag las dgrol dugasal/ de'i skabs
susangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ma mkhyen pa 'am/ mgazigs pa 'am/ ma rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su ma chud pa ci'angamedal/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang
ldan pa/'jig rten la phana'adogapa 'bazhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba zla med pa/ gnyis su ma gsung ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/
rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu ba bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi
bya// ma la shin tub naN/ bslu ba'i das bo bzhi la yun ring nas 'dris par byas l/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge 'i
[>sgra chen po skyegos pa/ yan lag rnam par sangs pa/ 'gro ba lha las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tugan
bar bya ba drug la gnas pa// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa// lam yan lag brgyad pa ston po/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu lamakhas pa//
stobs bcu'istobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyenadus gsum na
dusagasum dusangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jigarten la gzigs te/ sun chud/ sun dar/ sun 'phos shing 'dug/ sun nyam nga bar gyur/ sun gnad pa dang ldan sun 'phos pa dang/
nyam nga ba dang/ gnod pa dang ldan/ sun nasong du gzhol/ suzhingan song du 'bab sunangan song dubab/muni sa n gnas ong nas phyungs/mtho ris dang/ thar pa dang/ 'bras bu la gzhagaparakhya
sun 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lags drang bar bya/ su ni'aphags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor u0f38dun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ sun dge ba'i
rtsakha rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'artsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya sun yongs su smin zad pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzig
ba 'jug go/ 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus bas yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul khar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyus dus las yol ba med//
de nas bam ldan 'das kyis bde byed ma gdul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs te khyon nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de nas bde byed mas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob ste/ mngon par shes pa'i ng bsgrubs so// de nas bde byed ma 'dod pa'i khams las 'das te/ gnyen po
thob nas 'jigs pa me dwapa las/nas par gyur to// de nas re zhigan zhag bdun len te// bag ma len pa'i dus la bab pan/ rgyal po'i kha skye bo brgya phrag dum dang bcas nas lhags te mchod
spyin gyi stegs bu'i drung du 'os nas/ bram ze mdunan 'don gyis 'bras yos dang/ mar dang 1 yus kam grugs pa rnams kyi//de nas khye'u dang butshaganyis lag pa sbrel bar chad pa dang
bde byengam ngang pa'i rgyal bo 'dab ma brkyang babazhin namamakha lamano ra 'phags/ mo phul rnam pa snyatshog saston pasrogachags mas mthong ngo// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
rgyal dang/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang/ rgyal po'ibu bde byed dang/ gzhan yang sems can ltadamo la lhags pa rnams mchog tuyamtshan du gyur nas/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/
gsol ba btab pa/ bu mo khyodakyis chos 'di lta bu dga mngon sum du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod paspyod pa 'dzin mi srid kyis/ bzodapa mdzod cig ces byas so// de nas bde byed mnam mkha'
las babs nas/ skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug ste/ chos gang thosanasrog chags 'bum phragadu mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba lta bu'i chos bstan to// de nas bu mo bde byed ms pha la gsol
taM bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do// de nas de rab tu byung nas/ des brtson pa dang/ sgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas
pholamig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad ril ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i
chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas
gsar dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nan mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan ba/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsal bar gyur pa// rig pasasgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang/
[. ]mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dagabar rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang/ chags pa dang bkur sti lam lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing skrod pa[E]
dad gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// der bcom ldan 'adas kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka'astsal ba/ dge slong dag nga'i nyen b+hos kyi dge slong ma shes rab che bdang/ spobs pa che ba
rnams kyi mchog ni 'dilta ste/ dge slong dag bde byed ma'ado yin no// de nas dgoslong dag the tshom skyes te/ bAtson thams cad gcodapas nags rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus ba/
btsun pa bde byed mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des shes rab che ba dang spobs pa che ba rnams kyi mchog dubastan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/
bde byed ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshog sarnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/
bde byed ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gsanyams su myong bar 'gyurato/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par
smin par ma 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dag bdang mdakeb byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin
ba'i phung bo dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyarayang chudam za//
tshog sashang dus la bab pan// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dgason byungab 'dasaba'adusan/ bskal pa bzang bo 'dinyid la skye dgu'itshalo te waM thub ba na//
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasau ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla

named pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyerawa rA NA sa na drang srong smrapa'iro dgas kyi nags na rtenatsing bzhugs
so// de nas re zhigen/ den tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srungasakyibastanapa la rab 'byun gnas / des bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin
zlate lowi tese stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnamakhasrubs kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob bo// de mkhan po gang las rab tubyung ba de ni bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis shes
rab can gyi mchog tu bstan to// de nas des smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhanamo shes rab can gyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das 'od

srungs kyis bram ze'i khyi'ubla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyi skye dgu'i tsho longargya thub pan/ de bzhin gshegs ba rgyu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//
zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tubyun gnas / shes rab can rnams kyi mchog tu gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ dge slong dag ji

snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma bde byed ma 'de yin te/ des sbyin pa dang rab tu smin pa ngag byin pa des na rgyal po phyug po'i rigs su
skyes so// des lo khri tes stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig du nges par gnag
rnams ni rnam par smin nga 'ang gcig tu nges par gnag pa ra 'gyur ro// las gcig tunges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ngagacig tu nges par dgar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma
rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na lasagacig tu nges pa gnag ba rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams ngasal/ las gcig tu nges par dkarapa
rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par byasto/ dge slong khyedakyis de ltar bslab pa 'bya'o// bcom ldan 'dasakyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi'as te/ bcom ldan 'dasakyisagasudA
@#// pa la mngonobar bstod do mi sdug ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug
po rnams dad/ bo khrang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dbon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang
nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkurasti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri morabyas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin
pa dang lha ma yin dang// nam mkha' ldid dad mi 'am ci dad/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza'
dang zhalazas dang/ gzims cha dang/ gdan dang/ stun gsos dang/ smanathong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
kyi khyim bdagamagon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' r ban bzhugs so// de nas de'atshe mnyan du yodaban/ kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang/
rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa dang/ skye bo dang maMmang pos gang ba dang/ rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ nang 'khrug dang/ chom rkun dang/ mu ge dang nad rnams
med ba dang/ 'bras sa lu dang/ bu ram shing dang/ ba glang dang/ ma he dang ldan par 'dug// gnod pa med cing tshoram dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa 'a bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// de
nas re zhig na rgyal bo do btsun mo zhig dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do/ de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ btsun mo la bu chags naas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu len
pa dang bu byung ste/ bumomasdugaba'isna gras bcobargyad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// des de bas pa'i batsas ston byas nas/ mnga'asgyu zhes btags so// de nas gang gi tshe mthar gyis/
bag mar gtang ran par gyur pa de'i tshe/ su la byin na'ang de'i sdug ches pasaus kyang ma blangs so// de nas re zhig na lho phyogasanas ded dpon gang+gA zhes byab phyug btsan zhig 'ongasaso// de nas
rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyis blo skyes pa/ ded dpon gang+gA 'di ni 'di'o skyon gyi rgyus mi shes kyis/ ngas 'di de lasbyin gor mchag snyam mo// de nas rgyal pos mtshan mo mun sros pa dang/ gang+gA
pho nyas bku gnas bu mo de rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te chung marabyin no// de nas yA kang+ga la byin nas/ gang+gAA gang+gA bas zhes bya ba'i ming byung bar gyurato// de nas re zhig na ded dpon
gang phyi de nyid bar namanangs te/ bu mo de bltas na mchog tu mi sdug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang sgog par rgyur kyang rgyal po las bsams te/ dor ma phod nas bdag gi khyim 'ba'
zhag tu 'jog go/ de nas re zhigen ded dpon gang+gAdus ston zhige la chal to/ mdzag sde rnams kyi zheng du song ngo// mdzub sde rnams kyis kyang nang khrims bcas te/ su chud
ma dang bcas te skyed mos tshal gag mazhogi tum song ba mdzub sde rnams la chad par kar sha pa Na lnga brgya sbyin du gzhug go zhes byas// de nas g bdagag khyim du 'ongs nas/ mya ngan gyi khang
bu zhugs te/ lag pa la oM tshugs bcas nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas de blo skyas ba/ ma la bdag gis chad pa 'dra'i ban chos bya'o/ bdag gso ba de dag la bstan/
du marung ste/ mthong ma thag tu gtam ngan par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam mo// de nas gang+gAs sgo bcad do chad ba kar sha ba Na lnga brgyu khyer nas mdza' sde rnams kyi nang du song ngo// de nas bu mo
de yod mi bdag chen po skyes nas/ bdag 'tsho ba 'di 'dra bas 'tsho ba rarung/ gsan cing 'dug n khyam thab kyang sams ma bad la/ bdag kyang sems ma bdes/ da ni bdag gis
bdag gsad pa'i dus la bab bo snyam mo/ de nas thug pa khyer te khang phugs su 'gags su song ngo// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyise ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs
ba 'am/ mi rtags pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa tsa' nga ched la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pa dang ldan pa// 'jig rten la phan 'a gos la zhugs ba/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan
pa gcig tudung ba ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su ma gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snangabar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa//
'dul ba'i gzhagasum la mkhas pa// chu bo bzhi les brgyab/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhig zhabs kyi mthal shan tu brtan pa// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'ae bar byas pa
ma 'jigs ba bzhes mi 'jigs pa/ khyu'agag yang dag pa'i seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa// yan lag lnga rnam par spangs ba/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par ba das ba/ yan lag u0f97gdang
ldan ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yosasu rdzogs pa/ rtag par gnas bar bya ba drug la gnas pa// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi mi rtog gis phyag ba/ lam stan lag brgyad pa ston pa// mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu ts+tshas ba/ bsgyuphrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad
par du 'phags pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum dusangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rtan lagazigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni der/ snyan 'i gosangashang 'dug
mun nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ sun po bongs ba dang/ nyam nga ba dang/ gnod ba dang ldan/ sun ngan song du gzhol/ sunangan song du 'bab/ muni ngan song du
@#// bab/ sun ris ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang/ thar ba dang/ 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ sun 'dod pa'i 'dam du bya ba las lag nas drung bar bya/
sun 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug bar bya/ sun dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyed pa las bskyed par bya/ sun dge ba'i
rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa lag yongs su smin par bya/ sun yongs su sminatshan pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ 'dir snas pa/ rgya mtshoru kr-itu
rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal
byed kyi tshal na bzhugs pas 'od zer gser gyi kha dog can bkye ste/ sa khyim de ni ma stong shar ba bzhin du snang bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang der gshegs te mgul pa'i 'gag thagab krol
nas bu mo de dbugs phyung ngo// 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i gnas drug 'byung ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs l dang/ dbazhonegshegs pas gsungs ba'i chos 'dul ba dang//
ma'i skye ba dang/ 'phagos pa gnas par skye ba dang/ dbang po tshang ba dang/ dge ba'i chos la la dun pa dang/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'gi rten du byung ba yod do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bu mo de la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thog nas bu mo des kha dzagi tshogs la lta bab ri'i rtse mo mthon po rig ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon gsum/
byas/ de nas dad parod nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol tan bza' ang phu la go/ de nas bu mo de'i mi sdug pa med par gyur te/ bzang mor gyur nas/ lha'i bu mo bzhin du khang
thugs bod kyis snang bar byas te 'dug go/ bcom ldan bdas kyang slar gshegs go/ de nas mdzag sde bo rnams kyis blo skyes l/ gor ma chag par 'di'i chung ma ni mchog tu sdug ba zhig
na des phrag dog gi rang bzhin gyis chad pa 'jal ba dang bsdos te/ de bstan par mi 'dod kyis/ bdag cagags 'di chang snami mthun pas ra ro bar byas la/ lde mig rnams byas
te 'di'i khyim du song la chung ma blta'o snyam mo// de nas de dag gis chung gar ba sna tshomathun pas gtubum par byas nas/ lha khag rnams khyer te khyim du song nas sga rnams phye ste bu mo de
mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang ya mtshan dugyur to bsams pa/ gang gis 'di bdag cag la mi bstan ba na lus so snyam mo// de nas de dag phyir log ste/ gang+gA chang gi dbang gis gnad
log cing 'dug pa bslangs nas sa pa/ gang+gAkhyod kyi chung ma de ltar sdug pa na khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes byas so// de nas gang+gAlhag par yang ma dga' bar gyur te/ chad
pa'i ng bdag gis btsal la/ bdag la gtam ngan par yang gyur to snyam mo// de nas dga' bzhin du bdag gi khyim du 'ongs nas sgo phye sta chung ma la bltas pa na nags
tshal me tog rgyas pa'i zhing na nags kyi le'u mo 'dug ba bzhin du shin tu mdzes pa mthong shos dris pa/ bzang mo de ci zhig byas na bdal bu'agazugs khyad par can du gyur cig byas so// de nas ji
ltar gyur pa thams cad khyim thab la bar dade thos nas/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das la dad kha rnyed do// de nas re zhig na bu mo des mthar gyis khyim thab la gsal te/ bcomo ldan 'das kyi bstan
phapal rab tu byung nas/ des bartson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad bas phul mig lta ba'i 'a khor ba'i 'khor lo bde nyid g.yo zhing ma bstan bar rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnal
ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam bar 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yon bar rtsadachod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sangs nas/ dgra bcomo pa nyid mngon sum du byas to/
dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chagasadang bral bar gyur nas// gser dang bong bar mnyam pa// nam mkha' dpalag mthal du khadra'asems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan skyangs pa lta bur
bsal bar gyur ba/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubasabacosapa/ rogi pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ sos lang dag par rig pa thob pa/ sridi ba'i rnyed pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur sti/
ba06 la ma lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing skrod pa dang/ gus bar skya pa'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod/
pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rany+dzas las gang dag bgyis na/ des phyag bo'a'ogis su sus lagras/ las gang dag bgyison/ des mi sdug bar gyur la/rab
tu byung nas dgra bcomapa nyid mngon sum du brgyus 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rasgra nyid kyis ston tshorabs gzhan dag tutshogs redaci rkyen grubob dang ldan/
taM dba'i rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdonas zabar bong ba'i las dodrag byas pashingebasags bsan/ rasgra nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhagi gsi nyams su myong bar
'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par snyanepar ma 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam ba
smin par ma 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams nazon ba'i lung ba dang/ khoms dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhage la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//
lus can dag gi los rnams na// bskal pa brgyur yang chud maza// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba zhes
pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA ra NAsi na tshong dpon gyi chung ga gtum zhing bar ng la gzu lums can zhig 'dug go/ sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i/ rang sangs rgyas
sdug cing 'byongs pa rnams l snying brtse ba/ bsamatha'i gnas amal gyis 'tsho ba/ 'jig rtenan lon gnas gcig bu gas 'jig rten du byung sta/ de nas re zhig na rang sangs rgyas mi sdug pa

yig de'i khyim du song Da des mi sdug pa 'di lta bu nga'i khyim du ci 'dod cesanang du smyos brgyadanas khyim nas bskrad do// de nas rang sung rgyus des de la phan gdags pa'i phyir ngang pa'i rgyal po
bdab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha'il mngon par 'phags nas/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// de nas tshong dpon gyi chung ma 'gyod pa skyes de la bzod pa gsol te/ pashos
kyang phul nas smon lam btab pa// bdag gis rang sangs rgyas la sbyos brgyud pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin ba myong bar ma gyur cig/ 'di lta bu'i chos dag kyang thob par gyur cig/
bdi 'a sa kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston ba mnyes par byed nga ra gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dag slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i
dusan tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin ba de ni ra sgra 'di yin te/ des rang sangs rgyus la bshos bul ba de'i las kyi rnam bar snyan pas na rgyal po phyug po'i rigs su skyes so/
mi sdug pa'i tshig snyas te 1 khyim nas bskrad pa des ni mi sdug par gyur to// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi 'di la rab tu byung ste/ des der bslabs shing kha ton du
byas pa dang 2 bung po la mkhas pa dang/ khams la mkhas pa dang/ skye mched la mkhas pa dang/ rten cing 'brelaMbs 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la
mkhan par byas pa dang/ tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs ba des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams kyi rnam
par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par gnagapar 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges 'daka' ba rnams ni rnam par sminababang gcig tunges par dka' bar 'gyur ro// bas 'dren mams ni rnam par smin
dang 'dren mar 'gyura'o// dge slong dag de bsaMn las gcig tunges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las badren ma rnams sbas la/ las gcig tus par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad pa'i
bya ste/ dgaslong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag slongade dag yi 'angs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa rdzogasaso//sdomani/ rgya mtsho ni sna ma dang/ 'gan gsar thogs
bya sde snod gsum// grogs bshes rdzus te skyes pa dang// mdzes ldan dang ni ka yin// bzang ldan dang na yul 'khor srung// sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/
rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasal rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ bo brang bar gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong dbon rnams dang/ ded dpon/
rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lham min rnams dang/ ma mkha' lo rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti
byas / bla mar byas/ 'a mor byas mchod ba byas te/ lha dar klu dar kA gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams
kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan ng/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ sman
zong rnams bcos pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgya sa khyed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i
[&]mnyan du yod pa na/ ded dpon zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyamakha las chung ablangs nas/ ded dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur sbyod do// de rtse zhing dga' l dga' dgur spyod ba
tsha lasare zhigan deb sogs skyes pa/ bdag rje srid du lang tsho la bab pa de srid dun nor spel bar bya'o// lus rgas pa'i zhi bde bar 'khongs spyad par bya'o snyam mo// de nas red dngo na de gsog/

bakhor tshong ba lnga brgya dang rgya mtsho'i glu nyos nas chung ma dang bcas te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs so// de nas zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ mchod byed kyi nang du bu byung ste/ khyabu gzugs
bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas go denas de btsas ba'i btsas ston byas nas/ ming rgya mtsho zhes btags so// de nas re 'gan ded dpon de'i gru'i don grub nas nya zho med par rgya
mtsho chen po nas phyi 'khor te/ des gang gi tshakhyabargya mtshor skyes pa de'i tshe/ sa ded dpon du bskos nas ga'og khotshong pa lnga brgya dang rgya mtsho chen por btang ste/ de mthar gyis song
song ba las de grong dang/ grong rdal dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul ba'i dang/ rgyal po'i kho brang 'khor dang/ tshong dus rnams mthong nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin te/ kar sha pa Na lnga brgyas
gru'i glabyas nas rogs 'tshob mab lnga ste/ thungashol ba dang/ chu 'thug pa dang gnyan bu dang/ byi'u zul mkhan dang/ ruskya 'dzin pa rnams kyang khrid de/ de 'a na gsum du
dril bsgrags nas/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// des de dag rgya mtshon na bor song ba dang Da srin po nag po'i rlung gis kru de phu mda' bskor to// ded dpon rgya mtsho'i chu stags can
la dga' ste/ de dus lha 'che ba'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs skrag nas ston pa drug la gsol ba 'debs ba la zhugs kyang gru de rlung gis le bskor to// de nas re zhig na tshong
pa gzhan dag kyang lha stong nyid la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs te sa pa/ gu gang chu lha du' dang lha ma lha dbang chen dang/ dung zlong sna tshogs lhadangs la gnas pa'i klu mang de dga'//
bdag cagadad pa lags kyis bdag cag 'din 'chiba'i gnod gyur lages// myur du sdug bsngal 'di dagabasal te 'gro'o bo rnams ni bskyab par gsol// donas de dag gis de ltar smra sngagasabato/

kyang skyabs byed ba su'ang med do// de nas re zhig na dag bsnyan zhig gru de'i nangan 'dig razhis sas pa/ kyi ston pa drug dang lhagazhan dag gos kyang khyod la ci byar lang med kyis/ mngon sum du yod
pa'i lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lasnying nas skyabs su song zhig dang/ de khyod kyi skyabasasu 'gyur ro zhes byas so// de nas dad dbon rgya mal sogs pa tshong pa lngabargya bo rnams kyis skad
bsnyams te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabasagusong ngo// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyisanami mkhyon pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa'i m/ ma rtogs pa bam thugs
su mi chud pa ci'ang med la sangs rgyas bag ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten mkhan 'gas pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa// gcig tu dpa' ba/
zla med nga/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa// rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum l legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la
mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba rdza'aphrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i skabs kyimathil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la lun 'ang bo nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi/
'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dga'i seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa// yan lag lnga rnam pa sna skadas pa/ bgrob lnga bgalang dag par 'jus te/ lan la gadrug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin
ba drug yongs su rdzogs pa rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mar gyis gnas nga 'i/
snyoms par 'jug pa dag la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dwang ldan ng/ phyogs bcur grags bsu kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed babasakyang sa khyad nga ra du 'phags pa rnams
ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs/ su ni rgyud/ su nis/suni'athos shing 'dug/ sun nyamang bar gyur/ sun gnod pa
dang ldan/ sun 'bongs pa dang nyamang ba dang/ gnod pa dang ldan/ su'i ngan song du gzhol/ suni ngan song du 'bab/ su na ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang/
thar ba dang/ 'bras bu'agazhig par bya/ mun 'dod pa'i 'adam du byang las la gnas drangakhabya/ su 'phags pas bdumed pa' sa'akhags pa'i zhir bdun gyi/

dbang phyagal dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtse ba rnams m spyod ba las spyod par bya/cun dege ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las longs su smin par bya/ su niyongs su s+san 'ani ba las
rnam par grol bar bya snyam du la shes gzags 'jug go/ 'dir smras ba rgya mtshonus/namasal nas/ dusatshubs yol bar 'gyur yang sridi// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ sangs
rgyas dus las yol ba med// degs zhig nabcom ldan 'das rgyalakho rgyal byed tsholanang zhugs pas nyis stong las lhag pa'i 'od gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer bkye sa/
de dag gis tshong pa de dag kun nas snang bar byas so// bskal pa stong du yongs su bsgoms ba'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkyiste/ do dag/gseg bar dusanas/ srin po nag po'i rlung yang
zlog go/ de nas re zhig ded dpon rgya mtsho'akhru'i din thub nas/ nyazhayod pa rgya mtshorin po'inangs phyi 'khor te 'tshigasaskyo bar gyur ba de nyid kyi sbyin ba dad/ ratu smin pa dag
byin nas/ nyangu'i skyo be rnams dbugs phyung ste/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ dkren po dang/ sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams sim par byas nas/ tshong pa lnga brgya'i 'khorol gyis
bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang/ bslab bo dang/ 'bad bas phal mig lta ba'i 'khe'abo 'ang nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par ri gnas / 'du byed kyi rjes
pa thamasacad rnal ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'athor ba dang/ rnam par 'jog pa'i chos can yin bar rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thums cad sngangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyidamangen/
sumadu byas te/ dgra bcom pa khamaMs gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur zhus/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dngalagamatha'adu 'du ba'isims dang ldan pa/ tsan dan/
sas pa lta bur bsal bar gyur pa// ragi pas sgo ba skyabasabcom la/ rig pa dang/ mngon pa rang shes pa dang/ soso yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'irId pa dang/ chags pa
dang bkur sti la malta ba/dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams sematshodatsarirjedu ba dang/ gus par sma ri nasasu gyur to/ de nas dgeslong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tshom thams
cad gacod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa 'thom ldan 'das kyis rgya'atsholasogs tshod ltar rgya bo 'di dag sroga'aphangs pa stsal te/ 'bongs pa las yongs su bskyabs/
pa dang/ gzha' gsang ga mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag da ltar nga'adod chags dang bral ba dang
byabya/ zhe sdang dang bral ba dang/ gti mug dang bral ba dang/ skye ba dang/ rna ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba
ny+tsa dang yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grolal/ thams cad mkhyen pa// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang thob zin pa'i tshe/
ngas rgya mtsho la sogs pa tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di dag srog 'phangs pa phyin te/ 'bongs pa las yongs su bskyangs pa dang/ gti mug gzha' gsad ga mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das ba la bkod
'delta la ngo mtshar che ba tsa yod/ 'das pa'i dusan nga 'dod chags dang bcas pa// zhe sdang dang bcas pa// gtilug dang bcas ra/ skye ba dang/ rna ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/
ste sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal b dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnam las yongs su grol ba'ang tshong ba 'di dag 'de ngas gongagu bskyabs pa de legs par/ rab tu nyon

la yid la zung shog dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dgasngon byang nga 'das ba'i dusan/ rgya mtsho'a'i gram zhugen drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ dka' thubadrag po spyod pa// gsasu rtsa
pa'i ba dang 'bras bu za la/ gos su ra degs kyi g.yang gzhi dang shing shun gyon ba/ me'i sbyin srag byed pa zhig gnas so// de yang snying rje can bdag nyidareb/ chos 'dod la/ skye dgu la byams pa//

'phongs par gyur pa rnams la yongs su skyob pa zhig go de nas re zhige na wArANasa'i tshodapa lnga brgya rgya mtsho chen po zhing du 'gro 'dod bar gyur te/ de dag mthar gyis song song nas/ rgya mtsho'i
'bral du phyin pa dang/ de dag gsadrang srong de mthong nas dad pagyesate/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag rgya mtsho'i nang dumachis pa las/
'phyongs pa 'ga' shage byang bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis bdag cag yongs supaskyab par gsol zhes byas nas/ des kyang gnang ste/ de ltar bya'o zhes byas so// de nas tshong
pa de dag gis rin po che dag blangs nas 'dzam bu'i gling phyogs su chas so// de nas re zhagi na srin po nag po'i rlung gses kun tu bskor ba las/ drang srong des yongs su bskyabs so// de nas gru'i

den grub ste/ nyazhe med par bya'i 'khor nas drangasrong gi thad du phyin te sas ba/ kye drang srong chen po dka' ba sa'i bod pa dang/ snying rje'i rang bzhin 'asi cazhog bslab cing bzhugs/ des sas ba/
'jig rten long ba 'dren pa me datsang yongs su 'dren pa med par/ sems can mjal ba rnams grol kha dang mgrel ba rnams 'grol ba dang/ dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugasa'abyin pa dang yongs
sumya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sangs rgyas su gyurag ces byas so// de dag gis smas pa// nan khyod sangs rgyas su gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang dgongs par
gsol/ pAng song ba'i nus pa// de lta'adu'o// bcom ldan 'das mkha' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshade'i dus nadrang grong du gyur pa gang yin
pa de ni de yin no// tshong pa de dag rgya mtsho la sogs pa 'di dag yin te/ de'atsha'ang ngas 'di dag yongs su bskya bsaso// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi ring la rab tu byung// deb de/
dag gas dbang po yongs su smin par byas ba resan/ daltar dgra bcom pa 'di mngon sum du byas so// dge slongad ga de ltar las gtso'i tu sa bar gnag pa mas ni rnam par smin pa'ong ba/cag tu/
nges par gnag pa/ra 'gyur/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams m bar smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges pard 'bar 'gyur go las 'dren ma rnams na rnam par sminapa'i ng 'dren mar/
'gyur ro// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag ba rnams dang/ 'as 'drenas rnams sbyangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhigal gtad par bya ste/ dge slong
khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do
snamazhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho branga' khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong dbon rnams dang/ ded
dpon rnams dang/ wA rnams dang u rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ malem tsa rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ chu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nAm mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams
sa mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasabasod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bzad ng/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ na bod
rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pan/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyin dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'itsam
du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cade dmang la longs spyod tshe ba/ yos su 'dzin pa yasagaMng rgya chab/ rnam thos kyi khu'i nor dang ldan pa// rnam thos kyi bu'i zhir dba'agranapa zhig gnas pa
des rigs mnyam pa laMs chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/bu btsas so cog shi'o/ de'i tshe/
gnas brtan m 'gags pakhyom deba'agrulalo// de nas khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa/gnas brtan ma'agagaso ba'adzibasod nams kyi rnam par smin pasatsho bar grags pa yin gyis/ ga'akhade bdag
ga bu btsas bar gyur na/ 'di'i slob mar dbul le zhes 'di'i ja gsol ba gdab bo snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag des gnas brtan m 'gags pa khyim gyi nang du spyan drarwa//
te bshos gsol nas gsol ba btab pa/ gnas brtan gal te bdag bu bas tem guman gnas brtan gyi slob mar dbul 'a zhes byas so// gnas brtan ma 'gags pas skyasar/de ltar dam
bcas pa ma brjed nga ra gyis shig/ des phyis re zhig na yabartse zhing dga' 'a dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur sbyong ra las/ chung ma la du chags nas/ de'i 'u sa la dri bsungam
po byung ngar gyur to// de nas re zhigan zla ba brgyad dang dgu len pa dang bu byung ste de khyo' gzugs bzang zhing brten sdug la mdzes pa/ lha'i sna ma'i me tog gi ral chung gyon pa zhig btsas
de nas de btsas ra 'i btsas ston byas nas/ sna ma zhes ming btags go/ donas gnas brtan ma'agags pa khyim gyi nang du bshos la spyan drangs nas khye'u de de la yul go/ de nas gnas
brtan m 'gags pas de 'a chos gos tshon can dag byin te/tshe ring bar gyur cig ces legs su smon pa'i ng byas so// de nas gangagitshabatsa gnas 'badun 'don pa de'i tshe/ pham gnyis kyis gnas brtan/
ma 'gags pa 'a phu' lato/ gnas brtan ma 'gags pas kyang rab tu byung nas yid la byed pa Ti'u nga phogaste/ des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas 'a mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'kho
00 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan pa rarigs/ 'dupyodakyi rnam pa thams cad ralab dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa 'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa
thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsar dang bong ramanyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag
mthil du 'dra ba'i sa mas dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsal bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dnga mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa
thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur sti lami lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cingarjed pa dang/ gus par skya ba'i gnas su gyur to// de'ang

dbang po rnon po zhig sto/ gang gatsho phyag dar khrod kyi gos 'drung pa de tsho/ khab lan ra 'dzugs pa la rnam pa rathar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar byed do// de nas phyis razhagazha/
gnas brtan ma 'gags pas bsgo ba/ dugatsage song la chu klung khang ldan nas chu lang zhig ces byas so// de nas dge tshul pa sna mas bum pa khyer te chu klung lang ldan gyi 'gram du song/
denas khrus byas te/ bum pa chus bkang nas nam mkha' 'byung ste/ chod 'gaban bum pa sngon du btang la/ dge tshul pa snam phye ngan 'ong ngo// choda'ago'an de tshul bsam sngon du 'gro la/
bum pa phyi bzhin 'ong ngo// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'dasand du yang dag 'jog las bzhangasanas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la chos ston te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe
dang ldan pa shAri'i du la nga ka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu dge tshul de dran pa dang ldan pa/ dbang po shin tumanyam par gzhag pa bum da chus bkang ste 'ong ba 'di mthong 'dod chags zhe
stangarab spangs shing// ma rig pa dang bral nas ni// lus kyi tha ma 'dzin byed pa// de nichu chun rab tu mdzes// gang gi ching [$]ma ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du dge tshul
pa sna ma bstod cing bsngags pa de'i tshe/ dag slong dag the tsom skyas te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snam 'dis las gang dag bgyis
na/ des gzugs bzang zhing nga lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang/ lta'i sna ma'i me tog gi ral chung 'tshal bzhin du skyes la/ dbang po rno ba dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/
