bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sna ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed pa'i rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dnga' rgal bzhani du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i
las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ snam nyid kyis 'a sa byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar gyur te/ dge slong dga' sa byas shing bsags pa rnams
na phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par sman par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khamA dang/ rlung bde baA la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shang bsags pa rnams ni
zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi 'a sa rnams ni// ngaskal pa brgyar yang chung gi// tshogs shing
dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du sman par 'gyur da ga gong dang sngon byungang 'das pa'i dus na/ bsal nga dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcog/
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'du'o ba'i kha 'a ra ba/ blan ma dang/ lha dang
mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnam da ra gzigs zhes bya ba 'jigarten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brangaganyen yod na rtan cing bzhugs so/ de nas re zhig na ded dpon zhage/
gnas pa de gzhon nu'itshanas rang tu byung ba'i sems skyes pa las/ de rab tu 'byung ma nus nas/ gang gi tshags par gyur pa de'i tsho'agyod pa skyes te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa
la rang tum byung ba na bdag gis ma 'a gas par byas so snyam mo// de nas des dbu sku dang sen mo'i mchod rten la sna ma'i me tog btags so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
gaThagisanyan thos kyidge 'dun dang bcas pa 'a 'ang bshos gsol to/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nasazhu lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ sems ba spyod pa dang/
sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed
par gyur srog mamanyes par byed par ma gyur cig/gang gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba der gzhon nu'i tshanas 'phags pa'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur cig ces byas so/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od

'a7 srungs kyi ring la rab tu byung ste/ des de nga la khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltan las gcig tu ngos par gzhag
pa rnams rnam par smin pa dang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu sa par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'drenama rnams/
ma par smin pa'i ng 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bsan las gcig tu nges par ganagapa rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tunges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la
gtad par bya ste/ dgeslong dag khyed sa doltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis deskad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yir ngas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
bstod do// pagan gser thogs zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la// rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen ro rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho branga' lo gyim mu
dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dad/ lha rnams dang/ kun ms dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lta ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding+gi rnams dang/ mi 'am ru rnams dang/ lto 'phyo
chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ blamar byas (ri moras/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lham yan dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/
mchod cade shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod namasachen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ stun gsos dang/ sman khong
rnams brnyes pa na thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas lamanyan du yod pan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs so//
de'i tshom zha du yod pan khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzi pa yangs shing rgya chog/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang
'gran pa zhig gnas pa de la bu'ang mod/ bumo'angamed pas/ de lag pa la om tshugs bcas te/ bdag ga khyim nor dum dad ldan du khrin gyis kyang/ bdag la bu'ang med/
bumo'ang yod pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tun bumed pa'i phyir rab dog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems khongs suchud cing 'dug go/ de
nas dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ ltasa mkhan dang/ mdza' bo dang/ gzhon dang/ rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lta la gsol ba thob chug ces de la bsgo'o/ 'jig rtenana'ang gsol ba btab pa'i/
rgyus bu dang bu mo skyo bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yodamod kyi/ de'ang de lta ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zanen/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod pa ra 'gyur ba'i rigs so// yon gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhon/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chakos langs
te phrad pa dang/ ma dus la bab ring+gazlamtshan dang ldan pa dang/ driza 'os pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so// de'angagasol ba 'debu
pa lhur byed 'di 'dug la/ somasarnyan zhig kyang soms can gyi rogasasha nas sha'iphos nas/ de'i chung ma'i steratshulos so// bdamed ma khas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mong
pa ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lngagazhen/ rgyas pa chags pa'i ngashos la/mchags pa'i ng shes pa dang/ dus kyang shes la/ zlamtshan yang shes pa dang/ buchags pa yang shis pa
nga/ gang las bu gnas pa shes pa dang/ khye'u yang shasal/ bu mo'ang shos pa lta/ gal te khye'u yan nan ltagayas 'gas su rten cing gnas// gal te bum pa nanan phyug yon
legs su rten tshang ba/nas so// de nas de dga' sanas khyim thab laskrun pa/ [R]bo bdagal sras chags te/ bdagagi rum g.yas 'gasan rten cing gnas pa las khye'ur 'gyur par nges
kyis dbyas pa bskyed du bkol nas byas so// de'ang dga' chos te ro stod na bte// lag pa la/yan lanabargyus/ bdag gis yun ring po nas smonasmon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo/
bdag gi bu rung bar shog cig/ mi rung mgyur cig// bdag gi khyab dag byed par shog cig/ gsos pa'i lan phyire gso bar shog cig nor skal la spyod par shog cig/ bdag gi rogs
rgyunarang du gnas par shog cig/ bdagacal du 'das shi bo'i 'obag tuyang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung/ ltung yang rung// sbyin pa dag byin l/ bsod ms dgacus nas/ dganyis gang
dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba de 'dasong zhig ces yon sbobar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do// de nas des bu tshab sa bar nas/ bu'i rim gro khyaba'i phyir khang bzangs kyi snying dum

ras su bzhag ste/ grang ba'itsho grang ba'i yo byadan+nams dang/ tshaba'i tshatshaba'i yo byada rnams dang/ sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dad/ tacang kha kha ma yin pa rnams dang/ ta cang skyarab m ni
da @#// pa rnams dang// ti cang lan tshwa ba ma yin pa rnams dang/ ta cang dngar bam yin pa rnams dang/ tanang ro tshab ma yin pa rnams dang/ ha cang bska bam yin pa rnams te/kha'
dang sbyar ba dang/ lan tshwa dang/ dngar ba dang/ tshar dad/ bska band pa'i zas rnams kyis bstan cing/ dga' dang semo des lus rnam par grubasate/ lta'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyud

bzhin du khri'i steng nas phre'i stang dang/ phri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i stang du rgyu zhing/ 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang/ des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skadatsa' ngami thos par byas so// de nas zla ba brgyud ma
dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khyo'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/ de'i lag pa gnyis la las kyi rnam par sman pa

'as byung ba'i gsaragyi dong tsamtshan ms btab pa gnyis byung ste/ gang gi tshad phyung ba de'i tshodwayang gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/khye'u 'di 'i nang ja nang
gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/'o du rnams nare/'di btsas ma thag tu 'ag pa gnyis la las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung pa'i gse ragyi dong tses gnyis byung bas na/de'i phyir na khye'u
! 'di'i ming 'gon gsar thogs zhe gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u laganagasar thogs pang na'atshoba'imam gnyis dang/ num bsnan pa'i ma ma gnyis dang/ dri ma 'khru ba'i man
gnyasi dang/ rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtadas de mam brgyad kyis 'o ma dang/ zho dang mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snying lu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang
do cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma ni du skyo drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan l/ dag zhung bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa
snying rje can zhig ste/ gang gi tshe srad du 'gro ba de'i tshe/dge sbyong dang bram ze dang/ bkren pa dang sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams mthong n lag pa gnyis brgyanas/ dal gsar
dngul rgyu dor tsamtshan mas btab pa'i phung po de dag la ji tsam dgos pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to/ degaphyis re
'gan la'u lab na gser thogs rgyal burgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/
dpa ngu da bzang po brgyad rus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyanapa/ nyim stong bas rtog pa'i 'od manga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/
mthong m thag tu des b.rom ldan 'das la soms dga' ba skyed do// dga' ba bskyadanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi
[4 9} ]spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ des (tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ slob dpon bdag na bcom ldan 'das na
cha thos kyi de 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol bar 'tshal// gnas brtan kun dga' bos smras pa/ du kar sha pa tsha dgos so// de nas khye'u lag na sar thogs sangs rgyas la sogs/
[]3 pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi skyan sngar 'grangs te/ lag pa ba gnyis brkyang nas/ gsar dngul gyi phung po chen po stangs so// de nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang/ dag slong gzhan dag
dang/ gnas brtan kun dga' bos d mthong anas/ mchog tu mtshan du gyur to// de nas khye'u lugan gsar thogs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong gi dge 'dun bshos kha gol
nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas
rgyu 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba dolta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u lag na gsar thogs kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po ti de yi shes rdorjes
bcomanas/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bdon pa mthong nas/ sa nye du rnams la longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' byas to/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ bkrin ba dang/
sdus gtsang 'khongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol to/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byunas/des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas la ma lha
ba'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad ril ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos
can yin par rtsad chod de/ na mongs pa thams cad sbyangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas ta/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas//
gsar dang bong bar mnyom pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sa mas dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbyangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubasabcom la/ rig pa dang
mngon par shes pa dang/ so yang dag par ragal thob pa/ srid pa'ired pa dang/ chags pa dang/ ba sti la mi lta ba/ dang po dang rta dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod
cang rjod pa dang/ gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dag slong dang tho rtsom rgyas te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus la/ btsun pa rab gsor
thogs kyis las gang dag bgyisin/ dos 'di'i sug pa gnyisil gsar gyi dong tso mtshan mas btab pa gnyis byungal/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyidi mngon sum du bgyis 'gas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgamyong dga' ba na gse ra thogs nyid kyis sngon tsho rangs gzhan dag tu tshogs red cing rgyan grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzha
'byung la/gdonami za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ lag na gser thogs nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur to/
dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam bar smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ dag spong dag
las dag ba dang mi dag ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ sku mchod rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams na/
bskal pa khagyur yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzung ngo 'dit+todi/
la skyo dgu'itsholo ltakhro thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten khyon pa//
rgyas bu 'dul ba'i kha la sbyar ba/ bla na med pa/ lta dang no rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wArANas na drang srong
[n ]snab ri dgas kyi nagasan rtan cing bzhugs so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs sangs rgyas kyi 'a phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i ma bzhin du
nga po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'dasas/ rgyal po'i sa de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas te/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas
pa'i mchodartenakhor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten de'i dus ston byed pa na/ rgyan po pa zhig gis gso ragyi deng
gnyis mchod rten de'iso lag gi la btags sago/ de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal tasmon lam btab pa/ bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa do dang dar lag pa la gsar yod pa kho nar gyur cig ces
byas so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag snyam du sems/ de'i tshade'i dusan rgyan po par gyur pa donalegan gsarathogs 'di yin te/ sa mchodanal gsor
gyi dong tseganyis btags pa des n 'di lta bu'i khyad par can du gyur to// smon lam btab pa des n de ltar dgra bcom pa 'de mngon sum du byas so// dag slong dag de ltar n las gcig tu nges
par bzhag pa rnams nazim par smin pa'i ng gcig tu ngos par gzhag par 'gyur ro// lasagacig tu ngos par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa rang gcig tu ngas nga ra dkar bar 'gyur ro//
las 'dran na rnams rnam par smin pa'i ng 'drenamar 'gyur ro// dag slong dag de bas las gcig tu nges par gnas pa rnams dang/ lasa'adramananas sngag la/
las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya so/ dag slong byed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag slong de dag
yarangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'a mngon da ra bstod do////bam po ngacu dgu pa// sde snod gsum pa zhes bya nga ni/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das la/ rgya' re rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug pa rnams dang/ ngo branga' khor gyi rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ dad dar na rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/
rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang/ ldan yan rnams dang/ nam mkhaMng lding rnams dang/ mi'am ru rnams dang/ lta 'phya chen pams kyis bkur sti byas/ byamarabyas/ ri mor byas/
mchod pa byas te/ lta dang/klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'amatsadang/ lta 'phyichan po rnams kyis mchodatsangashes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
bsod nams chen pa dang ldan po/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims cha dang/ gdan dang/ snyun gsos dang/ sman zong rnams b.rus pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ma' du yod/
ka pan/ rgyal byed kyi tshal mang dag na gon ra dwa phras sbyin gyi 8/ dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/// de'i ma nyan du yin pan ko sa 'ang rgyal de gas la rgya'i rgyal pa byed de/ de'i ring la
ra byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ pading dang/ la'i gsad dang shu bo dang ma nang ra sa gangang dang/ rtsod pa dang 'thub pa zhwa nga dang/ 'phrug pa dang/ nang 'brug dang/ chen kun dang/ mu ge
dang/nadanams re da ra dang/ 'dras sA ru dang/ su ram shing da nga grang dang/ ma to dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnodapa mo da rung tshoram dkrus 'o// bu ga tsage pa la bya babazhin du rgyal srid skyongs
so// de nas re zhige dan de btsun mo dang lhan cig turtse zhing dga' ga' dgur spyodado// da rtsa zhing dga' la draga' dag bur spyod pa las// btsun mo la bu chags nas/da zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'an pa
dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gos su chos gos tshon can gyon 'a/ dpaM slong gi cha lugs can tshorabs dran pa zhig btsas so// de nas rgyas ma thag tu dris pa// mnyan du yod pa 'di bon na bcom
ldan 'das dang/ ltar 'i bu dang/ mo'u 'ga' gyi bu dang/ 'od srungs dang/ kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams bzhugs amazhes zer ro// de nas de'in ya mtshan du
gyur te dga' bas rgyas nas smras pa// dur nyan du yodapa 'di bsan bcom ldan 'das dad na thos chen pa rnams bzhugs sa zhes byas sa// de nas ra 'gan don da rgyal dgaga' rgya'a'
[; g]/ gso' te/ khyod kyi sras gosasu chos gos tshon can tsha' ba dag sbyong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran pa zhig btsas te/ de bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen de rnams/
ga 'a bzhugs pa'i ng med do zhes byas so// de rgyal po gsal rgyalags bu del phan gdags pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das can thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos 'a sngan dra=
se nas bcom ldan 'das dag slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dag slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyib das gal nga dar gshags du byon
nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// de nas kos la'i rgyal pags 'argyal gyis bu phang par blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar drin saso///
bcom ldan 'das bdag gi du'adi btsas ma thul te bcom ldan 'das dang ka thos chen pa rnams dran lags so zhes gsol te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu de'i sde snod gsum pa khyodand/
mad par gyur cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyu'a mchog
tuya mtshan du gyur to/ de nas gangag tshabatsas nas 'badun 'an pa de'itsi/ chos gos tshon na de dag nyidi na bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang/
pasgrung pa dang/ 'bad pas nga 'a mi ga lnga pa'il bor ba'i khor 'a 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par ra gnas / 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad l ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor pa dang/
rnatshar ra'ajig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sus nas/ dgu bcom pa nyidi mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khamasaM gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral la/
gyur nas/ gse ra dang bong bar n nyan pa// nam na yab dang 'gamatha' du 'drapa sams dang ldan pa/tsan dan sbrangs pa lta bur bsal bar gyur pa// rig pas sgo nga'i skyabs bcom pa// rig pa dang

mngon pa rang shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'irId pa dang chags pa dang/ bkur sti la mi lta ba/dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cingarjod pa dang gus
nga ra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ de nas dgaglong dag thatsom skyes te/thartsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngasnod gsum pas las gang dag bgyis na/dag chos
gos tshon can 'tsha' 'a/ dag gleng gacha 'ul/sa can tshe rabs dran bzhi du bsus te/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bas 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dag slong dag sde snod gsum ra 'dikyis sngon tshorabs gzhan dag tu tshogs stod tsangerkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba'argal bzhin du 'byung 'a/ gdonami za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags lA
na sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhi ba'i nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas/shang bgags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyis
[% ]]'i 'gal rnam pa smin par 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ mo'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur to/ 'as dag ba dang mi dag babyas shing bsags pa rnams ni bon pa'i/
phung bo dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//
'bras bu 'di du smin par 'gyur// dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa bzang po 'dinyidi'i skye dgu'i tsho'akhro thub pan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshags pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha 'a sgyurab/ bla namedang/ ltadangani rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcon ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes byab

'jig rten du byus degrong khyer wA rA NA sin drang srong smra ba'i ri rigs kyi zhag gsan rtan cing bzhugs si ko/ de nas re zhi nargya' ra kri kri'ibudang srangasnangar song ngo// de nas des sangs rgyas bcon ldan
'das sku skyes buchan po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis 'debs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cusamadzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gangegs brgyan pa/ rta'i steng ngas lhag pa 'i 'od/
mnga'ab/ na po che'i rang 'gro nga lta bu kun nas po brang pan nga nas/ mthong ma thag tu da dad pa skye sa'o// dad pa skyes nas bcon ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tsha' te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bga' nya' dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs suchud nas/ 'khor ba 'a sa skyo bar 'gyur ba
da ltadu'i chos bstan te de thos nas 'khor ba la zhes par blta ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'a yon tan du blta bar gyur to// danas rgyal po'i gsa' te/ rang ngadag bcon ldan la/
kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na/ gnang bar n dzad du gsol zhes byas so// rgyal pos smras pa// khyod ring po ma thogs par rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur dgos pas/ 'dinanges nga ces
suchod do/ bus smras pa/ rgyal srid nyes pa mang po dang ldan pa// chos kyi dgrar gyur pa bdag 'a ni 'tsha' gyis/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tum 'byung dum gnang ngo//
denas rang kyis na gnang nas des zhag gcig dang/ gnyige dang/ gsu ma nas zhag drug gabar du kha'atshos so// da nas de'i zla grog ba rnams kyis/ rgyu' de la gso lato// lta
khyon da ra mdzad du gso 'a/ sra ga 'dirang tungungan 'a gas kyi/ de'ur 'dar 'gum nan 'gas so// donas rgyal pos gnang nas dam 'charab dugasta/ nam khyod snga snod gsum na langs kyi
ka bya// bar dud dang 'phrad dus 'ong gicesang sgo'o// de nas re zhig na de yad kyis gnangs/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung sta/ das brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/
'bad ra sa ring po na 'go pa'i sde snod gsum labs taM/ rig pa dang grol bar sgrub chos ston par gyus/ da'adasnyam dus nasato/ ma la bdag gi sngon dam bcas pa gnyer dgum goras chag
sAmanas/ de yang kyi thad dusong phradanas dris pa/ bu cung zad 'bas pa lta yod dam/ des smras pa// sde snod gsum lebs 'a bas so// de nas des ya nga la chos de lta bu bstan te/ de thos
rgyal po mgu bar gyur to// de nas dga' ba skyes te smras pa/ bugacig khyod la ci dgos/ des smras pa/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dngabacas pa spyan drangs la yo byad drug/
zla'abu'i 'go/ rgyar dogs pa// rgyal ro pho khra ngan chos ci dga' bgyisangashage/ de nas sde snod gsum pas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring 'khor nyi khri dang bcas te/ zha' brag dbrang ngos
ga par du sa nag dge slongar re la'ang yo byad drug drug phul lo// da nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon 'am btab pa/ bdag daltar dka' ngas rang du byung ba thob nas/ da nga zhan shog/
pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa' bkur sti byag pa'i dag pa'i chu dang/ sems bskyed pa dang/ sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong nga 'dasi naM/ bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa
de dang der gos su chos gos tshon can gyen 'a// dge sbyong gacha 'u'ub sa 'di dang ldan te/ tshoras dran par gyur rul ga res byas te// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dgagro nga dgaji/
snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po kri kri'i bur gyur pa la drug yazhe pa dan sde snod gsum pa 'di yazhi/ rgyud nyid kyis phyug po'i rigs su skyes te ]gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes
ba dang Datsho rabs dran par gyur to// dag slong dag de ltan la sa gcig tu nges par gnag da rnam san rjen par sazhi pa'i du gcig tu nges pa ra ba nag da ra 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par
dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// 'as 'dren mchan gan rnyem par smin pa'i ng 'drenan ra 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na 'as gtsayed du nges
par gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams sngangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lan ngon par bstod do// grags 'ashas zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das 'a/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyimi rnams dang/ tshong dpon nams dang/ ded dpon nams dang/ ltarnanas/
dad/ kun s dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lham ya rnams dang/ ma mkha'aldang rnams dang/ ma'agatsa rnams dang/ lta 'phuchen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas
blamar byas/ mir byas/ mchod pa byas te/ ltadang/ kludang/ gnodasbyin dang/ ltam yin dang (nam mkha' lding dang/ mi na ba dang/ lta'aphye chen ro rnams kyis mchod mi shes pa'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das bsod namasan pa dang ldan pa/ nubaza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims cha dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gses dang/ smanabrong rnams bas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ma shun
du yodang na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshor khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs so// de'i tshomanyan duyod pan ded dpon phyogatsang noranang 'a' ngos sprod cha'/ yongs su

'dzin pa yasu shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnamazos kyi bu bzhir dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigasamanyam pa las chung ma byas nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtsa ring dga' la
dga' dgur spyod do// de'adzinu gomi bzad ra/sa gnod pa byung ste/ slong bas kyang mis ma rUd do// ltasa mkhan rnams kyis kyang char 'bab par bstan pa'i s/ re zhig na ded dpon de'i chung

la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu len pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/ gang ba ni par khye'u de ba/
[po]pa de la 'dun pa nas than pa med pa 'gyur to// de nas de 'i grags pamanyan du yod dmatha' dag tu rgyas pa gyur to// de nas debatsas pa'i btsas ston byas pas/ 'di'i ming skadag da sa zhes ming

'dogs par byed de nye du rnam san ro/ 'di'i grags pa kun tu ny+tsas pas na/ de'i phyi'i khye'u 'di'i ming gragasabashis ba gdab sa so zhes zer// de nas khya'agrub gang sa ra na'atshoba'i mam gnyis dang
mum bsnan pa'inamaganyisi dang/ drim 'phruba'in mgat+tase dang/ rtsiba'inam gnyis te/ mam brgyad la gtadonas/ dam ma brgyad kyis 'on dang/ zho dang/maradang/ na mar dang/ mar gyisnyo'i

khu dang gzhan yang yo byad ci khyad par bzang ngo cog gis baspyod bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin skya drag par gyur to// degs gang gi tshikhyo'u grags bshes cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ rgyal bu rgyal byed
tshil du don zhagi lasong/ de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpo byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa
'od 'dom gang gis brgyanab/ mi stong pas lhag pa'i 'od manga' ba/ni chu'i ri bo 'grob lta kun nasabazang ba mthong nas/mthong ma thag tu dedad pa gso// dad pa skyes nas ngacom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go des bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba'as skyo bar gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos
nas 'khor ba la nyes par blta ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan dung lta bar gyur te/ phan la gso'anas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rang du byung sta/ des
[+ ]brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'dangs pho'amagi lA pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor 'a 'di nyidigayo zhing mi brtan par gnas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad 'od dang/ ltadab dang/ rnam par bod
ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa chos can yin pa ra rtsa dachod do/nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs nas// dgra bcom ra 'di mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khar ba gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
bar gyur nas/ gsar dang bong ba mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang 'gan h+pha'i du'adra ba'i sa dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbyang g pa lta burab sal bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa// mi
pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa// srid pa 'irid pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnan pas kyis mchod 'di da
pa dang gus dar sma ba'i gnas su gyur to// de'amachab gat+tagi 'as chuyan lagangargyad dang ldan pa byung// des na de la skom pa'i gnod pa med de/ gang gi tsha tsha ba'i dus su dag song gom pa rnams

ba gung snyams la dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dab de'i tsho'ang de ma 'ong ngo// de nas de dang bcas pa'i ngage 'ong rnams kyis dris pa/ ci'i phu khyod 'asgom pa ji bzhedamad shes byas so// des sman pa/ bdag
gi na chab gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ste/ des n bda gnas kos dga'i gnod pa me dad denas dgare nga da te/ thon las cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
la zhus pa/ btsun pa grags bshas 'ae las gang dag bgyisan/ des gabrugs bzang zhing blta na sdug lamadzes pa dang/ mcha bab nyas 'as chab yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung la/rab tu byung nas
kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dgaslong dang/ grags bshasa'adi kyisago bo ras gzhan dgatu tshogs rnyid podakyashagrub pa dang ldan to/
dba'argal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi sra bar 'ong ba'i las de dag spyas shing lasal dag pas na/ grags pa gnyid kyis las byas pa lasags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myodabar gyur
ta dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par ni 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/
las dgang dang mi dge ba byas pa'i ngag gas ra rnam sa ni zin pa 'i phung po dang/ kham sa dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la ma ra ran par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams na bskal pa
brgyar yang chudam za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dag slong dgasngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa bzang po 'dinyidi laskya dgu'i tsha le
nyi khrikhrub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs ra ris ngas rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtenamkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha le skyarab/bun med pa/lha

dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de grong khyer wArANasazhi drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyin ba khag rtenatsari bzhugs so// de nas re zhig tshong dpon gyi bu zhig

dag klong rgan po zhig la rang du byung ba las/ de'ang le lo can zhig ste/ gzhan la de bsnyen bkur byed mi 'dod do// de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gnas brtan de nyid kyi ngosnyan bkur byed
par bskos pa dang/ de bdag ni bsAn bkur byed pa yin no snyam durgya cher 'dzin to// dge slong chos rgan pa rnams kyi bstan bkur len par byed pa nas/ de'i dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams brad de
phyis re zhig na nad kyis btab pa dang/ gnas brtan gyis sman pa'i lung bzhin du san mar budanas/ de mtshan mo sgom lta bu bya gtol mad nas chu btung snyam ste/ bdag gi chu snod kyi drung
du song na chu med par mthong ngo// de bzhin du mkhan po drang/ slob dpon dang/ dge 'dun gyi drung tshang du songan de dag kyang chu med par mthong ngo// danas re zhig na chu klung
zlog byed kyi 'gram du songan de yang chu med par gyur te/ de mi dga' bar gyur nas// bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams skyo ba skyed pa dang/ dad pas byin pa lci bar
bstan pa'i phyir chu klung zlog byed kyi pha rol na shing lhag yod pa la'adzegs te/ ras shigader btags nas/ rang gi lag rnams bsam sa te/ las la rten cing 'dug go/ de nas
zhigan phyi de'i par ma'angs pa dang/ gtam de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bsnyad do// de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis skabs de thos nas
mi dga' bar gyur te/ phan tshun du bsnyad do// de nas de'i mkhan posachubyon na de'ang ma mthong ngo// donas de mi dga' bar gyuranas/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs la gsol
to/ bcomaM ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis ga rdungs shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas khang sbyong gis ga ts+tshabardungs pa dang/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'duna rnams/
'dus so/// grong khyer wArA NAsi thog thag tu yang gtam de grags te/ sems can 'bum phrag du ma 'dus so// de nas re zhig ga na de'i mkhan pos gral du bon gyi mdun du 'dug tu
btsu gnas / ril ba spyikhrul gas chus bkang stabyin s/ bu chu 'di dge 'dun 'a brims shig ces byas so// de nas 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong ba des skyo bar gyur pa de nyid
kyis bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la dad pa bskyedas bsamapa drag ngosachud dge 'dun la bremasaso// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la phan gdags pa'i phyir
phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu brgya nas// 'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa'i phyag gse chu de bzhas te/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis kyang blangs na/ 'on
kyang zad par mgyur go dge 'dun thams cad la drimasan rang brad pa rim gyur to// de nas lta dang rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul ya mtshan can des thongs/ srog chags 'bum phrag dun
bden pa mthong bar gyur to// de'irgyud la'ang dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams sor chudoparagyur to// gang gi mo nad sos pa de'i tshe/ des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dag bdun chus madri' bar
byas te/ la khri nyis stong gi bar du des dge 'dun la chu bris so// de nas phyis ro zhigan 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe smon lam btab pa/ dag pa'i rtsa ba dang/ sums bskyed pa dang/
sbyin par byaba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'disan/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srus kyis bram gro'i khyo' blam 'a// bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tsho'o brgya thub pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo ba ga ra'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed
par ma gyur ci'i/ padag bamacho ba'i phra gnas kyang chuyin 'og brgyadadad ldan pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag dzasnyam du
sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni grags dgas 'di yin te/ des ' khri nyis stong gi bar du dge 'dun la chu brigs te sngon lam btab pa des n/ tsha'adi la na chab 'i
phrag nas chu 'byung la/ rgyu de nyid kyis ni dgra bcom pa nyidi mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltan lasagatsagi tu nges par gnag pa rnams nam ral zhe pa'i ng gcig tu nges nga ra gnag
par 'gyur// las gog tu nges par dkar ba rnams rnam par smin pa dang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuro// 'as 'dren rnams na rnam par smin pa'i ng 'dres mar 'gyur/ dge
slong dag de ngan las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'drenam rnams snga sa la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dag slong khyod kyis de ltar
bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad cesabaka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yarangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
rdzus te skyes pa zhes bya bani/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon pochen po rnams dad/ phyug ro rnams dad robrang kho gnas dang tshod/
daro na rnam sa dang/ ded dpon chas dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ ma mkha' lding mas dang/ mi 'am rims dang/
lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ blamar byas/ mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ ltadang/ klu dang/ gnodasmin dang/ lham yin dang/
nam mkha' lding dang/ ma'im dang/ lta 'phya chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na ngabra'adang/ zha'abras dang/
gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ sman khong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lta yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'dus
brtol gyi drung nas thug ma ring ba zhig ni/ rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu'i stong du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes te/ sku bskrun pa'i yum dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lta gzhan dag la'ang chos
ston to de'i tshatshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po namanyan du yod da na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chol khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar gnas par dam bcas so//
da nas 'der bzhi ba rnams tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen ra tsirkang pa 'amago bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
'khod do/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos chos kyi gtan gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag pa ra 'dzan dubcug yang dag par gzengs bstod//
yang dag par dga' bar byed do// chos kyi gtam rnamagrangs dums yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cung
ma zir bar ba dug go/ de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ tshe dang ldan pamo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pa la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis da ltar bcom ldan 'das gang du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes pa rung du gsan tam/ tshe
dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen ros sa ra/ kya bdag gis nibacon ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul shing gi rgyal po yosa' dus brtol gyi rung nas thag mi 'ong ba zhig na rdol bsnam bu
dkar po lta bu'i stong du dbyar gnas ra re dam bzhes te/ sku bskrun pa'i yum dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la'ang chos ston cing bzhugs so zhes thosaso// de nas 'khor bzhi pa rnams
tshe dang ldan pamo'u 'gal gyi du chen pos smras pa la mngon par bkod cing rjes su yi rangs te/ rkangar la phyag 'tshal nas/ stan las langs te dong ngo// de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams dbyar zla ba gsum

'das nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der song spyi lcagasanas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod na// tshodang
thubya// ldan pamo 'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi de rnams chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug// yang dag pa ra gzengs stod/ yang dag par
dga' bar byed do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs dums yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin dubazhug/ yang dag par gzengasabastod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/
de nas 'khor bzhi pa rnams stan 'as langs to/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga 'a ba de lags su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zha'am mthong nas ring ma nage lags te/
bdag cab ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bas sgom 'gas so// bdag bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tsha' te/ gal tapatsun pa no'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la gnod pa ma mchis na/ btsun pa mo'u
tsa 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ zhabs la phyag bzhes te gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ baspyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang
ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde bami mnga' 'am/ bdeb la rog par gnas sam zhes gsol la/ 'di skad ces kyang gsungs/shage/ btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i 'khor bzhi po
rnams bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/ 'daskad du btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams la ni seng gi 'dzam bu glu'i pa'i rnams bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang/ thad du mchab dang/ An
bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'ilha yur dumatshib de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dngamathu mamachasel/ guaru rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lan gang li sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan
'dasal blta ba dang/ thad du mchib dang/ bsnyen bkurab gyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchib de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthun chisan/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcon ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum
pa'i lta yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshalags su gso 'a na/mchi'i zhi mol du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// da
nas 'khor bzhi pa rnams kyige tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi skabs bangs pa rar nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkangar lamagos phyag 'tshal tastanal ladu/
te dong ngo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor ba po rnams don gnas aring po ma len par rag nas/ jiltar sems mnyam par bzhagan/ dparanam stos ro cho 'ag pa bskum

pa 'ag brkyang ba 'am// brkyang ya 'as bsku mad bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pomanyan du yod pa bsamasnang bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul rig rgyal po yongs 'dus brdol
gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snyam ['', ]la de lta bu 'dug pa dor son par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyon sa par zhugs so// de'i tshabacon ldan bdag na rte'i las

brgya phrag duna'i gung la bzhugs te chos n te// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor nga rgyu drag du ma'i gzung 'a bzhugs te chos don la mthong ngo// mthong ga
kyang 'dzum dmul te/ bcom ldan dasan je ltar 'dzam bu gling na 'khar nganaM re rnams kyis gangang nyin du 'danan 'e khor mang po dang bzhugs so snyam mo// de nas bcon ldan 'das kyis tshod
ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen te/ tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'a 'daskyed ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di dag la ni rang dang ngamadad/ gang
ga tshangs dang zhig ces bsanas nianadi'i tsha'adong par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshong du shog cig ces pas gsan ni de'i tshe 'od ra 'gyur ro// sems kyis nga'i bsams pa shes nas 'ong ba dang
'dong bar 'gyur ro/ des tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das gang ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lamago bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
! phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pog lta'i 'khor thams cad la bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun ra kyal lha'i 'khor sa/
tshogs 'dus shing 'khod lags so// lta'i 'khor gyi nanas nigs rgyas 'ashes nas dad pa dang ldan to/ lus dang bral nas 'dire skyas pa'i lta de lta bu dag kyang machisaso/ chos dang/ dge 'dun
dang/ ra phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bralas 'dir skyes pa dag kyang mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
pos smras pa 'a 'thun par dgongs te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la la ni skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'bol gyi bu de'i bzhite/ de ribazhin// kyam lha'i 'khor tshogs
'dus shing 'khod do// lta'i 'khor gying zhu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la shes nas dad pa dang ldan to/ lus dang bralas 'dir skyes pa'i lta de lta bu dag kyang yod do// chos dang/ dge 'dun
dang 'phab sa pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang phralas 'di skyes pa dag kyang yod de// de nas lha'i dbang po brgyabyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
dang (tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi du chen pos smras pa la mthun par bsams te/ tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'ga' gyi bu chen pal 'di da tsos smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po red/
bzhin no// de na de bzhin te/ kyim lha'i 'kho'i sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do// lha'i 'khor gyin sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bra' zhag 'dare skyes da'i lta de lta bu
dag kyang yod do// chos dad/ dge 'dun dang/ 'bags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khranas lag gdad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa da lta bu dag kyang
yod do/ danas lta'i bu gzhan zhig gsikyang ng com ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi buchen po dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa la 'thun par bsams te/
tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi buchen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa no bu 'ga' gyi du chen po de ni de bzhin no// de nadi bzhin te/ kyis lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'bod de//
'khor gyi nang nas/sa rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang dral nas 'dare skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag yod da de// chos dang/ dga' dun dang/ 'phags pa dgyes pa 'i tshul khrim sa 'anges
nas dad pa dang ldan te/ 'u dang bral nas 'dir spyas pa de lta bu dag kyang yo da do// de nas lha nga tsagi stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs
su thal mo sbyar ba nga tud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// datsun pa bdag cag ni sangs rgyas 'das nas dad pa dang ldan te/ 'u sa dang bral nas 'di'i skyes pa la gas so/ lhu
gzhan dag cig gas kyang 'daskad ces gsol to// ngatsun ra nga dag cag gnachos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims 'a shasanas dad pa dang ldan te/ 'us dang bra'anas
ba02 'dir skye sa pa lags so/ de nas dor lha brgya phrag du ma dang/ lha stong phrag du ma dang/ lha 'bum phrag dun bcom ldan 'das kyi sa nasngar so'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brda sprod pa byas
nas/ de nyidi dum snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pacho'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos lha rnams dong bar ' gnas / bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 'gag su
thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// patsem ldan 'das la 'dis da ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dzam bu'i glingan 'khor bzhipemachis pa rnams com ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyi 'tsha' te/ gnod pa chung
ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'an/ ste ngas dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nag/ mi 'deng mamang la na/ bde ba la reg ra ra gnag sa ma zhes kyang mchis 'gags so// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod dang 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po 'khod pa rnams bde bar gyur cig/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pa// btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na
'khor bzhi de nas ra rnanas ni/ bcon ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te 'di skad ces kyang mchi'o// btsun pa 'dzam bu gling ra bi mi rnams la ging gis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i tshoms bcom/

ldan 'das blta ba dang/ thad du na ching dang/ bsnyen bkurab gyi ba'i smad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du mchib de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthun mchis la// sun cu rtsa gsum ra'i lta rnamag 'bo gang
gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ da dumachib dang/ bdag rangagyiba'i dadu 'dzam bu'i gling dum de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthums
na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzho ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i g.yu'anas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mo'u 'ga' myos

'on khyod 'dzam bu'i gling du song la 'khor bzhi po rnams l/ kye bcom ldan 'dasanadaste 'gabadunan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yu'aga'adzam bu'i gdi du grong khyarasnang ldan gyi dab/ a bad dzara'i nags
su shing u dum wa ra'i drud du gshegs so zhes sngon gi/ de nas tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ramanyagate/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lag deb ga 'char
ts+tso nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhagan/ dper na mi stobs po che lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang pa las bskum pa bzhin du tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gabu chen po sumacu rtsa ga bur lta
yul nas mi snang bar gyur to/ 'dzam redu son par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// denus tshodang ldan bso'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'dzam bu'igang du 'ongs nas 'khor
bzhi po rnams la sbran pa bcom ldan 'dasan da ste zhag bdunan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'it+ti yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab// na bad dzara'i nags su shang udum wa
ra'i drung dugshegs so zhes byas so// de nas zhagabadun 'an pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling dugrong khyer snang ldan gyi 'i dab/ u bad dza ra'i nags
tu nga u dum wa ra'i drung dugashagasu'o// gang gi tshong com ldan 'das grong khyer snang ldan der gshegs pa de tsho/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das labalta ba'i phyir 'dus so//
denas der dgesle nga rdzus te skyos pa nagi byung ste/ des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang/ lta dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am rtsadeng ste
'phya chen po de dag bshos laspyan drangs nas/ re zhagin gdugs tshod labab pa dang/ sems khaskyed ma thag tulha'i gdan dar yug khyim chen pos g.yogs pa dag dang/ lta'i zhal zas bza' ba dang
bca' ba dag byung bar gyur to// de nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pa des bcom ldan 'das lha'i zhal ga kyis tshim par byas te/ lta dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci deng/
lta'aphya chen po de dag la'ang bkur sti ligs par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de lta bu'i chos

bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pas pho la mi lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di 'di ga se zhang ma brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nil ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor
u// ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mong sa krams cad spangs zhas/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du dus rta/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum
[%/]pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyuranas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lagamathal du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan l/ tsan dan sa pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pa
sgonga'ispyabs bcom pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob po// srid pa'i dad pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi phyung/ dbang po/
dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lta rnams kyis mchod rirjod pa dang/ gus par smra pa'i gnas su gyur to// des dag slong dag the ma skyos/ the tsom thams cad gcod pas ngas rgyas bcom
ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rdzus te skyes pas las gang dag bgyison/ des rdzus te skyes par gyural/ 'a des sems bskyod pa'i tshod ma tsayig za da phyi 'tshal bde dag tham sa cad
grub par 'gyurang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rdzus te skyos pa kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs red cang rkyen thub pa dang ldate/ dba' rgal bzhadu/
'byung la Da gdonami bra bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shang bsags pas na/ rdzus te skyes pa nyid kyis rab byas ng ribasags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis 'das bu rgyu dngar 'gyur te// dgir
dag 'a sa dus gang bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa 'a khams 'a rnam pa rasmin pa ram 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las

dgong dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni sngon pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ sbyamachoda rnam ga 'ba' zhig 'a rnam par smin pa ra 'gyur ro// 'u sa can dgaga'i sa rnams na// ngas ra par rgyur/
yang chudam tra// tshog g shing dus la nga nga pa na// 'bras bu nyid dusmin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ ngaskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pal/ skye dgu'i
tsho' brgyad dri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshogs ra/ 'jigartan n khyen pa/ sbyos bu 'dul ba'i/
kha 'a sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sa ngas rgyus jacom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung sto/ dgrong khyer gnyis ldan n rtan cing gnas so//
de nas re zhig na grong med pa dgon pa'i gnas shig na/ dag blo nga dbyar gnas par damangacasar las/ de'i nang nas dge slong gcig gis dgaso panga'a'i zhal ta byas nas// de dgags brtson pa
dang ( bsgrub pa dang/ 'badangs nyon mo lag pa thams cad snga ngas nas/ dgra bcom pa 'den ngon sum du byas so// dge slong cig shos kyisan di dag gi nang ra la phyaga'atshal nas smona' ma ngatab
06 @#// pa/ 'daltar 'da rnams kyis 'dog las brten tedagra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa'i dgaba'i tsa bdang/ nyams byed pa dang/ sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su
gtong ng 'dasin/ bdag rang tu byung ste/ yo byad kyi khyad par dga' sa bdag brel bar ma gyur cig ces byas so// dag go nga dag ji snyam du ga/ tse pA dus na dge slong zhal ta byed
par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus te skyes pa 'di yin no// gsol pa/ btsun ra rdzus te skyes pas las ngadag bgyis na/ des rdzusate sa brgya ldan 'das kyige bkab stsal
ra/ dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan bskal pa bzang po 'dit+todi la skye dgu'i tshale nyakhrithub pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa 'om pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigar dang
zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'dzag rtenamkhyen r/ rgyus du 'dul ba'i kha laskyarab/ dran madapa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba/

rgya'ajig rten du byung ste/ degrong khyer wArA ts+tshasazhe drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nagasan rton pa bzhugs so/ detshade na tshong dpon zhagi gnas pa de'i chung ma bulatsas pa'i tshesdug bsngal gyitshor ngas rten
nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing ngu ba dang/ des de'i sgra thosaMnas mchogatum dga' bar gyur te/ mya ngan gyi khadabur zhugs nas/ 'a gapa o tshugs pa byas te mas khongs su chud cing 'dug pa ra sa

0 da'i blo skyes pa// ma 'a/nga dag nga tsam ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung la/ rigs bdag bsams kyang mngar du gnas pa nyams su myong bar ma gyur cig ces smon lam gdab gor ma chagasum ste/ des/

de skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis bcon ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi gsu nga rang la rang tu byung nas des smon lam btab pa/ dag ba'i rtsa ba dang/ sems bsgyur pa 'dis na/ bdag gang dang gang du skyo bde dad
dor rdzus te skya bar gyur cig/ nams kyang rang la du gnas ra nyams su myong bar ma gyur rug ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du so mas/
da'i tshoda'i dus na tshong dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa der rdzus te skyes pa 'di yin te/ smon lam btab pa des ni rdzus te skyes par gyur to// des der dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa
des n diltar dgru bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas la// dge slong dag de lta na las gcig tu nges par ganag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa 'a ngagacigadungs par gnag par 'gyur ro//
las gcig tu nges par dkarang rnanas ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tungs par dkabar 'gyur ro// las 'drenam rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de
bsan ras gcig tu nges pa raganag pa rnams dang/ las badren ma ma sangs la/ 'as gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhagi 'a gtad par bya ste// dge slong khyed kyis de/
ltar bslab par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis deskad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag slong de dag rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa'i madon par bstod//
mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal ro rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khoragyi mi rnams dang//
tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lta rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lham yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi'am rnams dang/ lto
na po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bamar byas/ rimor lus/ mchod pa byas te/ ltadang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ ma gzhi dang/ mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am cad ng/ lto 'phyan
po rnams kyis mchod cing shasapa'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bso danams chen po dang ldan r/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gasos dang/ sman zong rnam
b.res pa/ nyan thos kyi dag bdun dang bcas pa saraskya'i gshing cagro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshosar skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug gtsang noranang 'a 'angos spyod che
ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgyatshob rnam thos bu'i ro dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhagi gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de'i ngang lhan tshagi/
[z ]du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dag spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ da zla ba ngargyadadan dbu len pa dang du byung ste/ khye 'gazugs bzang zhing
blta na sdug la mdzes pa// mi'i kha dog lasana'adas// lta'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas nas/ de btsas pa 'i tsheshin tu rmad du byung ba du byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis grong khyeras ra skya'i/
gnas thog bgam dzes par byas so// danas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas na// khye'u 'di'i ming ja/dgadags zhes ming 'dogs pa rakhyodade/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di btsas pan grong khyer sar skya'i
gnas mdzes par byas pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming mdzes pa zhes gdags zhes zer ro// de nas khye'amadzes pa pangan 'tsho ba'in mga'usi dang/ thun bsnan ra 'o ma ma gnyis dang/ drani
'khruba'im ma gnyis dang/ rtsa ngarim ma gnyis te/ ma ma ngargyad la gtad nas/ der mngargyad kyis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi sdong bu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad

gyi khyadang ra bzang nge cog gis baspyod bsrings te/ na tsho'inangagi pad+ma bzhin du skyo drag par gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe cher rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'a dag 'a ngalta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun
dga' ra bar bo nga nga// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mi tshatsum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dpabyadabazang po brgyad cu mdzes par byas ra/ 'od/
'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'am stong las lhag pa'i 'od manga' nga ri mo ri'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bgrang ba mthong// mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la//
sems dga' ba bskyed do// de dga' ba bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyirabcom ldan 'das kyi sngan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis de'i bsam pa dad/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rangabazhinazugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston te/de thos nas/
khya'u mdzes pas 'gi tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po zhishu pa shes rdo rjes bcom nas// rgyar du zhugs r 'i 'phrag du mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma[]gsol te/
bcom ldan 'das[]bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ de yartson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang 'bad na phol mib lcapa'i pa Tar ba'i 'khor lo 'di dang g.yo zhangamibs par rig nas/ 'dubyan
kyi rnam pa thams cad rol pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam pa 'thor ba dang/ rnamalarangajig pa ni 'o cani sla 4 ngad/ nyon mongs pa lnga sacan s nas dgra bcom pa rto
mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa 'oms gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bralakhar gyur nas saM g.yaMbong gamanyam la nyaka' 'gamathal du 'dra ba'is mas dang/ tsan dan
ba/ sbags pa lta bur bsal bar gyur la/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbyabs bcom pa/ ri'i pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ soso yang dag pa ra gi la thob pa/ srid pa'ired ba dang/ chags pa dang/
bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas mo'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang/ gus par sgruba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dag slong dag the tsom skyes te/ thatsom thams na
gcod pa sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mdzes pas las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta nasdug la mdzes te/ mi'i kha dogal san 'das/ lta'i
khadoganam thob par gyur la/ 'di btsas pa'i tshe yang shin tu rmad du byung ba du ma byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis grong khyer sar skya'i gnas kun tu madzes par bagyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal ra/ dag slong dgamadzes pa nyid kyis sngon tshorabs gzhan dag tu tshogs redacing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal ba ni du 'byung la// gdon mi za bar 'ong gi 'de dag
byas shing bsags pas/ mdzes pa ni ge 'as byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gso nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams phyi rol gyisa'i/
khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ mo'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur te/ las dgab dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni
pa'i lung ro dang/ khams dang/ skyo mtshar rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par na par 'aA/ lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bka' brgyur yang chud mi za//
tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dag slong dgatso'abyung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bsal pa bzang mo 'di nyidiu0f8bskye dgu'i tsho' na rI thub
ban/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs suldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtenamkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo/
sgyukha/ blon med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba' dzagaces bya ba 'a jig rten du byuste/ dargyal po'i pho brang grong khyeramadzes ldan na rtenaTi bzhugs
oM Dadenas rgyal po mdzes pas de'i dbusmad ngasan mo'i mchod rten brtsigs so// gsa' zhigen de'i dus ston zhig byung tshe/ mdza'i sde dgacig mchod rten gyi drung du dong ba las/
de dag gisamachod rten dan tho nas dad pas te/ me tog btags so// de dag gnang mdza' sdod cig na re/ bdag 'an po yamed kyi/ bdaganatso yang khyod de zhes warags/ mdza' sde re
dag zhing sa phyir byungab las da gyod pa skyes te/ des me tog rnam pa sna tshogs btusazhes mchod rten de nyid la phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/ dge slong dgadzasAmadu
sams/ de'i tshe de'i dus namadza' sde pa 'khyod la skyes nas yang dag par rdzogs 'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'dzag gi dbu skra dang ba na mo'i mchod rten lame tog 'bul ba gang yin pa den mdzes pa
'du yin no// dge slong dag mdzes pas ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bas gas te/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusazha/ grong khyer wA rA N+nas ni tshongadaron zhig gnas pa des rang
sangs rgyas nad pa zhig mthong ngo// de nas dad pa skyes te/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bsod snyoms kyang phul/ gos kyang phul lo// dge slong dag dzasnyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
tshong dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa don mdzes pa 'ad yigego/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi ring la ma debul po kong thunazhig tu gyur te/ de ri sul zhig tu shing thur gong ba dang/
des mchod rten 'gi mthong na mchod rten de'i khorasan rtswa dag kyang skyes so// de nas de dad pa skyes nas/ des na rnams kyang byung sta phyags ma thogs samachodarten gyi 'khoras phugs
so/ de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ dag pa'i rtsal dang/ so mas bskyod pa 'disin bdag gzugs bzang zhing blta nasna sha' mdzes par gyuratsag/ ma
'ongs pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ ma martos par byed par ma gyur gi chos byas so// baoM ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
grubya// dge slong dag dzasnyam dusems/ de'i tshe de'i dusan dbul po shing thun du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa 'di yin te/ des mchod rten dang/ mchod rten gyi 'khor
sa phyags pa des n gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug lamadzes par gyur to// rgyud nyid kyisan daltar yang dgra bcom pa nyin mngon sum du byas so// dag skyong dag/
de lta na las gcig tu nges par gnagapa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tu ris par gzhag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par sminapa'i ng gtsagi tu nges
par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'drenan rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'drenamar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tunges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'dren ma rnams sbyangs
kha las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya sta/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar ba slab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong
zla/ de dag ya'is te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bam po nyi shu pa// ka pan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong dbon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ ga rnams dang
gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ mkha' lding+ge rnams dang/ mi 'am tshurje ba dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/
lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ ltam yon dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phyachen po rnams kyis mchod tsongashes pa'i gangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bsngal dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyun gso sa dang snun zung rnams b.res nga/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
mnyan du yod pan rgyal bu rgyal byed7tshel khyim bdag mgon med zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra pan bzhugs so// de'i tshe lho phyogs na rgyal po rtogs ldan zhes bya brgyal lo byed de/
da'i ring la 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ le lags pa dang/ skya bo dang mimad pas gangab dang/ rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang/ 'khrul pa dang/ nga 'khrug dang/ chom rkun dang/ mug
dang nad rnams med pa dang/ 'brasasA lu dang/ bu ram shing dang dbagang dang/ ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa mdatsangatshor ma dkrugs lo bul cig pa la bya ba bzhi du rgyal srid bskyas
so// de nas phyis re zhigan btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhari dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ btsun mo la buchags nas/ dezla ba brgyad dam dgu 'a ra/
da/ las du byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug 'amadzes pa/ man lagadang nyi ga thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas// ka/
ban nas ming btags so// de nas khye'u ka yin pangan 'tsho ba'i mam gnyis dang/ chum bstan pa'i na gnyis dang/ dram la khruba'is ma gnyis dang/ rtsa ba'i ma la gnyis te/ ma ma brgyada' gtad
nas/ dem ma brgyud kyis 'o ma dang/ no dang/ mar dang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snying 'u dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtshoTing gi pad+ma bzhin du sku

drag par gyurato// gang gi rten par rgyal po'abu kari zhabatsas pa de kho na'i nyanipar blon po khri brgyad stong gi bu yang btsas te/thams car kyang tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/ de dag gi ming

yang so so rkyen du 'tshamarar tags so// de nas re zhigen rgyal po rtogs ldan gnas de'i 'og tu pu ka ban rgyal bor bcug go/ blon po'i du khri brgyadastong ngo di dag thams cad kyang blon por bskos so//

denas phyi zhogi gan rgya' pa po ka pin blon po chen po khri rgyad stong gis maring byas te ri dgas gshor du song ba dang/ amadun legs dang rgyab logs su dpung chen pa thams cad bltas nas/ blon po rnams
yadris pa/ kA ye daltar da'i dpung chog ro 'di lta bu dpag gzhan su la yod ces byas so// de nas blon po snyan par smra ba rnams kyis/ lhasu la'angam mchis sa zhes byas/ de nas yul dbusazhas tshongar
[n ]dgag lho phyogs su song ba de dag gse rgyal po pa chen po la skyes phul la go/ de nas rgyal bos la/ bya tshong pa dag yul de'i rgyal bo su yani/ tshopa rnams kyis gsolal/ lho yul kha cig na

mang bo tshogs pa dbangagyid do// yul gcig zhu nargyal po dang bgyid do/ de nas re zhig na rgyal ro ka rin chen pos nyan du yod pa la sogs pa grong khyer chen po drug tu lo 'batang ste/ gal te khyod 'grang ba la bab
na yang 'dug par myur du shog gi/ de ltar masazhachad pas cher gcad donag byas so// de nas tshig de thosanas grong khyer chen ponugan gnas pa'i rgyal po rnams 'dzagis shangesgrig lam dga'
ste/ rgyu khung zhes byas nas 'dus shing tshogs te gros 'thun par byas nas mnyan du yod par ltagasaso// den bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song sgyu[ ]gtam dbcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol
to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rag dbugs phyung ste pho nyar pa'i thad du khug cig ces bka' stsal to// degs de dag gis pho rta la kho bor bgag rgyal po'i yongargyal la yod kyisi/ re zhi gzhu de'i

sbyan sngar mchi zhag cesaRasgo'o// de nas com ldan 'das kyis pho nya'ong bar thugs chud// rgyal lo rgya la byed kyi tshol lta'i grong khyer bstan sdug dang 'dra bar ronapo chesna bzhir sprul to/ rgyal

tson re ban de'asgo dpon lta burab kodad/ glang po chos rgyug khyi'u lta bu dag dang/ rtasprin gyi shugs can ltabu ga dang/ shing rta dga'akhyodasgralta bu dag dang/ mi gnod sbyin mabidzad pa lta bu dag kyang bkod do bcom ldan/
'das nyidina'i khor legasgyur ba'i rgyal ro ba'i 'gasasustsal to// deng gi khri'i rang dutu 'badun tsan du yodapa'i ng sprul te/ de la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// de nas lo shas de lta
bu mdzag pa dag mthong nas mchogatu yamtshan dgyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sa 'phrin yig brisis pho lta de 'baka' stsalapa/ rgyal po karini' na re/ 'phrin yag mthong ba de khona'i tshog ' to

khyod 'grong pa la baban yang ma 'dug par myur du shog cig/ gal tem bosanang dpung gi tshogs chen po dang 'od zhagagyis shig/ de nas lonya de song stozlul po kapan chen do' 'phrin yig dang kha thanadu

btab pa de dag thams cad byas so// de nas rgyal po ka pin chen po blon po khrirgyad stong gis zham ring byas te mthar gyis seng song nasamanyan du yod par phyin pa dang/ 'bogargya' po rnams kyis rgyal po
kar na chen po bsu nas de dag gis bkur sti chen ro ga grong khyer du gshegs su gso 'ate/ mnyel paso nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// donas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'ong bar thugs/
su chud nas/ thams cad snga ma bzhin du stsal to// de nas rgyal po ka pa ni chen po rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas/ mthong ma thag tu de'i gzugs la gzugs kyis rgyags pa
[j]dang/ dbang phyug la dang phyug gis rgyags po gang yin pa de mad par gyur to// stobasakyis dregs pan da dung yodabazhin// donasakhacom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa

07dbaskyed de/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang nga rog zhu khyer te 'ongasan legs se snyam du dgongs nas khacom ldan 'adas kyis dgongs pa bskyed pa yod la lta'i dbang po brgyabyin gyis kha lo ba'i cha lugs kyis
dbang pa'i gzhu phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ka pa chen po la byin na/ de rgyal ba ka pa chen ras gdeg par yang mazhusan/ brdung bar lta la/lanus/ dgas khacom ldan 'das kyis

lcags kyi rnga bo chab dun sprul te nyid kyis gzhu de zla gam bzhin bdungasanasasnam mda' 'phangs te/ dos lcags kyi rnga bo cho bdunacharatha' phyungs/ de las sgra byungab/ nges par 'byung ba'adzum par gyis//

sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i rtsis la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bad thad ldan 'azhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skyo ba'i 'khor ba rab smad+ma

nas/ sdug bsngal byed par byed par 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i sgra byung nas sgrare'ang 'og min gyi lta'i yul man chad du grag go/ de nas rgyal po ka pin chen ra'i stobs kyis dregs pa de'ang med par gyur te/
de'i blo skyes pa/ e ma de ci zhig snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ka panachen po'i sems kyi rgyu ba thub gas su chud nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i che lugs rmasnang bar mdzad
dmado 'di gsungs so// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag ra ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni stobs bcu dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhes mi 'jigasar/khyu mchog gi gnas
rgyachen pal dam bsar/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskorab/ 'khor gyizhing du yang dag pa'i nga ba'i sgra sgrogasal lto/ 'di lta ste// 'di yodan 'di 'byung la/ 'di smyos pa/
zla 'dispyi bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rgyan gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shas la/ rnam par shes pa'i rgyan gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rgyun

gyis skyon ched drung// skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ rig pa'irkyen gyis chog/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis grodapa/ srid pa'i rgyanakyis len pa/ len pa'irgyan gyis sridar/ srid pa'i rgyan gyis skyob/
skyo ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ rtsa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal b dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba'
zhig re 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'di med na mi 'byung laM/ 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags ra sa 'du byed 'gag/ 'du
byed rab/gas pas rnam par shas pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa
'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sredapa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba
/ 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ skyesngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid m bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen pa
'ba' zhig pa 'di'i gag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag nga'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa/ gsa' bam par phye ba/ rgyu ba gtsod pa/ lta dngamin na chad pa yang dag par legs par bstan pa yin te/
da ltar chos legs par gsungs pa/ gsar ba rnam par phye ba/ rgyub gcod pa/ ltadad mgon chad la yang dag par 'degs par bstanar 'a ni rigs kyi budad pas rab tu byung bas na ston pa'i bstan
la brtson par bya ba'i rags pa kho na'o// sbyor bar bya ba'i rigs so// bag yod par bya ba'i 'gagaso/ lus kyi sha khrag kun bsams te/ pags pa dang/ chub dang/ rusapa 'bar zhi
lugs danablo'i/ chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsoms pa/ mthu dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa// skyo ba dang ldan pa/ mthu rtsal dang ldan pa/ brtson pa'i dor bas thob pa bya ba
gang yin pa dem thobakyi/ bar ma dor brtson 'grusal tang bar nimi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'a nananasdug bsngal bzhin du gnas pa sto/ sdig pa ma rig ba'i chos kun s nyonanangs par byed pa// yang

srid par skye bar byed// rims nad dang bcas pa/ sdug bsnga la gyi rnam par smin pa dad ldan pa/ phyi ma la spyi ba dang/ rga shi'i 'gyur ba rnams dang 'dres pa yin te/ den don chen po 'ang yongs su nyams
[d ]@#/ par 'gyu'o/ brtson 'grus 'atsus ran bde par gnas pa ste/ sdig dmadag ba'i mnanaganyonamoAtsA'akhyod la nga srid par skyob byed pa/ misazhadadang bcas pa//
sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa dang ldan// phyi ma la skye ba dang/ rgya'i 'gyur ba rnams dang ma 'dres pa yin ti/ de'i don chen po'o nga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'do/
ltaste/ ston pa' nga mngon sum du bzhugs la/ chos kyang ston te/ 'bar zhi bar byed pa/ yongs sutshu yan las 'da' ba'abyed pa// rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed r/
bdeb ragags pas gsungs pa'i gsungarang 'dono snying khu btung bar 'os pa yin no// dge slong dag de bas// bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don dang/ gnyis ka'i don yang dag par
mthong ba rnams kyisan 'di la so nas legs par bslab par bya ste/ ji ltar byas na bdag cag ga rab tu byung ba don yod pa dang/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang/ bde ba bskyed pa dang/ bde ba'i
( rnam par smin par 'gyur la// gang dag gigs dang/ bras dang/ mal cha dang/ stanadang/ nad gsos dang sman brong rnams bdag cig las longs spyod pa de dag gter stidi dag
kyang dzaltar byas na 'bras bu shan tu che ba dang/ phanayon che ba dang/ 'tshe ba dang/ rgyachapar 'gyur zhib gusnyam dudage slong khyedabyasideltar bslab par bya'o// sakyi rnam grangs 'dirin
pan rgyul po ka pin chen po blon po khrab rgyad stong gi 'khor dang bcas pas ra jag tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mor thon pa rtog ye shes rdarjes btson nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
byas te/ bden pa na thon gnas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas phol mi lnga pa'i sa khor ba'i 'a khor 'dirtod g.yog des brtan
par rig nas/ 'dubyed kyi rnam pa thams cad tsAl ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'a jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsa dachod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangagazhag/
dgra bcom pa nyidim ngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gosum pa 'i 'dod chags dang bra' bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lagamatho'i du'adra ba'i man
dang ldan pa// na dan spungs pa lta bur bsu'i bar gyur la gangs so ya'isgrubs 'aco la ga la da/ mngond rags pa dang/ so so yang dgapar rig pa thob pa// sridapa'irnyed pa/
dang chags pa dang/ bkur stil mi lta ba/ dbang ro dang rta dbang dang bcas pa lha rnams kyisamachod rtsirjod pa dang/ sa par skya pa'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dag slong dag the tsam gyis
tu / thatshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdag la zhus pa/ btsunar ka ri u0f7agas las gang dgagyis na/ des gzugs bzang 'di bstan sdug mdzas pa dang/ blon po khri
[n ]bya@#// brgyad stong gseb khor dang bcas par tshan re tsho'i stobs dang ldan par gyur te/ rab tu tshunas kyang dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum dubargyas 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
u bka' stsal pa// dgaslongadag ka pa na nyid kyis sngon tshorabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing kyi grub pa dang ldan to/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la// gdonami za bar 'ong ba'i las de dgabyas shing
bsags ngan/ ka rin nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gse nyams sumyong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams naphyi ral gyi sa'i khams la rnam par
smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par 'gyute/ las dge ba dang mi dge khabyas shing bsags pa rnams n thonama'i phung po dang/
khams dang/ skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chudami// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid
du sman par 'gyur// dag slong dag ston byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la skye dgu'i tsho le brgyad khri thub pan/ de bzhin gshags pa dag
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtan mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blan med ra// lha dang mi

[s]/nams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par ba/wi'i sa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dergya'ado'i pho brang gnyan ldanon sa bzhugs so/ de nas re zhig na ded dpon zhig gis rgya mchen
pa'i nang nas rin po chamang po khyer te 'ongs nas/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzags nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la sman drangs so//

gtsug lag khang yang brtsi gegs nas phyogasabazhi'i dge 'dun la phul lo// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na red dpon dgyur pa ba nga yin pa de ni ka pa no 'di yanano// dge slong ga

kapazhisanalas gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ grong khyer wArA ts+tshAsan rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la khyor
pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ legs pa dang/ spyi bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang/ rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ nang 'khrug pa dang/ chom rkun dang/ mug
dang ( nad rnams med pa dang/ 'bras sA lu dang/ bu ram shing dang/ bgrang dang/ ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ chos dad ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do//

de phyi shogin blon po khri brgyad stong gis las ring byas te/ sbyad mas tshal gyi sharims me tog rgyas la/ dang pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ de dang/ riskogs dang/ khubyug dang/shang gti'u/
bya@#// rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod du song ba las// des skyonganos tshal der rang sangs rgyas nad pa zhig mthong nas// ngos de 'azla ba gsum gyi bar du phan pa'i bras kyis bsnyen bkur/
byas so/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang de'i sku gdung mchod rten brtsigs nas/ blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pas til mar gyis bsus to/ des na 'khor dang bcas pa tshan patshi[R]
stobs dang ldan par gyur to// gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring la rang du byung ste/ des der dpang po yongs su smon lAbyas pa des n/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyidi mngon sum du byas so//
dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag ra rnams ni rnam par sminar 'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dgar ba rnams rnam par smin pa'i ngagacig tu nges
par dkar bar 'gyur ro// 'as 'dren rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang 'dre'amar 'gyur ro// dag mo nga dgade bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las drenaa rnams ngs
la Da 'as gcig tungasapAr dkar rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dgaslong khyed kyis deltar ba slab par bya'o// yacom ldan 'dasakyis de skadapas bka' stsalas/dge slong de dag yi
rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bzang ldan zhes byan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams
0 dang / phyug pa rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mozhigs dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang dod dbon rnams dang/ lta rnams dang/ klo rnams dang/ gnod/ rnams dang/ lham yin nams
dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi'am ci rnams rang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas blamar cu/ tshor byas/ mchodapa byas te lhadang/ klu dang/ gnor
spyin dang/ lha ma yanadang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyisaachodacing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasabasod namasachen podang ldan pa/ na/
bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ sman zong rnams b.res la 3na thosakyi dge 'dun dbacas ra mnyan du yod pa nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi
tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun nagarar na bzhugs ba// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzo ga ga []ra sangs rgyas nas lobcuganyis te/ lo bcu gnyis/
'das nas/ grong khyeraser skya'i gnas su byon pa de'atshabra bo zas dang bdud rtsis la sogs pa shAkya stong phrag dums 'don pa mthong ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni ma gtogs sa//
denas rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras kyi legs pa de dag mthong nas// mchog tu ya latshan du gyur waM/ de'i blo skyes ra/ gal te bdag gi bu rab tu ma byung du na ni 'a di 'o khor las sgyur ba'i
[; ]@##// rgyal pamatha' bzhir rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba zhagin/ ni'adi thor tshugs can rab tu byung ba'i g.yog byas pa ni ring du mi mdzes kyis/ bdag
gos 'akya rnams las khyim re mi'i rab tu 'byung du gzhug go go ma chagasAmamo// de nas rgyal po khra gtsang gis shAkya thams cad basdu ba'i phyir grong khyer du dri'i bsgrags so// de nas pa kya
ny+tsa thams cad 'dus pa'i nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kya kya khyod rnams ston cig/ gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa mang dum byung du zazhin yang khyed kho nas 'di la bstan bkur/
bya dgosan/ da 'dir rab tu byung gi// shAkya khyim ra mi ri bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rab du phyung zhig ces byas so/ de nas bzang ldan dang/ ma 'gags pa dang/ nam grub dang/ lha sbyin la sogs pa

shAkya'i bu lnga brgya rab tu 'byung ngar chas so// de nas de dag gi 'dregan khan bstanang kur byed pa nye bar 'khor des de dag rab tu 'byung ba mthong nas dus so// de nas kya rnams kyis nye bar 'khos khyod ci'i
