lho phyir du zhes drases// de nas dos snying rje rje skud zer zhi/ sdug sdug skad zer la/ gtazhing+gIts+tsha te/ khyod nga tu byung na de ba dga' zas dang gos kyis skyong ba su zhig mchis/ de nas shAkya rnams kyis sang/ nye bar
'khor 'o nas thing zhig byas so// de nas ras bting nag shAkya rnams kyis lus la thogs pa'i dol dang/ somo dodang/ nor bu dang/ mutig dang/ ba cha dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ sor gdub
nags phung po sdus te byin no// de drega mkhan bar 'khor gyis rab tu 'byung ba de dag kyang mthong la/ rgyanam pa sna tshogs la'ang bltas mtshul bzhin du bde 'byed pa skyes te/ shAkya 'di dag ni lha/
gas dang/ byadagazugasudang/ 'ang tshodang/ 'byor pa dang ldan pa yin na/ 'on kyang btsun mo rnams dang rgyan 'di dang/ mchi'am bzhin du bos/ rang tu byung na bdag ci'ing ma'i dog pa zhigegasong
rgyan 'di dag khyim du bskur du ci yod de/ 'di dag btang la bdal kyang 'dod/pho rdzas su rab tu 'byung goras chag snyam mo// de nas 'dreg mkhan te bar 'khor bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/
phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan das 'a 'di skor rtses gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te par ba ga cag lta bu 'ang 'a bags par ba su yas pa'i chos
bdul ba la rab tu 'byung ba gsal rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bstan par rdzo ba shing dag jagi dngos pa 'thob tu rungan/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du chos par spyod pa sdud par 'tshal
lades bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu phyung ngo// de nas bzang ldan la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya dag slong gi cha lugs can rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal bar byas pa las/ de dag gis nye bar 'khorangoshegs cha rig dang / byad gzugs dang/ 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i phyir nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshol du btubs/ der
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan ng bgrang ldan la bka' stsal pa// bzang ldan ngagi phyiranga'i bstan pa 'dilan tshorogs dang/ byad gzugs dang/ 'ang tsho dang/ dbang
phyug dang/ rigs bzhi rnam par dgar dang sbyar ba mdakyis/ 'di'i phyag tsholatsag/ de nas bzang ldan la sogs rangabakyaldabargyas chos nyidi btsan par byas nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa/
bzhin dukang pa la phyag byas// de dag gis rkang pa la phyag byas nasamod la sachan da' da rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas daradang ldan pa bzang ldan gyis brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'ad/
pas pho'amagi lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan r ra rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad stsol ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can
yin par rtsodachod de/ 'onamongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bra'agyuranas/ gsar dang bong bar n nyam
ba/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sams dang ldan pa/ tsan dan skyungs pa lta bur bsal bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/
soso yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang/ chags pa dang/ kur sti la maM ltab/ dbang podang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchodang rjod pa dang/ gus pa snuba'i
gnas su gyur to// de'ang bdag nyid che ba dang/ sdug capa'i chos pa rnams la snying 'du ba gi ste/ phyitshogin snga dro dam thapas dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par
spyod yulal chasaso// de nas re zhig na ris na zhig gi khyim du bsod snyoms la song do// de'i cho kosala'i rgyal po gsal rgyal glang po tsho'i gtso bo pad+ma dkar pa gcig pu zhes bya ba la yonate//
kha ler rgyu ba'i bu ring po dang/ bcom ldan 'das la blta'i phyir chos pa las kos 'a'irgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bzang ldan dbang po bi/ yidete bar zhi ba/ sems chog tudul zhape

bar zhi ba dang ldan la/ phyag dar khrod kyi gos gyon zhing kha zas yanar khyer te rigs ngan gyi khyim de nas phyire byung ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang kha la ma rgyu ba'i bu ring po la dris pa 'di dage slong bzang ldan m
yin nam/ kha lo pas smras pa// lha bka' stsal pa bzhi te de la kha gas so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khamasAnas brgyal tes la ltung ngo// de nas chus gtor dang/ phyisangs te sems
brtasanas kha le pa rgyu ba'i bu ring po bslang ngo// de nas rgyal gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi thod du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rmad du byung ba zhig mthong ste/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzangaldan de phyag dar khrod kyi gos gyon zhing kha zas ngan pa thogs te da ltadang mi dad par bgyid pa'i spyod lam shin tu zhi bas bsod
soms blangs te/ rigs ngan gyi khyin nas slar byung ba de la bdag 'disnyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi ngasan parishAretudul bar bgyidar lags te/ de la bstan na 'di/
lta bur skyod de bar mchisal/ bde bas bskyod pa dag kyang 'di ltar tshul dul bar gyur pa'i ngo mtshar che'o snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po pe bzang ldan 'di//
lanadi mtshar cha ba gzhan yang yod kyis nyon cig/ rgyal po chen da bzang ldan 'di ni de gon ra na gnas sam/ shangedung na gnas sam/ dang stong na gnas kyang rung ste/ bye ma'i skyed kyi ma re skyid/
bdag rang tu ma byung ba tsaman rgyal po'i phebrang gan na 'dug ste/ blon po dang/ grong rdal gyi mi dang/ yul gyi ma rnams kyis shin tu legs par basrungs la rab dang/ 'obs dang/ sgongang

gcan gazan rnams kyis bskyabs kyang snying gzhan la dogasangasharim dgar ba kun la'ang khu 'phrig khra bzhin te/ gnyid kyang mi 'ong ba las/ da ni bdag lus dang gra bo la'ang mi lta bas gnas gang dang
gang du'ang bde bar 'du yod do zhes dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du rjod pa ra byed do// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ des the tshem thams cad/ rtsod pas nags rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
zhus pa// btsun pa bzangaldan gyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu las gang dag bgyis shing bsagasan/ des gazugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa dang/ rgyal po'i rigs phyug por skyes la/

rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dgaslong dag khazang ldan nyid kyis sngonatshorabs gzhan dag tu tshogs nad rnying rgyanagrub pa dang ldan
do dba'i rga' bzhin du 'byung// gdon mi tre bar 'ong ba'i 'gan de dag byas shing bas gas ras na/ bar ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhagi gsems
su myong bar 'gyur tu/ dag slong dag las phyagatashing bsags pa rnams na phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam pa sman par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung khams 'a rnam par
smane par mi 'gyur te/ las dag pa dang ma dag pa byas shAdi bsags pani 'on pa'i lung pa dang/ khams dang/ spyi mchod rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi lA
rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'brasabu ti du sman par 'gyur/ dgeslong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ grong khyer wArANAsi na

sbyang pa zhig gnas pa lus bkras shingenyam chung sa non nas/ phan tshun du' lor 'khor ba lasaru cho 'khur ba khyer bzhag mthong ngo// de nas sprang po des 'khur ba 'dod pa'i phyi de dumo de bstags te//

rgyaso'akhur ba cige phrogasanas phan tshunabrosas// bu mo der nga de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba zhinano// de nas sprang ra dos tshamatshoma med pa ra chu krung zlog byed 'a 'bogasas/ saargyaba rnams ma'i byung ba'i
thu@#// tshen rasangs rgyas sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams 'ang brtsib/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnasagacig du rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/
re zhagan rasangs rgyas shigaglang po de'i na dun du 'ongs so// da nas sprang pa des rang sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi ba de mthos dga' ba chen po skyes te/ de dga' ba chen pas rang gi sdug bsngal dang
bsdos te rang sangs rgyas la 'khur ba de phul la// de nas rangasas rgyas des de'i dga' ba rgya chen po bskyod pa'i phyi'i/ ngar pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkhar la mngon par 'phags

nas cho'aphrul rnam pasnyatshogs bstan to// de nas sprang po des lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/ stong pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal tesmon
lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas brtul zhugs thub pa la phul ba'i dag pa'i rtsa ba dang/ sems bskyod pa dang/ sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba'adisin/ bdag gang dang gang du
spyas pa de dngader rigs mthon por skyob dang/ 'di lte busachos thob par gyur cige 'do bas kyang ches khyad par dung phagasar 'i ston pa dgams par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed pa mgyur/
cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dusan sbrang por gyur pa gang yin pa den bzang ldan 'di yin te/ des rang sangs rgyas l 'khur/

ba phul ba'i lag de'i rnam par smin pas naapishAkya'i rigs phyug par skyes so// gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ringa' rab tubyung ste/ dus der 'o khro'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa/
des n de ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de lta ngan las gcig tu nges par bganag ra rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng gcig tungeg pa ragazhag par 'gyur ro//
las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smanepa'i ng gcig tunges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// 'as 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa 'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dgeslong dag de
lta bas las la gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang/ 'as 'drenama rnams sngasa'/ 'a sa gcig tu ngas par dkarang rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar
bslab pa rabya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dgeslong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'a mngon pa la bstod do// yul
'khor skyong zhes byab na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgya' pa rnams dang/ blon pachen po rnams dang/ phyug pa rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ tshong dpon nam
dang/ dadadapon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/
lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkurasti byas/ bamar ga/ rimor byas/ mchodapabyas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ rnamamab/
lding dang/ mi pham tsa deng/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cingashes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa// na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims cha
dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gasos dang/ smanathong rnams b.res pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul gsus po che zhes bya ba na/ gsus po che'i nags khrodan bzhugs se/
de'i tshayulo gsus po chon rgyal po sgra masnyan zhes bya ba rgyal po khyod// de'i ring la 'byor pa dang/ rgyus pa dang/ bdeb dang/ le lags pa dang/ skya bo dang ma mang po
gang ba dang/ rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhib dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ nang 'khrug dang/ chom rkun dang/ mu ga dang/ nad rnams madapa dang/ 'bras sA lu dang/ bu ram shing dang/ bgrung
dang mnye dang ldan par 'dug sta/ chos dang ldan pa// chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhanedu rgyal pa byed de// de nas de'i nu bo'i bu yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug lamadzes
pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhagayodapa de gdul ba'i dus la bab par bcom ldan 'das kyis gakhrigs nas// snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol to/ lhung bzod bsnyams
[ol]/sa/ dge slong gi dge 'dunagyis mdun gyis mdun du bdar zhing/ dgeslongag tshigs kyis zham rang byas te/ yul gsus pachar bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang/ yul 'khor skyong gis sangasargya
bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs ra ra brgyan pa// dpe byadababrang pa brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyimastong bas lhag pa'i
'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das lasems dga' bar gyur to// de dga' khaskyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
rgyag 'tshal te/ rang du 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la bka' stsal pa/ bu khyod la mos gnang ngam/ yul 'khor skyong gis gsol pa/ btsun pa
ma gnang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu de bzhi gshegs pa rnams sag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams na pha mas ma gnang bar rab tu 'byung ba 'am/
bstanapar rdzogs pa ma mdzad do// de nas yul 'khor skyong pha ma'i thad du song ste/ phyin nas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod de/ bdag gisan bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
rgyas shAkya thub pa 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal srid rgyas pa dang/ btsun mo drug khri spangs nas dbu snyadregs te/ chos koN[']Na sAtsa gsako kasus te 'di 'den 'aso gos ki
thubya// bzhugs dgathongs/ bdag bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba'i rdzasasu rab tu 'byung par gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs so// de nas de'i pham gnyis kyis ma gnang bo
don de zhag gcig dang/ gnyis dang/ gsum nas/ drug gi bar du kha 'tshogs// de nas su la 'khor skyong ga re raganyis bu phul 'khor skyong ga'akha de'agong ste phyin nas/ du yul
'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// du yul 'khor skyongangashosar 'gyasushig/ khyod spyodade ngar 'dug 'dug pa bde ba 'dod pa yin te/ khyod ni sdugam myong ba yin te/ tshas ra ra sprod pa ni
sbyad pa ra dka' 'o// dben par gnas pa na dka' 'o// gcig pu 'dug pasu dga' bar ng dka' 'o// dgon pa dang/ nags lung dang/ bsamatha'iganagana' du gnag b.ru'an yode' bsamangare yang
dkos/ bu yul 'khor skyong khyod 'di khyod du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang longs spyad par gyisazhig/ sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig/ bsod nams dgakyang gyis shig ces de skadabyas nas/ sa bdag

kyigabu la' khoskyong rumakhrir ro// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor songag phamaganyasikyis nye du rnams la bskul te/ kyi nye du rnams du yul 'khor skyong slong zhag ces byaso// de nas khyim bdagagatu
yul 'khor skyong gnyidu rnams khyim khadagaga'u thu'ang 'khor skyong ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ khyim bdag bu yul 'kho skyong la 'di skad ces smras s// bu yul 'khor skyong gas par gyis shig/
khyod naskyod de bar 'dug 'dug pa de la yang mi tshe skye ba ra na [0f7c]sa pa tsa kyang ['' '']dba'o// dang nar ra gnas panadi'a'a'o/ gcig pur 'dug pan/
dag la bar khyad ka' 'o// dgon ra ra/ yum dad na pa log par du ri ga ga ra 8nga dkan/ bu su la' khor skyong byed 'di'od du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang
longs spyad par gyis shige sbyin ra dmag khang byin tsug/ nga'o danams da kyang gyis shig ces desnyadabyas na'ang khyim bdag gi bu du 'a 'khor skyong rung mi zer ro// donas khyim bdag gi du yul
'khor skyong gi pha ma ltasi kyis yul dgayaM ra sug grogs rnams ka/ kye phyis dag yul 'khor skyong slong zhugs byas so// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnam
yul 'khor skyong ga la ba der se ba ste lhags nas/ khyim bdag gong yulta' reraslong/ tsAdza?sad skyes smras so/ des pa yul 'khor skyongashes par gyis shig/ khyod ni de de bar 'adug 'dug pa
bde ba 'dod pa yin te/ khyodatsAsU kam tshu nga ba na ba tshangs par spyod pa ridad pa dka' 'o// dper pa gnas pa ni dka' 'o//gcig pur 'dug ra na dga' ngar bya dka' 'o//
dgon pa dang/ nags khung dang/ sa mtha'i gnas ma 'a du gnas paNa' ngan pa la bsam ra ra nga dkas/ das pa yul 'khor skyong khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang longs spyang
par gyis shige/ sbyin pa dag kyang byin gi/ bsod namasudag kyang gyisazhices de skadabyas na'ang/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyod dang miwi des khyim bdag
khu yul 'khor skyong gi grogs pa rnams yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis ga la ba de song ste lhags nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyisil dayod cegasasaso/ yab
gumaganyisi mkhyen par mdzod cig/ des pa yul 'khor skyong gumanatsarugs/yang dag pa'i dad pas kun s mdar rarab tu 'byung da stsol cig dang/ gal te rab tu byung ba la dga'
bar gyuran gson por mchis na khyod kyisagazi'i sa par 'gyur grang/ gal te dag 'a bamagyur naM/bu'agro ba'i sa phamam gtogs pa gzhan ma mchis so// phamaganyis kyis snyam r byis pa dag la debu/

yul 'khor skyong rab tu byung ba'i 'og tunged dang 'phrad du 'ongananadi bzhin du gnang ngo// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khoraskyong gi grogs pa rnams khyim bdag bu yul 'khor skyong ga la ba de song stelhags
nas yul 'khor skyong la'adi skad ces so// des pa yul 'khor skyod khyod la du'abyung ba na pha ma gnyis kyis gnangand kyi/ gal te rab tu 'byung ba'i 'og tu 'phrad du 'ong ngan gdod gnang ngo
zhes zer/ yul 'khor skyong gis smras te/ kyaphrad par bgyi'o// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong bdao 'us mthu dang stobs bskyod nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der songalta
phyi nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyis su gtsug tu 'dug nas/ khyin bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces/
gsol to// btsun pa bdag nal mas gnang lags na/bdag legs par gsung pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar ng/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rungan/
bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par ng tshal la shas go'anas/ rigs kyi bu yul 'khor skyong gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang[.]
bson par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyurato// de de ltar rab tu byung nas// des bartson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas pho la mo'i lnga pa'i 'khor lo'i 'khor/
'danyini g.yo zhing mi brtan par gnas/ 'a dubyed kyi rnam pa thams cad sgol ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par cad chod//
nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgabcom pa 'di mngon sum dbyas te/ dgra bcom pa khom pa bkum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong mnyam pa/
nam mkha' dang lag thal du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsal bar gyurapa/ rig ras sgo'i sbubs bam pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/
rgya@#// so so yang dag ra ra rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i red pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur sti lamalta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyisamachod 'ang rjed pa dang/
la gus par skya ba'i ba gnas su gyurato// derang com ldan 'das kyis/ dag slonga rnams la bka' stsal ra// dge slong dag nga'i nyanathosakyi dge slong dgon ro rnams kyi mchogani 'di lta ste/ dag
slong yul 'khor skyong 'di yin no// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ thartsom thams cad gacod pas nags rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhusang/ btsun pa yul 'khor skyong gis las gang dgabagyisan/
des phyug po'i rogs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdugalamadzes pa dang/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du pagyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ dge slong dag yul 'khor skyong nyid kyis sngon tshe rang gi gzhan dag tu tshogs red tsang rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rga' bzhin du 'byung la/ gdonami za bar 'ong ba'i las
de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ yul 'khor skyong nyid kyis las byas shing nga sags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis rten sa su myongabar 'gyur te// dgasong dag las byas shing bsags
pa rnams ni phyi'il gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin pa ra mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dag bcos
[z]0 shang bsags pa de rnams ni zin pa'i phung pa dang/ khams dang/ spyin tshod rnams 'ba' zhig 'a rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag galas rnam san// bskal pa brgyar yang
mi za tshogs shing dus la bab pan// 'bras bu nyid dusmyon par 'gyur// dge slong dab/sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ lus 'a ra gosakyi rgyal po pho brang 'kher gyim dang bas

pa pa rol gyi dmag tshog sabyung sta/ tsa bya gtol med nas// nags khung du zhugs te/ de nyi ma'i gung la nyi ma'i 'od zer tsha bas gdungs nas dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te phan tshunu 'khor 'a khoranas lam
yang man+tadado sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten dum 'byung ba'i chon/ rang sangs rgyas sdug rung 'phongs ra rnams 'a snying brtse ba/ sa mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tshob/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig tu rnams
'jig rten du 'byung ste/ re zhig na rasas rgyas shig dgon pa'i lam de na gnas pa des snying rje bskyed nas// lus 'phags kyi rgyal po de la 'a ma yang bstan chu'i ltengaka' bstan na/

das rgyal po de 'khor dang bcas pa'i srog 'phangs pa bskyangs bko denasargyal po dadad pa skyes nas/ rang gi grong khyer du khride de zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bag so//
mya ngana'as 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang de'i sku gdungagag chodartan bartsig gnas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang/ sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs sugatong ba 'dis na//
[zt ]thubya// bdag gis kyang yon tana'adaltebudag thob par gyur cig/ 'di bas kyangs khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par byed pa gyur cige/ min nyes par byed par mgyur
tsag ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das/ ge bka' stsal ra/ dag slong dag jisnyam du sems/ de'icha de'i dusanargyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di yin no// dgeslong dag yul
'khor skyong gis ni'is gzhan dag kyang byas shing bas gsate/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyidi' skye dgu'i tshel nyi khrithung pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[' ]rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyenapa/ sa bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyurang/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan

a 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten dubyung ste/ dgrong khyer wArANA si na drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags nartan cingang zhugs so// de'i grong khyer wArANAsin/ rgyal ra kri krargyal po byed d/
rgyu de'i ring la 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa dang/ skya bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang/ rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zha ba dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ nang ra drug dang/ chom rkun
dang/ mug dang/ nad rnams med pa dang/ 'bras sA ludang/ bu ram shing dang/ ba glang dang/ ma hadang ldan par 'dug ste/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po/

byed do//de nas de'i bu tha chung drang srong smra bar song ba dang/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po rin tshan sum curtsa gnyis kyis 'gas par brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cusamadze
nga ra byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gi khergyan da// nyim stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mda' ba/ rin po che'aTi kho'agro ba lta bu kun nas 'brang ba na thong nas// mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das lasum/dga'
bar gyur to// dga' ba skya sas ngacom ldan 'das kyi shangs la 'gebs phyag 'tshal ta/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyanasngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis de la
chog bstan te/ de dad pa skyes pas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs 'khor dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas te skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bsab pa'i la/ khu rnams blangs so// yong sumya ngan las 'das
pa'i 'og tu rang na chod rtan 'a gdugs du chung btags so// dab slong dag ji snyam du sums/ da'i cha de'i dus na rgyal po'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyonga'adit+tod yin na// yul

rakhor skyong gis ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bas gas te/ dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA rA NA sa na bram ze la sa surtsa ba rko ba zhig gnasapa da re zhage la rtsa ba rkor song ste
nags khrod du 'khor 'khor ba las/ des der rang sangs rgyas nang pa zhig mthong ngo// dems de dad pa skyes te/ de' yasAn bkur byas nas gang gi tshand sos pa re'i tshe'angabashos gsol to
smon lam btab ra/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ 'di pas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i sten na nyes par byed par gyur cig/ man sa
nga ra byed par ma gyur tsag res byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal ra/ dge slong dag jisnyam dus nas// de'atshade'i dusan rtsa ba rko ba'i bram zer gyur ra gang yan pa de ni yul 'khor skyong

'di yin te/ las da'i rnam ra rasan ra sa 'khor ba namasakyang sdug bsngal myongang ra na gyur la/daltar yang rgyal pa'i re gis phyugader rgyas te/ khrugs bzang zhing bltaspu ga la mdzes par gyur to//rgyud lo
sa dgra bcom pa 'di mngon sum dubyas so// dge slongadag de ltar n las kha cig tu nges pa gzhag pa rnams rnam par smin pa'ong gcig tu nges pa ragag par 'gyur//las gcig tu nges par dkar
kha rnams rnam pa ra nar 'gag tu ngos nga ra dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'drenana rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'drenusar 'gyur ro// dag slong dag de lta lan las gtsagitunges par gnag pa rnams dang/
las 'dren ma rnams sbyangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkaMrang rnams 'ba' ge 'a gtad nga ra bya ste// dag slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab da ra bya'o// ngacom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
nas/ dag slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa rab stod do// rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa rdzogs sa sko
sbomanaM/ rang 'byor dang ni chen po dang// la ga pa can dang ldegus gsas// 'khor ba dnganang+ge da nga dang// mi sdugapa dang gad+ma pa// sen rings dang ni yang dag sdud// sdatshanadab/
tubastan pa yin// rang 'byor zhes bya ban/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal pa rnams dang/ blonaperman ngo rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'a bo'agyi mi
rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/ lta rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ ltam yon rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'amanaM
rnams dang/ lto 'phya chen de nas kyis bku ra sti byas/ blamar byas/ ramer byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding
dang/ mi'am dudang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod tsangashes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/bse/danams chen po dang ldan// na babra' dang/ zhal bras dang/ gakhrims dang/
gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ sman bong rnams bar s pa// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas nga mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chol khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/
da nas gang tshobcom ldan 'das byon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ljongs se sera'adul ba'i skye bo rnams 3
@#// phan gdags pa'i phyiranyan thos rnams ngagos pa da/ bsam gtan pa gang yin pa de dag ni rirang kyi bang rim la ngas ma ga naltar byed cing 'khod de// de nas bzhag na

bya'i rgyal po 'dab bgrangasakyis rgya mtshochen po'i nang nas klu'i phug gu zhig blangs te/ des rab kyi bang rim gyi steng du phyun gnas bza' bar brtsams so// de nas klu'i phrug gud 'chi ba'i tshe nyan thos chen
po rnams la sems dga' bar byas teshi'o// de nas de shinis mnyan du yodang rabram ze 'byor pa zhes byang de 'chungamachanamo'i ltor zhugs nas/ de sgruba brgyad dam dgu len pa dang du byung// khye'u

gzugs khabrang zhing brtan sdug la mdzes pa zhig khatsag so// de nas btsas ston byas nas// bye'u'adi'i monge dzaskad gdagazhag ning 'dogs par byed do// nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di'i pho 'byorapo yin//

pa gan de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i nang rab 'byor dus gdags gzhas zera'o// de nas khye'u rab 'a byor bskyadabasrings te cher skyes nas/ de sngon gyi rgyu'i stebs dang shugs gyi spro thung ba dang/ khro ba dang
na gnag ra rishas che bar gyurato// de nas pha ma gnyise kyis srid srung las phyung sta/ drang srong gnad du rab tu zhugs zha// de'ang de nabasam gtan lhur byed par gyurato/ nags khrodagatsugan ldan
cing 'dug go/ nags khrodad na lha bden ram thongab zhig kyang gnas te/ deg de la snying rje bskyed nas// rigs kyi 'don khro ba dang zheganagapa shasacha bas khyad par thob par 'gyur gyis/bdag
gis 'di nganyam ldan 'das la ltar gzhug go snyam mo// de nas ltades rang 'byor gyi mdun du sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod de// danas rang 'byor bcom ldan 'das/
lta nga'i 'dod r bskyod nas lta de'i rdzu 'phrul gyin thus bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du khrid do// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum ru rtsa gnyis kyis legs par

ngargyan pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyad bus mdzes pa ra byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyami stong bas lhag pa'i'od manga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzad ba mthong nas// mthong
ma thag tu de sa mas can rnams la zhanyen ra 'i sems gang yin pa de mad par gyur to// de nas dga' ba skyes te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyi'i bcom ldan 'dab kyi na
sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhinathugs su chudan// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur bdalta bu'i chos bstan to/

de thog nas rigs kyi bu rab 'byeragyis 'jigatshog sal lta ba'i ri'i rtsa me thon ngo t+taMshu ye shes rdo rjes brten nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'dras bu mngon sum dubyas te/ bden pa ma thong nas de bcom ldan 'das
kyi bstan pa la rab tu byungahU/ des brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas byams pa bsgoms pas sems btul nas/ phol mige lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par
rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad sAl bdang/ ltangab dang/ rnam par 'thorab dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i ches mun yanapar ru da chad de/ nyen mengs pathamasarud
sbrangasanas/ dgra bcom pa nyin mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom ra khams gsum ra 'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas// gage radang bong bar n ltamar/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du' dra
ba'i soms dang ldan pa// tshunadan spangs pa lta bur bsa'i bar gyur pa// rig pas sgo nga 'i sbyabs bcom pa// rig pa dang/ mdzen par shes pa dang/ se bo yang dag par rig pa thob pa/

srid ra'i rnyed pa dang/ chags pa dang/ ba kuran+taM la ma lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjedapa dang/ gus par skya pa'i gnas sugyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan ng
rang 'byor gyis gang nas shi 'phos pa dang/ gang du skyes pa dang/ las gang gis skyas pa bsams pa dang/ des tshe rabs lha brgya'i bar du klu 'a sa shi 'phos te ku ra ba' zhig tu skyes par mthong

ngo// de nas de'i blo skyes ra/ bdag gis 'di ltar zhe sdang gi rkyen bsgrubs pa des n bdagacho rabs lnga brgyar klu 'ba' zhaki tu skyes te/ de kho na'i phyirisdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyurakyis/ ngani

zhis bdag la gzhan dag gis zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur nang/ de dang ldan ra sa 'us dang bral ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dang/ sem can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur pa de lta bur
ma'agyur bar bya'o sAn nas/ nyon mongs pa re da ra la gnas pa'il ma yang dag par blangs te gnas so// degangakatshe dge 'dun nang ngan/ grangangs/ yul 'a mu/ ljongs su bsod goms kyi ri
gnas rar 'dod pa ri'i tshi/ thog ma khonar spyod yul la lta bar 'dod de/ bdag mthong na than grog sbur yan chad gu khang sna 'ga' zhagi gi phyir sems sdang bar n 'gyur grong snyam nas/ des spyod lam

da pa tang stagazhan du bsgyuranas/ des sems can de dag ga ge mas dga' bar gyur te/ de dgrabcom pa 'di yan du rbas kyang d lta bu'i nyam nga nga myongang// de nas tshodang ldan pa rang 'byor gyis blo rgyas pa/

ma la bdag gsed skyo bsang pa la phan gdab sa so snyam mo// de nas rdzu 'phra 'a rgyab nam mkha' lding lnga brgya sprul te/ de dag mthong nas kla rnams sbag cing stangs ta mi dga' nas phan tshun du chu bya
gta' me da nga ra gyur to// de nas rang 'byor gyis yang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yongs su bskyangs so// de nas de dag ge mas dga' bar gyur nas/ byams pa'i lung phog go/ de nas

yang klu chen po'i gzugs su sprul nas namam par ldaTi lnga brgyagacig te/ de dang kyang skrag nas byams pa'i lung phog nas/ des de ltar gru dpon n na kha' lding gi rigasalnga brgya lnga brgya nga tul 'a/ den dar

bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag nga'i nyanathos kyi dgagleng nyon mngag pa me da par gnas pa rnams kyin chogana'adi lta ste/ roges kyi bu rang 'byor 'di yin no/ re
[et ]nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ thicom thams cad gcod pa sa ngas rgya sa bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsunang tshe dang rda nad ranga' tsungs ya d+hal byas na/ das
[A ]nyon mongs ra ma mchis par gnas pa'i mchog tung stan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag kha 'byor 'di kyis sngon tsherangs gzhan dgatu tshogs rud rudze na rgyag pa dang wan
ta rta dba'argal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdonam khri par 'ong ba'i las de dgabyas shing bsags pa sa na/ rang 'byor nyid kyis 'as byas shingengags pa de dag gzhan gu zhagegaben sa ga re bar 'gyur te/
dag slong dag las byas shing bsags pamasan phyo ro' rgyas 'i khams la rnamarar smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dad/ rlung gi kham sa 2 rnam par smiMn par mi 'gyur te/ las
dag bdang mo dag babyas shing bsags pa rnams ni bon pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ spyamachoda rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lu can dag ga'i sa rnan sa na//
bskal pa brgyar yang rgyudam bla// tshogs shing dusal bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa nga thang pa 'di
nyid la/ skye dgu'i tsho la to khro thub pa na/ de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar ga bag bsu pa/ 'jig
namkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha 'asgyug/ med pa/ lhadang ma rnams kyi sten ra sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten dbyungaste/ da grong khyer wArANA san drang srong/
ba'i ridigs kyi gsan rten cing bzhugs so// de nas der 'di rang byung ste/ 'das sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dang/ byin nas/ 'khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs te smon lam btab
ba dgaba'i rtsa ba dang/ sogs bskyod pa dang/ sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dise na/ bod gam 'ongs pa'i dusasu bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u blamal/ bram ze'i

khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tsho'o brgya thub ngan/ dengazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sa ngas rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de bstan pa
la rang du byun gnas / kon mongs pa med par gnas pa'i mchogatugyur cig ces byas so// las bgang dag gi klur skyes shen/ nyon mongs ra rnams m spangs pa dang/ dbang po rnams 'khrul
ba dang/ las kyi lam rnams mthar jugapa ma byas pa dang/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dag slong rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed nas sbrul gdug pa zhes bya ba'i tshigabarjod de/ des na klur skyes so/
des sbyin pa dang rab tusbyin pa ragabyin nas/ tshangs par spyod pa rig nas bsrus pa des n/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyidaman sum dubyas te/ nyomongs pa med par gnas pa'i mchog tu bstan to/
dge slong dag de lta ngan las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams nas ra rasmin pa'i ngagacigatunges par gnag par 'gyur re// las gtsug ru rig par dkar nga rnams na rnam par
smin pa'i ng gcig tunges par dkar rar 'gyura'o// 'as 'drenan nan ga na rnam par smind 'ang 'drenan ra 'gyur ro// dge slong dag dengs na las gcig tu nges par gnag nga rnam sa rang/ las/
'drenan rnams spyang la/ 'as gnaMg tu nges pa radakar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad pa rabyas/ dag slong khyed kyis de ltar paslang pa ra bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad rus pa galastsalan
dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcon ldan 'das kyis gcung dga' mngon par bstod do///bam ro t+tarIkurtsa gagi nga// rgan po zhes bya bano//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la// rgyal pa rnams dang/ blon po chen ng rnams dang/ phyug ro rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mo rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ dad dngo na rnams/
dang lha rnams dang/ ku rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ ltam yin rnam sa dang/ ma mkha' lding rnan sa dang/ mi 'am cunam sa dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas//
dramar byas// ri mo rabyas/ ma chod pa byas te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lhan tshan dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am cidang/ lto 'phye chen po mA
kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgo danams chen po dang ldan pa/ nubaza' dang/ zhal bras dang/ gzimasacha dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gsos dang/ smanazonganan

b.ros pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dunadang bcas pa rgyal po 'i khaban 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pan rtan cing bzhugs so// de'i tshirgyal po lo 'ban tshong ngangon phyug ri nor mang la re ngas spyod che ba gas
yo ngas su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che nga/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi khu'i noradang 'gran pa zhagi gnas pa des// rigasamanyam ra las chungan blangs nas/ dad dang lhan
cig tu rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chungan la bu chags nas// bum byung bar re zhagin yang de nyid dang rtswa shing dang/ 'a ' dga' dgur sbyong// de rtse zhing dga' 'a dga' dgur spyod

pa 'gam par bu snga ma de 'dug bzhin du ri shaganama'i ltar de'i bu snga phyir bcu khyung yang du dang po danam ngal t+tade na 'dug bzhazhi'o// de nas razhagin khyim bdag gi chungam da na bar gyur nas// da' rtsa ba dang/
sdong bu dang/ 'a ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu'i snyan rnams kyis rim gros kyang nad da na ban gyuranas gangag tshod sha'i thug pa'i nad kyis thebs te/ 'chi nyeb de'i tshe des thab la
snus pa/ 'on khyen par mdzod cig/ 'di'i nang nabadagag bu dang po mchis kyis/ nam bdagakhur pan/ glo g.yas ror mtshon gyis dral te/ khye'u dang po bsamachis pa derlung zhag ces de skad/gnas/
khya@#// pas gas pa kun nathemar zang/ mthon po rnams zhitha mar snyil// phrad pa rnams nathimar 'bral// gson po rna mkhanan phar 'chi'i// zhes pas de shi'i// den de dag

gos sngon po dang/ sa ra ro dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dag gse khyogs brgyan te/ pasal ba'itshal gyi dur khrod du khyer nas// sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byad bos se// rgyal po 'khab kyi grong khyeradzes//

thag tu'ang 'di ltar bud tshe dache gamo zhagi 'a le'adasnyed cig gi bar du bumar na'adug lta/ de'i bu gzhan ng nubyung yang thogama'i bum pa 'an 'dug pa de na byun gnas / dang sman pa'i rgyal po 'tshe byed kyis

sha ba de'i lte mtshon gyis dral te/ dang po'i khya'umanga' du 'dug pa de dbyung bar 'tshal lo zhig de skad du sgra grag go/ sgra grags nas kyang srog chagasaM 'bum phrag dum dang/ rdzogs byed la sogs pa
ston pa drug pa rnams kyang bsa'i pa'i tshal gyi dur khrod du ltad mo la 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das si/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'a bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo sang 'a dag blo nga rnam sa

la 'di skad dubcom ldan 'das dur khrod du rgyu shing gshabags par bzhed kyis/ khyed las gang rmad du byung nga lta 'a dod de dag shog cig ces sgo zhage/ de nas re zhaganabcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa
kun shes ko'u de rtse dang/ rlangs pa dang/ ming chen dang/ ma 'gags pa dang/ shAri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang/ 'od srug dang/ kun dga' bo dang/ nam gru la sogs
0 panyan thos chen po rnams kyis zhamarang byas te/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so// skya bo'i tshogs kyig kyang bcom ldan 'das mthonas go skye'o// de nas sman pa 'tsho byed kyis dud
med de'i klogayas padro' to// de nas khye'u de rang byung nas dkaranang yan lag gnyeram sa gang ba lus kyi phyogs cha rnams rgan shar gyur pa/ dbang po rnos pa ri deb/ nyam stobs chung ba zhig byung
ngo// de nas khyung ma thag tu skye bo'i tshogs de dag la bltas nas tshig tu smas pa/ kya bral rnams sa ma/ blam lta burnams sam/ pha ma lam/ mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon rnams la tshig
rtsub pom zer cig/ ji ltar bdagama'i lter re ba dang lang ka gnyis kyibar du lo drug cu 'dug 'dug pa de lta bu'i nyams myong bar gyur ta ra zhes smos nas/ rangami zur bar 'dug go/ der bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dgaslong dag 'di ltar srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can gyis kyang nyams 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur gyis/ srid par skye ba tham sa cad kyis chog par gyis
shig/ srid pa la skye ba thams cad kyis chog pa ra gyis shagi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khye'u 'ang ka' stsa' ra/ khye'u khyod rgan po yin nam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgan po/
lags so// de'u khyod rgan ro yin nam/ bde bar gshogs pa bdag nargan po lags so// de nas nadi las de'i mang rgan po zhes btags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las
de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad do// de thos nas sems can brgya phrag mang po skyo bar gyunas/ khyad par chen po thob bo// gon po de'ang bcu'i bar du khyim gyi gnas na 'dug
bdu gnas labadun cu lon te/ ra rom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po ri ra'i dge slong nyi shu rtsa lnga dang thabs cig tu dbyar gnas pa ra dan bcas so// de nas
der dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so so'i skye bor 'dug bazhin du gangagos kyang skabs dbye bar mi bya'o zhes bris sa bcas so// de nas re zhig na blung gsum 'don pa dang/ dag slo nga ti shu rtsa bzhis
dgra bcom pa nyid ban/ rgan po gcig dus so'i skya bo'i sa na 'dug go/ da nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis skas 'byed pa byed ra'i nang du shin tu mang du brgya dpaka gnas tshogs kyi nang du
bsad de patangango// de nas des mtshon cha blangs te khang phuba' su zhugakhanas zhange rnam pa du ma ra smi sngags btonato// smras pa/ nags la thams cad 'bar 'gyur te// ri rnams san por
( gyur bsten// 'on kyang dadung sdig pa 'i sams// rnam par grol bar ma gyur to// phu chu dag gi pang zha// 'bang chudag kyang drilazhin du// 'on kyang da dung sdig pa 'i sems// rnam par grol bar
mgyur to// sgo nga las skyes bya 'di dag/ sgra skadagacom yang chu gyun// 'on kyang da dung sdig pa'i sams// rnam par grol bar ma gyur te// nags tshal 'di dga' ma se ra// shing rnams
'dabs zhugs gyur na// 'on kyang da dung sdig pa'isags// rnam pa grol bar ma gyur to// lung 'bog ra yi gnas brtan nas// phyogs phyogs dgatudang branen// 'on kyang da dung sdig pa'i gnas//
rnam par grol bar ma gyur to/ so so'i skya bor 'dug bzhin du/ ston pa'i thad du dzaltar 'gro// donan da gson gyis ci dgos kyis// bdag rna mtshon gyis lcebs te gtang// zhes
zera'o// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisi ni mi mkhyenar 'am/ mi gaN+Diges pa ma/ ma rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci'ang med la/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa// bsrung ba gcig pa dang ldan r// gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa// gnyis sum gnyung ba/
gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang ba mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bsrabs ra/ 'dul ba gzhi gsum la mkhas pa// chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthal shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dis pa/ ma 'jigs dang si mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gapa nga dgapa'is ngaga'isgra chen po sgrogs
pa/ yan 'gan+da rnam par snga sa la/ 'gro ba lnga las yong dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtagatu gnas par bya ba drug la gnasal/ ]
byang chub kyi yan lag dadun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston ra/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa// stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan ra/ phyogs
bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnam san/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsu mamtshan dus gsun dus ngas rgyas kyi rdzun gyi 'jig
pa don la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su der/ su'i phongs shing 'dug// sunItis nga bar gyur/ gun gnod pa dang ldan/ sun 'apos pa dang/ 2ma ngang dang/ gnod pa dang ldan//
sunangan song du gzhol/ sunin song du 'bab/ gu ni ngan song dubs/ sunanasong nag phyung ste de mtho rasi dang/ thar pa dang/ 'bras bu la gzhag ra ra/ sun 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying

pa las la gnas drang bar bya/ suna'aphags pa'i nor bdunamed pa las 'phags pa'i nord dun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/gnadi'i pa'i rtsa ba rnamAmang spyad pa las ba dang rabya/ ba ni dag pa
rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa 'a ga yo'ongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du yi shag gakhrib sa pa 'jug go/ 'di'i smasapa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi
gnas// dus rlabs yol par 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar byaba'isras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus 'go de'i ba med// de nas razhagan bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te/rdzu

'thab/ 'phrul gyis kyang de'i thad dgashagasas/ nang 'thun pa'i chos bstanate/ de thosazhas tshe dang ldan pa rgan po lo'atshig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'a khor lo 'di nyidi g.yo zhing mi bskang ra ri gnas // du
byed kyin m pa thams cad snyil ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par ' jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsa dachod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas// dgra bcom pa 'di mngon sum
du byas te/ dgra'an pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas// gsaradang bong bar manyan pa// nam mkha' dang leg mtho'i du 'dra ba'i sa mas dang ldan pa/ tsan dan
sbyangs pa lta burab sal bar gyur pa// rig pas sgo nga'i sbyabs bcom pa// rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang/ chags pa
dang/ bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lhan ms kyis mchod cidirjed pa dang/ gus pasmanga'i gnas su gyur to// de nas rgan ro pa dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas/ bdag

gis kyang gdul bar bya ba 'ga' lta yod dam snyam dus mas pa dang/ des tshong pa lngabargya tsam rgya mtsho'i nang na srin po nag po'i rlung gis bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ sna ga bsngal dang phrad pa 'di
dag bdag gis sdug bsngal de las yongs su bskyab par bya'o// 'on kyang de dag bdag gis 'dul bar 'gyur rosnyam mo// de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis so yanas 'jigs pa de las yongs su skyabasaso//
bya@#/ gdan s de dag dad pa skyo ga ta thams cad rab tu byung nas de dag la yid la byed pa'i lung phogaste/ de dag thams cad kyis brtson pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas nyon mong
pa thams cad kha gnas / dgra bcom pa nyidi mngon sum du byas so// de nas de dag gis yon tana rnams sus kyang mi shes nas// drug sde rnams 'phya bar gyur te/ rgan blun du'adug la mi lcabargya dang

lhan tsag 'khod cing drung du bzhag pas 'di dag kyang de dang 'dra bar du' bar mi 'gyur zhes 'dzer to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshangs pa mtshungs par sbyod nga lamanyes gshin pa// gzhan la
phan 'dog pa 'a zhug pas/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gling bar 'dod nas// tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rgan po ga la ba der bo nga ste phyin nas/ chedang ldan pa dgaslong gnas brtan rgan
po dang lhan cig tu mngon sum du yang dag par na gu bar 'gyur ba dang/ yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'dris nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu/
'dug nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos// gnas brtan rgan po la 'di skad ces smras so// gal terAnas dra ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phyin/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rgan po
la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig 'dri'o// tshodang ldan pa kun dga' ngo dros shig dang/ ngas khyod la bsnyad par bya'o// tshodang ldan pa gnag nga rta' rgan podag slong dgon nga na gnas pa dang/ shing drung

'ag na gnas pa dang/ khang stong na gnas pa gas chos gang dag rgyun mi 'chad par yod la bya/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bdag srong dgon pa na gnas pa dang/ shing drung na gnas pa dang/ khang stong na gnas
pag chos gnyis rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya ste/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ngo// gnas brtan zhi gnas kun tu bsten cing bsgroms te mang du byas pa sa don gang dag nyams su myong ngar 'gyur/

lhugan thong kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas don gang nyanas su myongang ra 'gyur/ chodang ldan pa kun dga' ng zhig nas [] kun tu ng stan rung bsgoms te mang du byas pa ni lhag mthong la bstan te
rnam da ra grol bar 'gyur ro// lhag ma thong kun tu ng snyan cing bsgoms te mang du byas de ga ni zhi gnas la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyurar/ 'tsho dar ldan pa kun dga' nganags dang lhag mthong

yongs su bgron sa pa ri 'phags pa 'anyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa'i sa mas na'oms kyi sgo nas rnam ra ra grol bar 'gyur ro// gnas brtan khams rnams gang dag yin/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsgreng
ba'i khams gang yin pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral pa'i khams gang yin pa dang/ 'gog pa'i khams gang yin pa'o// gnas brtan gang sngangs lasong ba'i khan ga zhes bya/ gang 'as 'ded/
chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang phral nga'i rams zhes bya/ gang 'gags pa 'a 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya/tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'du byed thams cad sbyangs pa 'a spong ba'i khams zhes bya'o//
la 7 @#// 'du byed thams cad las 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bya'o// 'du byed thams cad 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya'o// de nas

tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo gnas brtan rgan pos bshad pa la mngon pa ra bstod de rjes su yi rang nas/ dge slong lnga brgya pa ga la nga der song sta phyin nas/ dag srong lngabargya po rnams la 'di skad ces
snas so// tshe dang ldan pa dag dag slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang/ shing drung na gnas pa dang/ khang stong na gnas pas chos gang dag rgyanami 'chad par yid 'bya/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dag
slong dgon pan gnas pa dang/ shing drung na gnas pa dang/ khang stong na gnas pas chos gnyasirgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya ste/ zhi gnasaM dang lhag mthong ngo// tshe dang ldan pa dag zhi gnas kun tu
bstan cing bsgoms ta mang du sa pas don gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ lhag mthong kun tu ston cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas don gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga'

bo zhi gnas kun tu bstan cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas ni lhag mthong la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur re// lhag mthong kun tu bstan tsangamang du byas pa san zhi gnas la brten te rnam pa ragrol bar
'gyur ro// dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zhi gnas dang ltag mthong yongs subasgom pa'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa sa mas ni khams kyi sgo nas rnam pa ragrol bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan
ra dag khan sa rnams gang dag yani/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po spong ba'i khams gang yin pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rams gang yin pa dang/ 'gog pa'i khams gang yin ra 'o// tshe dang
ldan pa dag khams gang sarlangs pa 'a sngo ra ba'i khams zhes bya/ gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams nas bya/ gang 'gags pa la 'gog nga 'i khams zhes bya ste// tshe
dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'du byed thams cad sngangs pa 'a sde nga ba'i khams zhes bya'o// 'du byed thams cad las 'dod chags dang bra' nga la 'dod chags dang bral nga'i khams zhes bya'o// 'du byed

thams cad 'gags pa 'a 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya'o// tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo dag slong lnga brgya re rnams kyis bshad da la mngon par bastod de rjes su yi rangs nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
sta phunanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo pas phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 'os/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// btsun pa dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang/ shang drung na gnas pa dang/ khang stongan kho gnas de sa chos gang dag rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bgyis/ kun dga' bo dag
slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang/ shing drung na gnas pa dang/ khang stongan gnas pas chos gzhog rgyunas 'chad par rigs de la bya ste/ zhi gnas dang lhag ma thod ngo/ tsun pa'i gnas kun tu
bstan cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas/ don ganganyams su myong bar 'gyur lags/ lhaga mthong kun tu bastan cing bsgoms te mang dub gyis pas den gar nyams su myong bar 'gyur/

ny+tsa lags/ kun dga' bo zhi gnas kun tu bstan cingobasgoms te mang du byas pa sa ni lhag ma thong 'a brtan te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// lhag ma thong kun tu bston cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas nizhi/
gnas 'a brtan te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo zhi gnas dang lhagan thong yongs su bsgoms pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems na khams kyi sgo nas rnam par
grol bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa khams rnams gang dag lags/ kun dga' bo song pa'i khams gang yin pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams gang yin pa dang/ 'gog pa'i las
gangayin pa'o// btsun pa gang snga sa pa la spong ba'i khams zhes ngagyi/ gang lasu 'dod chags dang bral ba 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bgyi/ gang 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i
tshe khams zhes bgyi/ kun dga' ro 'du byed thams cad skyes pa 'asrongapa'i khams zhes bya'o// 'du byed thams cud la sa 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khamasazhes bya'o/

bdu byed thams cad 'gab sa la la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya'o// btsun pa ston pa dang nyan thos rnams 'di lta ste/ tshig gis mchog gis 'dakhon ltar don dang don du 'thun nang 'dra ba dang/ tshig dang tshig tu

bathun zhing badrab dang/ ya gi dang pa ga 'thun na nge 'dra ba ni ngo mtshar 'a gsaso// de ci'i slad du zhin/ btsun pa 'di bdag gnas brtan dge slong rgan po ga la 'demachis nas/ gnas brtan dag slong rgan
po 'a don 'a dodi tshig 'di rnams dang/ yig 'di rnams kyisazlas na'ang da ltar bcom ldan 'dasakyis ji skad bka' stsal pa khon bzhin du des bdag la don 'di khyod tshig 'di rnams dang/ yi ge 'di
rnams kyis smras pa'i 'an btab la/ bdag gnas brtan dgaslong rgan pos bshad pa 'a na ngon ra ra bstod re rjes su yi rang zhes/ dag slong lnga brgya po rnams ga la ba deram chis te/ dge spyir

lnga brgya po rnams la don 'di nyid tshig 'di rnams dang/ yi ga 'di rnams kyis smras na'ang da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal ra khen []zhin du de dag gis kyang bdag la don 'di nyid tshig
'di rnams dang/ yig 'di rnams kyis rmas pa'i lan btab ste/ btsun pa ston ra dnganyan thos rnams 'di lta ste/ tshig gi na chog gis 'di lon ltar don dang don du 'thun zhang 'dra la/
tshig dang tshig tu 'juna'ang 'dra ba dang/ yig dang yi gara' thunazhing 'dra ba de ni ngomatshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong rgan po su yi/
shas sam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa dge slong rgan po ni dgra bcom pa/ brag pa zad la/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor
ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes ngas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba lags so// dge slong lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom ba/ brag pa brad pa/ bya ba
rgyas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur borab/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su brad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag lab dag
sato/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rganamo dang/ dag slong lnga brgya po de dag glongs shing bsgrags pa de'i tsho/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/
the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa rganangos las gangadag bgyis na/ des lo drug cu'i bar du na'i ltenamachis par gyur lags/ btsub
lag gang dag bgyis na/ su yi de rtul bar gyur la/ rang tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyidi mngon sum du'agyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag slong rgan po 'di
kyis ston tshorab sagazhan dag tu tshogs rnyid cing rgyan grub pa dang ldan to/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdonami za bar 'ongaba'i lA de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rgan po dekyisalas
byas shing bsags pa dedag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dgaslong dga' s byas zhingabasags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par 'gyur/ chu'i khams
dang 8 mgi khams dang/ rlung gi kham sa 'a rnam par smin pa rami 'gyur te/ 'as dgab dang ni dag pa byas shing bsags pa rnams ni thos pa'i phung pa dang/ khams dang/ rgya ma chad
rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis rnams ni// bska' ra brgyurayang chud mitra// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par
'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyidil skye dgu'i tshe'i nyakhro thubapan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'dzagi rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pasas rgyas
bcom ldan 'das 'od srusazhas bya ba 'jig rten du byungasta/ de grong khyer wA rA NA sa na drang srong sgruba'i ri dgas kyi gnas ni rten cing bzhugs sa/ danasatshong dpon gyi buzhig gnas brtan zhig
las rab tu byung ngo// gnas brtan dan dgra bcom pa 'dod chags sag pa zhig go/ de nas re zhig na yul der dus ston zhig byas nas// dag slong gzhonan das gnas brtan de bslang sta bzhi d+ma
laspyod yul gyi grong du bzhud do na/byas so// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ bu da dung sngas kyis/ ro zhagisong la dag pa'i phyogs gyis shog/ lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du dge
slong gzhon nu des gnas brtan de bslang ste/ bzhangs la spyod yulagyi grong du bzhud ces byas na yang lan gnyasi lan gsum gyi bar du gnas brtan gyis da dung sngas kyis/ song la
dge ba'i phyogs gyis shig ces byas so// de nas dag slong gzhon nulto 'dun can des ngag gi las rtsub po smyos te/ khyed la drug cu'i bar du'ang khyim nas ma byung zhig/ nga na seng ge no zhes byas/
so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag ji snyam dusanas/ daratshada'i dus na dag snyinga gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin pa de na dag slong rgan po 'di yin te/ des dgra
bcom pa la sems snang bar byas nas// ngag gi 'gartsub po skyas pa'i las de'i rnam par nang sa ni le drug cu'i bar du ma'i rten 'dug 'dug go/ gzhan yang chos las pa sna byas pa des
snabyas pa des ni shes rab 'chal pa gyur te/ dbang po rnams tshogs chen pos yongs su smin par gyur to// des dar bslab pa dang/ kha ton byas pa dang/ phung po la mkhas
pa dang/ khamasa'ang mkhas pa dang/ skye mched la mkhas pa dang/ rton runge 'brel ra ra 'byung ba lamakhas pa dang/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa 'a mkhas par byas pa des n de ltar dra'i/
bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas// dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum dubyas so// dag slong dag de bsan dag gi nyis pa sbas pa'i phyir 'bad par byas ste/

zhes rgan po de so so'i skya bor gyur pa'i tshanyis par lta bu dgami 'byung bar bya'o// de 'dis dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par
bya'o bcom ldan 'das kyis deskad ces bka' stsal nas/ dgoslong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bastod do// lal pa can zhes bya ba na/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang/ chongadaponams dang/ ded dpon rnams dang/
lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ ltam yin rnams dang/ non mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/
bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi mchod cing
shas pa'isangs rgyas khacom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims cha dang/ gdan dang/ stun gsos dang/ snyan bong rnams brnyes
pa/ nyan thos kyi doga'adun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyalabu rgyal khyad kyi chol khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa zhatshong dpon/
phyug cing nor mang la longs spyodacha ba/ sengag su'adzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs

mnyan pa las chung ma blangs nas// dad dang lhan cig tu rtsi zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ zla ba gyod dmadapag yin pa dang/
bukhyung ste/ khya' gzugs bar ng zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa// mdog pabrangs gso ra gyikha dog can yan 'a ga dang nyapi 'ag thams cad dang ldan pa// rang bzhan gyis tshe rabs dran pa zhig btsas

so// de nas des rang gi lag pa byung ste 'o byed cinges/thang 'a 'jor bar byed la la khyud par byed de tshig tu smas pa/ kye ma bdag gi 'a ga ga gnyis shin tu yun ring mo zhig nas gdod red do// kya ma
ngadagagi 'a ga gnyis shin tu yun ring na zhagi nas gdod snyad do zhes sngar ro// da nasaMde btsas da'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad brtags nas ming 'dogs par byed do// nyedu

rnams na re/ 'di bag ma thag tu 'a ga pa brdungasta 'o byed cing mthong la 'dzer la 'khyud par byed pas na de'i phyir khyo shu'ada'o meng 'a ga pa can zhes gdags go zhes zer ro// dmas khye'u lag pa can/
yang na 'tsho ba'i ma mganyis dang/ num bsnan pa'i ma mo gnyis dang/ dri ma 'khru ba'i ma na gat+tog dang/ rtsa pa'i man gat+tas te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad na// dam ma brgyad kyis 'o ma
dang/ zho dang/ maradang/ zhun mar dang/ mar rgyasnying khu dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog ga[] bskyed bsrings ta/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin duskya drag par gyur to//
da nas gang gi tsho 'a dar 'jigs pa zhig byung ba da'i tshe skyabo'i tshogs 'jigs par gyur taM/ phan tshun du ci bya gtol med nas rdzas rnams sbyad par khyad do// khye'u lag pa can na lag pa gnyis
spyod par byed de/ skye bo'i tshogs 'a'ang 'daskad du/ kyi yon gnas rnams la sa mas sdang bar ma byed cig/ tshig rlung po ma bram du'e kyam bdal/ga lag guganyasi h+phun tu yun ringamo zhig nas gdod
rnyed do zhes zer ro// don phyi zhig na khya'u 'gapa can rgyal bu rgyal byed kyitsha' duseng ba dang/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku spyas chen po'i mtshan sum curtsa gnyis kyis lags pAr
brgyan pa/ dpo byad bzang po brgyad zhus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyin stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga'adi/ rin po che'i ro bo 'gror lta bu kun nas bzang
ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das 'a sems dga' bar byas te/ dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyirebcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rangabazhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
[g]bya// rtogs par 'gyurang de lta bu'i chog bstan te/ dra thog nas lag pa can gyi 'jigartegs 'a lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo na thenade nyidi yasardo rjes ngacon nas/ rgyun duzhugs pa'i
'bras bu mngon sum du byas ste/ des bden pan thong nas pha ma la gso' te/ bcom ldan 'das kyibastan pa la rab tu byung sta/ des brtson pa dang/ bslu ba pa dang/ 'bad pas lam lnga pa'i 'a khor ba'i
ra rer le 'di nyid la ye sharim nga rtan par rigs// 'du byed kyi rnamar thams cad skul ba dang/ ltungab dang/ rnam ra ra 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jigang 'chos can yin par rtsa da chod de/ 'onams pa
thams cad spangs nas// dgra bcom pa nyida mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa las sogs gsum po'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas// gser dang bong bar manyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lags thil du 'dra
ba'i sems dang ldan ng/ tsan dan sbyangs pa lta bur bsal ngar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbyangs brtsom pa/ rig ra dang/ ma yon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i
snyad pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i rgyu rnams kyis mchod cing rjod pa dang/ gug par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de dgra rtsen pa nyid thob
par gyur kyang/ de bzhin du dag slong rnams la chos ston te/ kyi yon gnas rnams la sa nas sdangabar ma gyur cig/ tshig rtsu ba pom thor cig dkyim bdag gi lagagu gat+taMs yun ring mo zhig nas
gdodan de nas trer ro// de nas dag slong dgaza tsom skyes te/ tha tson thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus ra/ btsun pa lag pa can gyis las gang dag bgyisangashing ngas gas
na des dgra bcom pa nyid thob lags// de bzhin dukye ma ngadag gi'agagu gat+ti'i shin tu yun ring mo zhig nas gdor rnyed do zhes mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong
dag gang brag 'di ni res kyi 'bras bun ngon sum du mthong ba yin no// das tsalas bsams te de skad zer nga khyad nyan par 'dod dan/ btsun pa stan par 'tsha' ra gas so// ga slong dag 'a ga pa can
nyid kyis sngon tsherangs gzhan dag tuchogs nod cing kun grung pa dngaldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdonami za bar 'ong nga'i 'a ga de dag byas pa nga ngag gas ra sa/ lag pa can 'di kyis
la ga byas shing bsags pa dedag gzhan su zhig gsitanas su myong ro'agyur te/ dag slong dag las byas shing nga la gas ra rnan gni phyi rol gyis ri ngams la rnan ra ra rlin pa ra mi 'gyur/ chu'i

khan sa dang/ ma'i khar sa dang/ glang gi kham sa 'a rnam pa ji sna na ra la mi 'gyur da/ lasudag nga dang mi dag babyas shing bas gas pa rnams ni zin ra 'i phung po dang/ kham sa dang/ skye mched rnams
'ang 'a zhig 'a rnam par smi'ang ra 'gyur ro/ 'u sa 'dag ji/ ra sa rnams// bag da brgyar 23d+d+hachudar bla 3tsheg dag zhing dug 'a bab pa na// 'bras bu snod du smin pa ra'agyur//
nyu@#// dag slong dag sngon byungab 'dus pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyedi la skye dgu'i tsho'anyiwi thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshags pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ rgyun bu 'dul ba'i kha 'asgyur ba/ blanamad pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom3na 'das 'od

srungs zhes bya ba 'jigarten du byung ste/ dgrong khyerawArANA sa na drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nagasan rtan cing bzhugs so// re zhig na de na dge slong gnyagi zhigan dza' zhing 'dug ste/ de'i nang gcig
! nidagra bcom pa yang yin la/ mang du thos pa 'ang yazhin/ cig shos ni so sa'i sku de rang yin la// thos pa'i nganyung ngo// da' dgra bcom pa mang du thos pa don kun shes pa ngasadananas chen
po dang ldan r// gos dang/ dras dang/ mar cha dang/ nad gsos dang/ snyan thong rAd pa/ g.yar 'drenang mang du rnyed pa zhig ste/ gang du g.yaradrangs pa der des dge slonganadza' bo da phyingezhani
'brang ba'i dag sbyong de khrid do// razhagananyis rug gcig dgra bcom pa de dag g.yar drangs te 'gro bar chad pa las/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dag sbyong de btsal nas rnyed do// de nas da mi snang nas/
( des dge slongagazhanazhig khrid pa dang/ ramagi na dar dag slong gzhonus mas rgod pa dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa dag gags dang/ des phyi bzhin badrang ba'i dag so 'dirang dang
[o ]ma khrid de/ gzhan drade dazhes byas so// des de khros te dgayater du lasems sdang bar byas nas// ngag gi 'og rtsub resnyasate/ bdag gis phyin chad de'i ltung ba bkrus su phyin/ bdag gi 'bag pa
'dag9semad par gyurabyas byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag jim dus nas/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dag snyomadza' boragyur pa gang yin padan lag pa can 'diyin te/

des dgra bcom pa la sems sdang ngar byas te/ ngag gi las rtsu ba po smras pa dus tshe rabs lnga brgyar ga dmad da ra gyur to// phyis stang nas 'gyod pa skyes te nyes ra 'anyisazhas mthol zhing bshags pa/

rnam par phye zhing bsal par byas pa reg na lagar thog nga ragyur to// des de rab slangs pa dang/ kha ton du byas pa dang/ phung po 'amakhag pa dang/ khan sa lam khag pa dang/ skyo chad lam lA pa dang/
rtan cing 'brel pa ra 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa 'an khas ra ra byas pa des nadi ltar dgra bcom pa 'di mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar n las gcig tu nges/
par gnag pa rnams ni rnam pa 'asminapa 'ang gcig tu nges par gnag pa ra 'gyur ro// 'as gcig tus da ra dkar ba rnams ni rnam da ran pa'i ng gcig tu nges pa ra dkar bar 'gyur ro//
las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ng 'dran m ra 'gyur ro// dag mo nga dag de bas na 'a sa gtsug tu yen par ganag ra rnams dang/ lag 'drenas rnams sngangs la/ las
gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas//
dag slong de dag ya rang ga te/ bcon ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// lde gus gsos zhes bya ban/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/
blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mo rnams dang/ tshong dpon rnams dang/ dad dpon rnams dang/ lho rnam pa dang/ gla rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams
dang lha ma yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ mi'am tsa rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen ro rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas tra/
lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lham yon dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cingashas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen
po dang ldan pa/ na 'dra 'i dang/ sha la khrag dang/ gaT+Tamasu cha dang/ gdan dang/ snyan gasos dang/ sman zong rnams brtas pa// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas ra mnyan du yod pa na rgyalabu
rgya' byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pan brag zu phyug tsaji noranang la longs spyod chepa/ yongs su 'dzan pa yasashing

rgya chab/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhabade gnas nga des ra ba na nyam nga 'a sazhungam blangs nas/ de da dang lhan tsa'e tu rtsa dang dga' ba dang gu' dgur sbyor de//

de rtse zhing dga' la dang/ 'a dgur spyod pa las/ chungam la bu chags nas/ de smyung brgyad don dgu lon ra dang du byung ste/ khye'u mdog ngan pa/ blta na mi smra ba pa// pyad ngan mo'ag pa tsas taM/ da pa/

ma thag tu de'i na 'inu ma gnyasi la'om nad ra ragyur to// re zhig na bram khra des de'i ma ma gzhan zhig bkug na/ de'i 'o na nang khye'u de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas med pa rtagyur to// daMnas gang gi cha
de'i phyir 'o ma byung ba'i thabs sbyarang thams cad las kyang 'onamo 'byung bar gyur pa de'i tshalde gug gsos nas// lde gus gses lde gus gsosazhes bya bar btags so// de chung bar grags shing
bsod nams chung ba zhig ste/ gang gitshad charargyas pa de'i tsho lto gang yang ma rnyed de// de nas des dag spyongasham thabag 'a gas par gyon pa/ gos legs par bgos pa dag lhung bzed bung ba'i

mdog lta bur gnag pa thogs nas mnyan duyod pa rab sod snyoms la 'gro la/ da dpag kyang 'a ga pa'i ngang ka dang/ lhung badred kyang bkang ste phyir 'byungab mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang da brten ldan

'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur nas/ pas pha ma 'a gsolate/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo// de rab tu byung yang lta ba dang ni red nas da par gyur par nyid kyis brtson pa
dung bsgrub pa dang/ 'bad pas pha' ni ga lnga pa'i 'a de rang 'i 'a khe ra 'a 'di nyidig zhing sa brtan da la ra gnas// 'du byed kyi rnamar thams cad sU'i pa dang/ ltung
nga dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsadachadad/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sangs nas// dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sumadubyas te/ dgra bcom pa khamasaM
gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyuranas/ gsar dngabanga' ma nyan pa/ nam mkha' dang 'gamatha' du 'dra nga'i na sa dang ldan pa// tsan dan sngangs pa ltatshur bas 'a bar gyurapa/ ge pas
sgo pa'i sbyangs brtson pa/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ sa so yang dag par rig pa thob pa// srid pa rid pa dang/ chags pa dang/ dkur sti'amat+tab/ dbang po dang 'dabang dang bcas

nga'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rgyud da dung/ gug par snapa'i gdan g gyur to// danag phyis pa zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang 'jug pa 'a zhugag[' ]/ dag de phug nas sham thabs dang chos gos bgos

taM lhung badred thogs nas mnyan du yod ra ra bso da hUm gal song ngo// de nas des ngasod snyoms bsdong pomadapo dag chud de/ des de'i dbang po rnams dang/ 'byung ba chen ro rnams tshim par gyurato// de
nas de dngang po tshim par gyur nas/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ston sa par 'jug pa rnams kyisamtshan rangs 'das par byas so// de nas nga'i blo skyes pa/ mal thabs 'di na 'bad po
zhag gis bdag gso dag sgo nga de dge 'dun la gsol ba gdab bo sAmamo// dag dag slong gi dge 'dun thams cad 'gaso' ba btang pa/ btsun pa dad gni bsod nams chung ste/ gang ga tshodri gtsad
nga du phyag bdar pagyisan bsod snyoms 'a mchis pa de'i tshe/ gdod 'grangs par gyur te/ de bas na bdag la dge 'dunagyis thugs rje bar mdzod la/ gzhan sus kyang dri gtsang khang dug 'dar

ma ma dzad par gsol zhes byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri gtsang khang du sus kyang phyag bdar mi bya'o zhes dge 'dun gyi khrims bcas nas des bag yangs su dragatsang khang phyogs pa'i 'og du mnyan/

duyodar ra bsod snyoms la 'gro bar byed do// de'i tshon tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'ang 'khor lnga brgya dang rgyal bu rgya'abyed kyi tsha' dudabyar gnas da ra dam bcas nas// mnyan du yod par lhags te/ ston

pa la gus pa skyes nas/ drigatsang khang du phyag bdarabyas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa lde gus gsos kyis tshoranas des smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyis dragatsang du phyag bdar byas pan bdag gi lter bsnan
parabs so// gnas brtan gyis snyas pa/ rtsi'os/ lde gug gsos pas snus pa/ gnas brtan gang gi tshabadag gas dri gtsang khang du phyag bdaram byas pa de'i tshe bdag gis ngasod snyomasaM
mi red do// de nas gnA brtan shAri'i bus smras pa/ gal tedalta na bdag ga zhig tu/ya ra drangs kyis/ khyod snying ma chung gi dong bdagagis dar khyod la kha zas sbyin par bya'o//
de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa'i spyan 'dren 'ongs nas lde gus gsos kyang de dang lhan cig tu chos so// den pa dang bag tshe khyim bdag de'i sgo dang rta pa

lkog tu phyin pa de'i tshe/ lde gus la/gog kyi 'as kyi rnam par smin pas khyim der 'thang mo chen po byung ngo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa lde gus gsos 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag bsod nams chung ba'i phyi'i
'thabamo byung yosnyam mo// de nas phyir 'brog sta gatshug 'bagapang dusong nas smyung bar 'dug go/ dunas phyi de3na par tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i dus skas pa/ khyod ci'i phyi ma 'ongs/ das smras
pa/ bdag bsod nams chung ba'i phyir 'thab mo ji ltar byung ba gnas brtan gyis mi mkhyenatam/ danas gnas brtan shA ri'i dus de'i na nga ra mdun du datsugaste/ khyim de'inang dusong nas dge
'dun gyi khrod du 'dug nas yang g.yas g.yon du na la zag na/sa la/ da lan 'dris pa'i mis kyang brjod pas de dge 'dun gyi khrid de kho nar 'anag sa su smyung bar gyur to// de nas razhagin
rgya gtam da gnas brtan kun dga' bog thos so// thog nas kyang lde gus gsog la smras pa/ 'on rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'diton du 'dug rug dang/ bdag gis khyod kyi rdzas khyer tu 'ong do
zhes dug so// gnas brtan kun dga' ngon bcom ldan 'das 'a sa chos kyi phung po brgyad cu lebs pa dang/ dge slong gzhan dag lasa'aphro lebs pa de lta bu'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin na/ lde
gus gsos kyi las kyi sgrib pas gnas nga rtan kun dga' ngosakyang ngarjod nga ra gyur te/ der yang lan gsum sbyang par gyur to// danag zhag ngazhi 'an pa'i/ gam ngartan kun dag/ra
pos rasmin satabasod swAnas du na/ de'ang phyir 'gro nga'i tshe khyi rnams kyis phrogs te/ dar yang de lanongan snang bar gyur to// de nas zhag lnga len pa'i tshe// gnas brtan mo'u
'ga' gyi du chen ro ga thos nas// lde gus ba so sa kyi phyir bgo snyoms drungs nas rdzu 'dra la rgyas chas pa dang/ lde gu so gsos kyi las kyinem pa ra na pas bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gas

'dab lcag gsebasnan nas rgya mtsho'i zhing du bor te dar yu ngad lan lnga snang bar gyur to// de nas zhag dug 'an da'i tsha gnas brtan shar 'adug thos nas 'dasnyom du so nag te/ mal nga da/kho nas lde gus gses kyi

bsod snyoms drangs gor ma chag Amamo// de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus de ri bso dasnyoms blangs nas khyim de dedu ma snang bar byas te/ ldags gsos kyi shi nas khang gi sgo ra 'ongs// de nas lde gus gsos

kyi 'asakyi rnam par smin pas sgo de'ang brag gse 'khor bar gyurato// de nas gnas brtan shAri'ibus rdzu 'phrul gyis sgo dbya'o snyam nas lhung drod sa la bzhag pa dang/ de'ang rje gug gsos kyi 'a sa kyi rnam par

smin pas thur dudang ga tshad brgyad khri'i 'ganags rargyase gzhi yod pa'i stong du song nas/ de las kyang gnas brtan shAri'iburdzu 'phrul gyis phyung nas zas de khar gzhug go snyam ste/ zas de la datsuganada'i las kyi
tsa3 nyug/ rnam pa rasmin pa su khadand par phyi' dor bar gyur to// de nas tshodang ldan do ra'ibu lde gus gsos laskal bzhed pa ra shags nas skyobar gyur te/ dar yang btsun pad 'an drug smyung

bar gyur to// de nas zhag bdun 'an da 'i rten da ra tshe dang ldan pa rtse gug gso ga kyis sems can rnams skyo nga baspyod pa dang/ las rnams chud mi bra bar bstan pa dang/ lasakyistobs gleng ba'i phyir ltung

brjod tha' pas bkang sta/ ga ngas rgyas 'go gas pa dag slong gi dge 'dunagyi spyan sngar 'dug na chu dang rdzogs te 'thungs nas/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngana' sa 'das pa'i dbyingasasu yongasasumya

pan ra ga 'das so// da nas dgaslong rnams kyis de mthong nas skyo bar gyur to/ de'i sku gdung 'a sku gdung gin chod pa byas so// danas dag slong dag the tshom skyes te/ thatsam thams cad gcerapa sangs/

rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhug ra// btsun ra lnga gug thag sogs kyis las gang dag nga gyis na/ dar dgra bcom pa 'di thob par gyur kyang/ zhagajug spyang bar gyur nas/ zhag bdun pa'i gdugs la phung po'i lhag ma
mar pa'i myang n las 'das pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsa' ra/ dag slong dag lde gus gsos rta'i kyis sngon tsho rangs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed tshang
rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dang 'ja' bzhin du 'byung la gdonami tsa dar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pa san/ lde gus dgos nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan suzhig
[s Thams su myong bar 'agyurata/ dge slong dag las byas shing ngas gas pa rnams phyi'i 'a chu sa'i las 'a rnam par smin par ni 'gyur/ chu'i khar sa dang/ mar khams dang/ rlung gi khams la
rnam par smin par mi 'gyurato/ 'as dag nga rang mi dag nga byas shing bsags pa rnams zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skyamachod rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//
'as can dgagi 'a sa rnams na// bskal pa brgyar yang chud ma bri// tshogs shing dus la bab pan// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dag slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
grong khyer wA rA Na na khyin bdagayu ga chungan dad pa dang ldan la// dag zhang bsam pa bzang ba gi 'dug pa de rgyunar 'chad par dag sbyong dang/ bram zad ng/ bkren pa dang/ sdug cing 'phongs pa
dang/ sgorab rnams la sbyin pa dag byed do// phyi'i de'i khyim thab kaM nas/ ranage na de'i bu bdag gi khyon gyi bdag por gyur to// de'ang ser sna can 'jungs pa/ yo byad la kun tu 'dzin pa/
khra la'ang gtor nam starang zhagasta/ dadag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ bkran pa dang/ sdug myang 'phongs pa dang/ slongang rnan sa mthong na sems sdang bar byed de// de'i mnasdon gyi lugs
bzhin du dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ bkran pa dang/ sdug range 'phongs pa dang/ slong rnams 'a sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag spyin pa byad do// de nas de'i dus sna sa non pa des smras pa/
na/ thubya// yum bdag mdadakyis/ sbyin pa ma sbyin cig/ des smras pa// dugacig ma 'di ni khyim gyi lugs kyis 'di yago/ de nas des legs shig tu zan pho gasta bzhi gan 'on kyang da

khranagyi phyidan sbyin par byed do// phyedazhi'idagatodi'o// degasasar sbas non cing khro bas khasgribs pa'i blo can des yang dang yang du bkag ste/ thabs jalta bu sabakag kyang de dgagam nusanas mal
skyas// yum bgyi ba zhig mchis kyis/ khyim gyi phug tu bzhud cig/ de nas rang bzhin gyis drang pa de khyim gyi phug tu song ngo// de nas des sgo bcad de rtamigacig dran bcad nas/ sa skyasapa/

khubadagabakras sa// da nas des tshig rtsub po skyas te/ thal ba 'gom zhag ces smras so// danag re zhiganamang zhing mi bde 'a gnod pa dang phrad pa dang snying rje rdza skad du khus btab kyang zhag drug gi bar du sbyang
dung cug ste/ ma btang nas shi'o// 'on kyangesarasnus bsgribs pa dem dang bral ba la 'gyod pa med do// bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
na khyon bdag gi'u gyur pa gang yin pa datsalde gus gsos 'di yin no// degan la gnodar byas pa'i 'aAde'i rnam par smin pas bskal pa gtsug gzer dusems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par/
skyas so// rgyud kho nag daltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum dubyas nas sbyang par gyur te/ thal bzos nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// dag slong dag lde gus gsos kyis ni las gzhan
dag kyang byas shing bsags te/ dgeslong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ grong khyer wArANA sin khram lu lha la na pa wAr NA saMnags pa'i bram ze dang/ khyim bdag dang/ skyab
thams cad kun tu bkur sti bya ba dang/ blamarabya ba dang/ nir bya ba dang/ mchod pa byed cing bkur ba zhig yod de/ chos nyid kyisan sas rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe/
rang sangs rgyas sdug cing 'arongs pa rnams la sAri 'jug/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tshob/ 'jig rtan gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnanasa'ajig rten du 'byung ste/ ri naginadza sangs rgyas
'i gtsag wArAtshos dgod ston s 'gong pa dang/ dedir lag pa 'ang dkang/ lhung bzed kyang bkang ste/ phyi'i byung ba bram zes mthong nas/ der sorasnoskyas te lhungabazad bltas tshur
khyer shog ces byas so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams nam bsams par shes pa ni 'dzugs/ btsun pa des bstan to/ des des sa la rogasarkang pas gzhul la// de nas rang sangs
rgyas de sbyang bar 'dug kyang bram khre 'gyodar maskyes so/ dgaslong dag ji snyem du sams/ de'i de'i dus na bram ze'agyur pa gang yin pa de na lde gusagasos 'di yin no// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das
khod srungs kyi ring la rab tu byung sta/ gad tshangs pa bskyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa dgand ltar dgra comar ni'angon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de lta na'as gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams rnam par
smin pa'i ng gcig tungs par gnag rar gyur ro// las gcig tu nges pa radakar po rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i ngagacig tungs par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams zhim
parasmin pa'i ng 'dren ma 'gyur ro// dag slong dugade bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang/ las 'drenama rnams spangs la/ las gtsage tunges par dkar ba rnams 'bad
zhig 'gatad par byasgyu/ dag slong/ khyod kyis daltar ba slab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis deskad ces bka' stsalas/ dgaslong dadag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
pa la mngon par bstod do/[.. ]/'khor ba zhes bya ban/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang/ blon po chen po rnams dang/ phyug ro rnams dang/ pho brang
khor rgyam rnams dang/ tshong dpon nams dang/ dad dpon rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ kun m dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ ltam yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' ldinganamA
dang/ mi 'am tsa rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas// blamarabyas/ rimar byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang/ rgyu dang/ gnod na dang/ snyan yon dang/ nam mkha'
ldong dang/ mi 'am ci deng/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cingags pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ nobaza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gaN+Dims chadang/
ba gdan dang/ snyan gasos dang/ smanazong nas bdes pa// nyan thos kyi dag bdun dang bcas pan nyan du yod pa na rgyur du rgya'akhyadakyatsho'abadag mgonamad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
ga de'i tshomanyan du yodapan khyim bdag phyug ringanor mang la longs spyod chab/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs rig chapa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa// rnam thos kyi bu'i
nor dang 'gran pa zhige gnas ra res rigs mnyamapa' sachus blangs nas/ ded dang lhan cig tu rtsa zhing dga' la dga' spyod do// decung dga' dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chungs la
